         some pretty sexy moves. But to bring a shotgun into the fight? Come on, girlfriend, get real.

         Ugh, I-Im not your girlfriend, you dick, Holly replied, spitting grass out of her mouth.

         Insult me all you want, Evil Nacho laughed, none of it will get you out of me smashing your brains in.

         Holly laughed. Well, you are what you eat.

         Evil Nacho growled angrily, adding pressure, from his foot, to Hollys head. She moaned in agony, feeling like her head was about to explode. She then heard loud blast of fire-power, which knocked Evil Nacho back on his ass.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Holly first thought it was Super Jakey coming to save the day, though unfortunately she was dead wrong.

         Evil Nacho, growling angrily like a dog, frantically got up on his feet. Who keeps interrupting my satisfaction?! OH! Well, hello there!

         Holly had gotten up, looking up at the sky, to see Adoa ships, soaring over their heads. They were all headed towards Kingzing City, which was close to Hollys home, using immense and highly-powered weaponry.

         An Adoa Bat Ship was hurdling towards Hollys and Evil Nachos location, firing its guns. Holly ran for cover, after taking her shotgun, as Evil

 

Unexpected Alliance

 

         Nacho screamed angrily, jumped high into the air and latched himself on the Bat. Holly watched the monster throw Mazer pilots out of the Bat, their bodies being crushed from the impact against the concrete. Evil Nacho landed back on the ground, as the Bat crash-landed near him. One of the Mazers, who was barely alive, lay nearby crying in pain. Evil Nacho walked towards the Mazer and stomped on his head until its alien brains were scattered all over the concrete.

         Holly, on the other hand, kept her shotgun close to her and pointed it at Evil Nacho. She wasnt sure what the hell she was currently witnessing. First, a mutated monstrosity blows up her bathroom and now space aliens were attacking the city. She could hear the terrified screams from citizens, as she also watched neighbors around her home were making their way out of the city in their vehicles.

         Oh, stop pointing your gun at me, bimbo, Evil Nacho said, wiping his bloody foot in the grass. Youre now the least of my troubles, now. IM SERIOUSLY TIRED OF BEING INTERRUPTED!

         The two of them watched citizens leave their homes, as they also watched more Adoa Bats and Mohawks (drop ships) make their way through the city. How can I trust you, then? Holly asked, lowering her weapon. How do I know youre not behind all of the whacked-up crap thats happening, right now?!

         Evil Nacho laughed. Did you not just see me slaughter some of these idiots?! An explosion was heard from inside the city, along with police sirens echoing throughout. Kingzing City was under attack and it was not Evil Nachos fault.

         Holly sighed. God, what the hell is this?

         Evil Nacho cackled. Why, its evil, of course! As much as I adore evil, however, and as much as I love watching people get hurt, no moron deserves to interrupt me. Im frankly tired of it, you know? I was about to kill you, but then these space-monkeys had to ruin the whole thing! I now have a pure hatred for them. And if Im ever going to kill you, or Super Jakey, Im going to have to wipe out these losers, first.

         Holly realized what Evil Nacho was saying. So, were teaming up?

        

Chapter 21

 

         Evil Nacho sighed angrily. In a sense, I suppose. I never fought with an ally, though, especially with a bimbo like you.

         Holly wanted to shoot Evil Nacho in the face, but that wouldnt solve anything. Okay, this is an unexpected alliance, then. Nacho, since youre now my ally, do you think you can take me to the Cheese and Crackers Supermarket? If were going to be slaughtering any aliens, today, I want to gear up. Plus, I need to find my friends. I have to make sure theyre okay.

         Evil Nacho thought for a moment. On second thought, Im better on my own. See you later, you dumb bimbo! You actually think Im going to take you out for shopping?! AS IF! HAHAHAHA!

         Evil Nacho ran off, jumping high in the air and out of Hollys sight. She gasped in anger, wishing she had shot a shotgun shell in the monsters mouth. That ungrateful piece of URGH! Holly had to make quick haste, in order to get more fire-arms as well as ammunition, in order to survive this day. However, her 1985 Volvo was still in the car shop. She took her phone out her pocket, to call Jake or Kyle, only to see that it was permanently broken, from when Evil Nacho recently attacked her. Im going to kill that Nacho Bastard! Holly then realized that breaking into someone elses car seemed to be a more reasonable solution. She looked around her area frantically and saw no cars around her, unfortunately. Damn! Holly then made a final decision to run for the supermarket, which lay a couple miles away from the city. Holly sighed deeply and started making her way to the city, feeling slightly frightful. With only five rounds left in her shotgun, Holly started her small journey to the supermarket. She was praying that she would come across Jake, for he would obviously be going into the city, also, to fight against the Adoa.

         Everything was happening so fast and it was difficult for Holly to process that. She felt confused, terrified, and fully on alert. However, thats how everyone felt, when the Adoa finally made it to Earth and started enduring the wrath of Zjok.

 

Meanwhile (Present Time)

        

Unexpected Alliance

 

         As Super Jakey and Kyle flew through the rural, neighborly areas, Super Jakey was desperately trying to get ahold of his dad, Holly, even Velouria. Jared Smithy, Holly Ransfield, and even Velouria Lancelot were unavailable through calling.

         Velouria is unavailable, too Super Jakey, replying to Kyles questioning about his girlfriend.

            Kyle was getting extremely worried. B-but, Velouria always has her phone on her! Oh God, I think Im gonna throw up.

         Super Jakey laughed sarcastically, as they finally approached the Cheese and Crackers Supermarket. Uh, could you not, bro? Okay, come on, lets take as much weaponry and ammunition as we can.

         Citizens were rushing in and out of the supermarket, grabbing as many supplies as they can. The Adoa seemed was already on the news and was being widely spread, so people can evacuate as fast as possible. Fearful people cheered happily when they saw Super Jakey walking through the parking lot.

         YAY! Super Jakey is here! We can actually hope for things, now! yelled one citizen, happily.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Hey! Dont give me all the credit! Super Jakey yelled right back. I would like all of you guys to meet my new side-kick, Super Lyle!

        

Chapter 21

 

         Kyle stared blankly at Super Jakey, as he represented him. Really, dude?

         What? Super Jakey being dumb. Its better than Ultra Kylie, isnt it?

         Kyle shrugged. I wouldve gone for something other than sounding like a lazy super hero. I mean Lyle seems so slack-ish.

         The citizens watched the two of them argue in the parking lot, with deep concern. So, you would rather be named Lazy Lyle?

         Kyle laughed, Thats not what I said! You suck at arguing. Plus, Id rather go with something like, The Silver Swordsman.

         Thinking that was the most Lyle name he had ever heard of, Super Jakey decided to laugh off the argument and continued walking, signing a few autographs for some of the local fans. You just keep believing what you believe in, even though youre entirely weird.

         Kyle followed him. Ha. Well, The Silver Swordsman is better than Jakey. Did you know Jakey is slang for a heavy smoker in Scotland?

         Oh, shut up! Come on, Silver Vagina, lets go get our supplies. Citizens of Kingzing City, I employ you all to be safe and secure! In the meantime, pointing his finger at the Adoa ships in the distance, those suckers are going down!

         The citizens applauded and cheered for Super Jakey, as he and Kyle walked into the supermarket. Youre such a push-over.

         Super Jakey smirked. Well, how do you expect me to save the day? You want me to help them pack?

        

In the sky

         Preox, Kriket, Rig, and the other have finally managed to get the old Asid spacecraft up and running. However, it still wasnt in the best condition. Imagine driving an older car model, with a stick-shift, that has not been driven for the past few decades. Thats what it was like to fly the stupid thing.

         Four Asids alone were the ones to pilot the massive ship, whereas one other Asid maintained all of the ships gun turrets. The ship was much slower than an average Adoa fighter, though it was fast enough to get Preox and the

Unexpected Alliance

 

         others to the destination they needed to reach, which was Kingzing City of course. Other companions joined in with the group. Moosey, Captain Derno, Agent Clarke10, and many other American soldiers and A72A Agents joined the small party of rebellion against the Adoa. Soldiers and agents sat in rows of seats in the back of the ship, while the Asids and Aziquet managed the cockpit.

         They were just approaching the state of Oregon, when Rig blurted, Gee, I sure do miss Area 72!

         Oh, cut your persistent whining, Preox pleaded. If it werent for that ignorant moose, we would have had possession of the Misara Serum, far from now.

         Just doing my job, Moosey interrupted, Preox shushed him.

         Captain Derno! Preox hollered. Status report on the city of Kingzing?

         Derno was skimming through his laptop, sipping a cup of coffee nearby, when he answered, Kingzing City is now under attack. The news has gone viral within ten minutes and its all over the media. Honestly, Preox, do you think we have what it takes?

         Of course not, Preox responded, Rig started laughing hysterically. Theres only five Asids, one mutated idiot by the name of Rig, and a group of inexperienced humans.

         The military is already working on fighting back the alien force in the city, Derno replied right back.

         Did you hear me not say inexperienced humans? Captain Derno, the Adoa is ten times more powerful than that of your putrid militia. Im sorry to say, but without the proper tactics, you humans will be merely nothing but a bag-full of fun, compared to the Adoa. However, I am hoping that this Super Jakey will put up a huge fight, against Zjok. In all honesty, hearing from what Super Jakey has done to those Adoa Probes, makes me even more hopeful that we have a chance against an entire army that is pursuing a full-on invasion, against your kind. Trust me, these guys have done it before and it never looks pretty, even when theyve lost.

         Is there at least some good news? Moosey asked.

 

Chapter 21

 

             

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         Yes, Kriket answered for Preox. At least the Adoa is unable to bring their entire military to one planet. Their army is separated into three, similar to that of your military branches on Earth.

         You mean theres more than what were dealing with now?! Clarke shrieked.

         You got it, buck-o, Admiral Bxir said. Theres Zjok and two other malicious, dictatin leaders by tha names of Drank and Levier. The Adoa is a common enemy fer many diffrent planets. Zjoks military branch is at war against us, tha Asids, and, of course, a conflict against tha humans. Thankfully, not all of tha Adoas planetary forces are against us. If they were, all of us would probly bin dead, by now. As for us Asids, our planet consists of one branch, which we have bin purty successful with.

         So much of Zjoks military are we dealing with here? Derno asked.

         Oh, Bxir laughed, approximately two-thirds of it. From what I seen, when Kriket, Zitkir, Drox, and I were all capturd by Zjok, there was too many tah count.

         Moosey gulped, as they flew threw a thick sheet of clouds.

         Were almost there, Preox announced, looking at a nearby radar. Were getting closer to where the Misara Serum is located. I pray to God that the Serum isnt all consumed by that nautical teenager.

         Well it still wouldnt help to check, regardless, Drox said.

Unexpected Alliance

 

           

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         The ship was finally out of the dense clouds and there was a lovely view of Kingzing City, below them. They could see the few ships that were roamed all over the streets, shooting things and taking civilians hostage.

         Doesnt look two-thirds to me, Preox said, with an emphasis of sass, towards Admiral Bxir.

         Tha rest must be waitin somewhere above Earths obit, Bxir replied, with the same amount of sass. Zjok jist might want the Misara Serum, instead.

         Yes, but theyre attacking the city, Zitkir cut in. Theyre attacking the humans, so this really shouldnt be the Asids, or Rigs, problem.

         Preox set the ship on auto-pilot. There, Ive set the Serums coordinates into the ship. We should be there any minute (thank God the Adoa cant track our older models. Oh, and Zitkir, I have a bone to pick with you. Preox got up and so did Zitkir. Rig started to giggle under his breath, showing that Zitkir was in trouble. Preox shushed him and Rig was silent immediately.

         Zitkir, as a team leader, I would expect you to be more mature about this whole ordeal, Preox said with an uptight accent in his raspy voice.

         Oh, Im the one whos immature?! Look at Rig!

        

 

Chapter 21

        

         Rig is Rig, Preox replied, theres seriously no helping him. And Zitkir, I dont want you to breathe another word about the Adoa not being our problem, you got that? Rig and I were the ones to first settle on this Earth, in the first place. We brought the Misara Serum, here, and now the Adoa is attacking the city. How can you not say that this is our problem, also?

         Its basically just your fault, then, Zitkir snapped back. Everyone in the ship gasped.

         Zitkir, what the hell? Kriket was angry. If you think about it, its all pretty much our fault that this is happening. (1) Zjok betrayed us and made the Serum in the first place, (2) our race planned to steal that weapon, (3) Preox and Rig lost it, due to an unstable light-speed ship, and (4) the moose and the humans captured Preox and Rig, thus delaying them in their efforts to take back the Serum.

         Its Agent Moosey17, by the way.

         Shut it, moose, Kriket snapped. So, Zitkir, before you start going off like a confused, meat-shoving frat boy, think about whats really going on here.

         Zitkir was quiet, as was everyone else. Alright, Im sorry, Magnate Preox.

         Its fine, I guess, Preox responded, watching the Adoa roaming over the city. This whole ordeal became more disastrous than I thought, more disastrous than anyone thought. Its rather annoying, if you ask me.

         I wasnt going to, Rig replied, behaving like a smart-ass. Preox shot him a disgusted look. If anything else was going to be more annoying than the Adoa, it would be Rig. I think youre very pretty when youre angry, Preox. Im happy for you.

         Before Preox could say anything, Captain Derno changed the subject. Well, if you say that we humans are inexperienced with your version(s) of warfare, I cannot wait to prove you wrong. Anyway, it seems that the ship is descending about your designated location. Im going to go back to my men and get them ready.

         Preox nodded in agreement, taking his seat back in the cockpit. He kept the ship on auto-pilot, as he and the others kept a sharp eye out for any Adoa.        

Unexpected Alliance

 

         Zitkir, keep your eye out for any infantry. Blast any Mazer or Striker that you may see.

         We gonna shoot at infants?! Rig shouted horrifically, startling Kriket.

         You incompetent dolt, Preox said under his breath, angrily and switch on his sarcasm. Yes, Rig, were gonna kill a bunch of defenseless babies! Because they are far more dangerous than Zjok, himself! Get your electric stem ready, because those defenseless babies will kill you.

         I seriously thought you were serious, Agent Clarke10 replied, in a serious tone. Preoxs eye twitched.  He surely had enough with everyones nonsense, especially the nonsense coming from Zjok and his Adoa army.

         Once the old ship had landed, which was in the Kingzing City High School parking lot, Preox and the others took cautious movements when exiting the aircraft. Preox had his rifle unfolded, keeping his combat posture at its best, as he examined his surroundings. The campus was completely empty, though it wasnt quiet. Citizens all over the campus were fleeing the city, with military services.

         Looks like the city has already went under martial law, Captain Derno said, holding a shotgun.

         See, we told you our military was prepared for this! Moosey shouted, causing everyone to shush him, immediately.

         Will you keep your damn voice down?! Preox said in a lower voice, trying his best not to yell right back.

         Oh, its not like the Adoa is not gonna find us, already, Kriket snapped, as she finally walked out of the ship. Preox was about to argue with her, until he saw something unique about her appearance. Kriket had cut her hair, down to where humans would have their ears.

         You cut your hair?!

         Kriket unfolded a massive gun. Well, yeah. Im tired of my hair always getting in the way, during combat. Im surprised it hasnt gotten me killed, seeing that how long it was. Does it look okay?

         You look prettier than me, Rig replied, before Preox could answer.

         Heh, thanks Rig. I was talking to Preox.

         Oh, I know.

        

Chapter 21

Oh, and for those who dont know what Adoa look like: If you see an 8-foot (or more) tall, pale-skinned, slightly hairy brute with no lips, and is shooting at you, blow their brains out.

         They have no lips? Moosey asked, as they all began to move out, including other agents and marines. Preox responded affirmatively. Oh, wow, I wonder how they kiss.

         With their own assholes, Bxir replied, puffing a cigar, making everyone laugh, except for Preox, of course. A blaring noise erupted from Preoxs Vambit, flashing neon-green lights, which startled everyone. Damn, Prex. You tells us tah be quiet an you end up tha loudest out of alluh us!

         Well, this is mandatory, Preox said, as the sound got louder. The container of the Misara Serum is close now. It should be about--.

         THERE! Rig shouted, pointing at Jake Smithys pick-up truck, which was parked with the rest of the cars. Sorry! I just wanted to be the loudest one!

Unexpected Alliance

 

            seat, shattering it completely. He took out the Misara Serum, smiling brightly at it. HEY! I remember this thing! The container was open, which didnt surprise Preox. The Serum had been missing for so long, so why wouldnt it be empty?

Well, that does not surprise me. The only most dangerous, yet super, weapon we have discovered now in the bodily fluids of a human teenager who probably doesnt even recognize why the Adoa is attacking his home. Hell, that was even the last of the Drokensmur blood, in existence.

         Dang, Bxir exclaimed. Woulda bin great if we culda all jest took a sample of that Serum an this job woulda bin a whole lot easier.

         Thats me! Rig blurted.

         Yes thats you. Anyway, I just wish we didnt have to be so technical about this stupid weapon and should have just annihilated the Adoa when we had the chance. Now look whats happening.

         Oh, God, I smell awful, Drox said.

Chapter 21

THERES MORE OF THEM, BUT THEYRE HUGE! AT LEAST FIFTEEN FEET TALL!

Cheese & Crackers Supermarket

 

         The more Super Jakey and Kyle entered the supermarket, the more people had left. Shelves from all of the stores aisles were practically empty. Many people had obtained the sources that they needed, in order the apocalyptic disaster which is currently happening. Super Jakey and Kyle were making their way to the firearms department, when Super Jakey decided to ask, Since when was your sword real, Kyle? I thought play productions use a lot of fake stuff from thrift stores.

         Kyle had taken a candy bar from one of the shelves and started eating it. Mr. Archibeque, the theatre teacher, doesnt mess around when hes directing a play. He likes using real swords, but no real guns, no real knives. Just real swords. Hell deny it every now and then, that the prop swords he uses are actually real, but thats just because he doesnt want the school board hearing about it.

         Dang, what a badass. Wish he was here. Maybe he would have more swords. You know how sick that would be?! Using swords against these alien boars? Super sick.

         Yeah, I kinda get to do that and you dont, Kyle boasted.

 

Chapter 21

 

            I could just take it away from you, you know that? Super Jakey mentioned. I could blast you away with an awesome elbow laser, kill you in one punch, and even puke lava on your face.

         Kyle paused when they both approached the firearms. There was barely any left. Everyone had been taking them all for protection. Wait. Puke lava? Can you really do that?

         Super Jakey rolled his eyes. Okay, I take that back. I can, its just the worst pain in the world.

         Super Jakey was going to hop over the front counter of the firearms department, until Von Alan burst out of the back room aiming a bow and arrow at him. I know youre Super Jakey and everything, but back the hell up now!

         Von, relax! Super Jakey shouted, hesitantly taking off his mask and showing his true self.

          Oh, Jesus, Jake! You coulda gotten an arrow in your face.

         Lava could be worse, Kyle replied.

         Von lowered his arrow and hugged Jake. The fact that Jake was Super Jakey seemed to not surprise him. He was more concerned about Kingzing City being under attack. Man, am I glad to see you. Everyone robbed me of all my weapons! Even the ones I had in the back. All I have left are these shotguns, a couple combat pistols, a few semi-automatics, and several grenades. This is like the end of the world and stuff.

         You think thats not much?! Super Jakey shouted happily, after hearing the news about the weapons. He took a shotgun and loaded it with shells. See?! Were gonna be fine!

         I dont know, man, Von replied, straightening his hunters cap. I saw those weird things all over the news. What if theyre to come here?!

         Then well be ready, Super Jakey replied, loading a magazine in a semi-automatic rifle, strapping it around his torso. Are you good with that bow?

         Hell yeah, Von replied with a smile. Im pretty scared though, you see, I got a wife and kids to get to.

         Youll get to them. Are you about done getting ready, Kyle?

Unexpected Alliance

        

         What? Kyle was startled. He wore a white ninja mask and his sword appeared to be squeaky clean. Sorry, I wanted to focus on my look, since were going to go kill a bunch of boars.

         Well, you kind of need a weapon for longer ranges, rather than the range of a sword.

         Kyle smiled confidently. Oh, Ill be fine.

         The obnoxious sound of a small explosion and constant, monster-like jabbering was heard from the entrance of the supermarket. Citizens were screaming in fear, as blasts of alien weapons were being used.

         On second thought, Kyle gulped, maybe a semi-automatic pistol would be nice. Do you have any suppressors? I like suppressors. Theyre fun to use and suppress things.

         Theres not enough time for that! Von shouted, pulling back his bow.

         Yeah, Kyle, Super Jakey scoffed, aiming his elbow and shotgun, get your shit together. Okay, boys, Im going to interrogate those poop-heads.

 

 

 

 

 

 


        

 

 

        

 

 

        

         Where is Super Jakey?! a Mazer shouted, at the top of his lungs, as he and his Mazers blasted their way through the supermarket. His name was Loof-koff. Magnate Galg will not be pleased with this report, if we do not find him here! There were several other Mazers following Loof-koff and none of them were seemed to be happy.

Chapter 21

         Youre probably right, Obit, Loof-koff agreed. Mazers, spread out! Kill anything in sight! If someone happens to not die, then it is Super Jakey! Remember, make sure you watch your—.

 

PEEW!

 

         Loof-koffs head was ultimately blown to bits, by an unexpected blast of laser, causing his Mazers to duck and cover.

         Hes here, alright! Obit shouted. Mazers, kill him!

         Super Jakey was under heavy fire, though that did not stop him from slamming the butt of his shotgun against Obits skull in and then shooting a few rounds at any other Mazer, who stood within his radius. Oh I hardly think thats gonna happen, buddy-boys! Cmon, show me what you got! After slamming another Mazers body to the ground, Super Jakey noticed more Mazers coming in from the other sides of the vicinity. Oh damn, theres more of you. Well, I do like a challenge! Hey, Kyle, Von, you got company coming at ya!!

         Back at the firearms department, where they could hear Super Jakey yelling and fighting, Von kept his bow steady for any Mazers to come into his line of sight. As for Kyle, he hid behind a shelf, in one of the store aisles, just waiting to pierce his sword through the innards of his enemy.

         You ready for this? Von said, keeping his concentration.

         Kyle gripped both his sword and semi-automatic pistol, sweating continuously out of his nervousness. If I die, I want you to tell Jake to tell Velouria that I love her.

         More humans! hollered a Mazer, who was now in Vons sight. He released his arrow, striking the Mazer in the mouth. The monster gagged and collapsed, as another began shooting at Von. Von ducked for cover, loading another arrow onto his bow. Kyle yelled ferociously, left his hiding spot, swung his sword against the Mazers neck, gray blood pouring onto the floor.  

        

 

Unexpected Alliance

 

         Kyle pulled his sword out of the dead aliens body, as three more Mazers made their way towards them. One of them shot at Kyles, only hitting his sword, which was shattered immediately. Scared out of his wits, Kyle fired his pistol, shredding the Mazers entire face, with hot bullets. Von shot another arrow, striking another bad guy in the eye. The third Mazer had gotten behind Kyle and kicked the scrawny teenager to the ground, smacking his jaw. The Mazer fired at Von, causing him to duck behind the counter. Kyle crawled helplessly for the gun, the Mazer kicked him once more.

         You ugly thing, time to put you out of your misery. Kyle looked up at his enemy, helplessly. The Mazer aimed his rifle against Kyles forehead. Any last words, boy?!

         Ive got a couple, came a voice. It was not Super Jakeys. The Mazer turned to see Holly Ransfield, with her shotgun aimed at his head. Fuck off. Before the Mazer could even do anything, Holly had pulled the trigger. The Mazers brains were completely blown out of his skull, splashing onto Kyles body. The mass of the Mazer collapsed onto the ground with a giant thud. Holly stood over Kyle, smiling at him brightly as she pumped another shotgun shell into the chamber. She quickly helped Kyle back on his feet, as he struggled to catch his breath from his recent beating.

         Why am I always getting kicked? Kyle said, gasping for air.

         Hold that thought, hun, Holly said, standing in front of her wounded friend. Von was able to release another arrow at another Mazer, striking him in the chest, Holly then kicking him in the face. After the alien was killed, no more of the Adoa showed up. Von, Holly, and Kyle could all hear Super Jakey fighting off the rest of them. Kyle, get behind the counter.

         Kyle and Holly were both taking cover behind the counter, Von keeping an eye out for any more bad guys. Holly, since when did you get here?

         She shrugged. I walked, I needed to look for you guys. Especially since all of this crazy stuff is going on. Are you doing alright? I can get a medical kit.

         Nah, Im fine. The only thing I need to worry about is either getting shot, pissing my pants, and Velouria.

         I guess we both have someone to look after, Holly smiled.

 

Chapter 21

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


        

 

 

         Why are you smiling? Kyle laughed, coughing a bit. You never smile. Holly smiled again, not having the ability to contain it, and bit her bottom lip gently. Kyle gasped, his eyes widening. You and Jake?! Wow! Dont tell me how it was, please.

         Holly snorted. You wish! Its just weird, yet awesome at the same time.

         I think its called liking someone, Kyle responded, sarcastically.

         Or its called being a smart-ass, Holly snapped, giving him a look. You know how Jake and I were before I started evolving affections for him. Its just weird, yet awesome.

         Kyle rolled his eyes, smiling. Yeah, yeah.

         Before Holly could be any more annoying about her feelings, according to Kyle, the loud abruptive roar of something that certainly was not a Mazer. Von had gotten down into hiding with Kyle and Holly, his eyes widened. I dont know what that was and I dont want to know.

         Kyle and Holly were both nervous and they huddled closer to the counter, once they all heard an explosion from the inside of the super market. It was a deafening noise, which eventually shook the ground. The sound of a giant gun blared throughout the building, which was frightening for the three of them. What the hell was it? Then, there was hard thud, slamming against the other side of the counter, which made Kyle squeal like a baby.

Unexpected Alliance

        

         They could hear Super Jakey, moaning in agony on the ground, which motivated them to stand right up from their position. From seeing Super Jakey on the ground, beaten, bloody, and healing, there stood an Adoa Striker. Not just any Adoa Striker, but Magnate Yayvox himself. Yayvox was angry, as he roared, firing his massive Adoa weapon at them. Holly, Von, and Kyle scrambled to get out of the firearms department.

         The back door! Von suggested, before Yayvox could fire his weapon once more.

         What about Jake?! Holly shouted, fully worrisome.

         HE CAN HANDLE HIMSELF! Kyle screamed frightfully.

         The three of them ran for their lives through the back door, away from Yayvoxs distant roars of anger. Yayvox did not chase after them, however. The monster stayed behind, for he wanted to destroy Super Jakey and bring him to Zjok, as soon as possible. Super Jakey groaned in pain, quickly getting up, before Yayvox were to reach him, and allowing his broken leg to heal. Come on, you stupid leg, heal! Super Jakey hovered in the air, almost forgetting the fact that he could fly, loading his semi-automatic rifle, before he actually faced the Striker once again.

         You cant hide from me, Super Jakey! Yayvox laughing. In fact, you cant hide anywhere! Our army is all here! We will destroy all of you! No mercy!

         You have a big mouth, fatty! Super Jakey yelled defiantly, firing his lasers at him, as well as his rifle. Barely doing little damage, the Striker laughing evilly, grabbed Super Jakey and threw him across the interior of the supermarket. The hero maintained his balance, charging at the Striker once more, with Yayvox firing his rifle at him. Streaks of purple globs of lava streaked from Yayvoxs rifle, just barely scratching Super Jakeys body.  Super Jakey punched the Striker in the eye, getting on top of his head.

         URG! Get off me, you bug!

         Super Jakey started tearing out Yayvoxs thick coat of fur and wailing on face. Yayvox was not in pain, though he was ultimately annoyed. Jesus, dude, why dont you die?!     Super Jakey dug his elbow into Yayvoxs fur and was about to shred Yayvoxs head with a powerful laser, until Yayvox grabbed him once more and slammed him hard against the floor. Ignoring the

Chapter 21

 

         pain, Super Jakey fired lasers from both of his elbows (while still lying on the ground), yelling angrily, before Yayvox was to stomp on him like an insect. Yayvox roared louder than ever, when a lasers pierced through the thick layers of his fur and into his body and destroying his rifle. Super Jakey then took a swift and mighty kick from the Striker, which sent him across the supermarket once again. The hero failed to maintain his balance this time, as he crash-landed into a cash register.

         Ow, he groaned, coughing up dust and debris. Super Jakey couldnt take this anymore. Just one Striker was kicking him to the curb. He found it disappointing that he can slaughter any Mazer in sight. Though when it came to fighting this one Striker, fighting couldnt be any more different. Super Jakey had to act fast, especially when he heard Yayvox charging toward his position. Jeez, hes still not dead?! Super Jakey had no idea how strong Yayvox was. His fur and his body build was about as thick as metal.

         Super Jakeys new plan was to fire more lasers and kick the shit out of Yayvox, but he fell into a different predicament. His foot was caught in some of the buildings wiring, which led him to be momentarily stuck. Oh, come on! Not now, hes about to stomp my head in! Yayvox was getting close to him and Super Jakeys foot would not release from the wires. Once he finally tore the wires from grasping his foot, Super Jakey quickly stood up ready to open fire. Before he could do that, a massive downpour of hot, molten cheese crashed from the supermarkets ceiling, pouring onto Yayvox.

         Knowing that extremely hot cheese was not a good sign, Super Jakey scrambled to get up and stay out of the way. There was enough melted cheese cover Yayvoxs entire body, which led him to a searing and burning pain beyond belief.

         Yayvox was not roaring, but screaming like a lobster being boiled on a stove. NOO! Not the cheese, not the cheese!! AIIIEE, AGGH!

         Super Jakey stood in front of Yayvox and the massive puddle of cheese, aiming his two elbows at him. The teenager smirked confidently, saying No mercy, buddy-boy, and fired infinite bursts of blue laser at the Strikers burning body. Yayvox screamed for another few seconds, until his voice became gurgled, as he also began to drown in the immense amount of cheese. Within the next minute, Yayvox was defeated with his body completely

Unexpected Alliance

 

         covered in burning cheese and fried organs, from the large amount of lasers pierced through his skin. He was barely alive, until Evil Nacho himself made in entrance through the disrupted ceiling. The nacho monster laughed manically as he took a sharp nacho chip and dug it into Yayvoxs cranium. Gray blood poured from his head, mixing with the nacho cheese and Yayvox finally had his last, dying, gurgled breath.

         Super Jakey aimed his elbows at Evil Nacho, now, who smiled devilishly as usual. Just when I was starting to forget you, cheesy-boy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         The monster cackled, spewing small amounts of cheese from his rotten mouth. Oh, Ive miss you so, Super Jack-ass! No need to fire those dreadful lasers at me. Today Im letting you off the hook, from facing a cheesy death, like this bastard did here.

         Super Jakey lowered his lasers gently. Whatre you saying, player?

         Evil Nacho walked up to him, standing at least two feet taller. What do you think Im saying, you ignoramus? Those uglies are destroying my city. MY CITY!

         Evil Nacho had spewed more cheese onto Super Jakeys face. He flinched weakly, wiping the cheese off. No need to yell, bro. As if that beasts roars werent enough.

         nacho cheese flowing underneath the city. Its my way of living and my way of dominating--.

         Ooo, kinky.

         Interrupt me again and youll find a nacho chip jammed inside your brain, also.

         Evil Nacho continued to laugh. The city is already under a maelstrom of destruction, Super Jakey. Im afraid its well worth the risk, if you are to save not only your loved ones and the city, but possibly the entire nation. I dont know if your noticed, primate, but theres more of them out there. Theyre intention is way beyond than just destroying the city. Super Jakey thought for a moment.

         Accept it, Evil Nacho continued, and may today be the only day that you and I work together to stop these posers.

Never in my life did I think you were going to use the word poser. Anyway, Nacho, looks like you got a deal. This is quite the unexpected alliance.

Unexpected Alliance

 

            before you two just did. But no, he bailed out on me the minute I wanted to come here to the supermarket.

         Super Jakey felt concerned. Wait, wheres Von? Wasnt he with you guys?

         He left to join the others being evacuated, Kyle answered, watching Evil Nacho tore a nacho off his body and ate it. He found Evil Nachos appearance to be very hilarious.

         Well, he did have family to get to, Super Jakey shrugged, even though he was a great team player. Well Kyle wants to find his girlfriend, Violet—I mean, Velouria—and I think it would be pretty cool to save the city.

         You make me sound like a selfish jerk, Kyle complained.

         No complaining, please, Kyle?

         I—.

         Shh!

         Holly looked at Super Jakey and she was not happy with the way hes been treating them. He looked back at her, smiling. She scoffed and walked off. Well, come on guys, lets go save Kyles girlfriend. She could be with the military, Kyle.

         Whats your problem? Super Jakey asked, his hands on his hips.

         Holly turned around. Excuse me?

         Uh oh, Kyle exclaimed, slowly walking away. Evil Nacho was snickering continuously.

         Youre all, like, dramatic, Super Jakey said. He sincerely believed that he wasnt acting like a jerk. He also thought that since he and Holly had more than a mutual relationship, he could say whatever the hell he wanted to her. Once again, Jake was misbehaving like an ignorant tool.

         Holly slowly walked up to him, with stern eyes. Oh, Im being dramatic?! Look whos being the dill weed, being rude to Kyle like that!

Chapter 21

         our loved ones whereabouts are unknown, and Cale Omnous (remember him?!) is dead!

         BUT YOU FORGOT ME! IT TOOK ME ALMOST AN HOUR TO GET OUT OF THAT THING! THANKFULLY IT WASNT FULL OF GARBAGE, OR ID BE SHOVING MY FOOT SO FAR UP YOUR—UGH! SHUT UP! JUST SHUT UP! COME ON, KYLE, WERE LOOKING FOR YOUR GIRLFRIEND! IM NOT GONNA STAND HERE AND WAIT FOR THIS IDIOT TO COME THROUGH HIS SENSES!! WED PROBABLY BE DEAD, BY THE TIME THAT HAPPENS! RRRGGHH!  

         Holly stomped on Super Jakeys foot hard, which actually caused a lot of pain. The hero groaned in pain, as Evil Nacho laughed. Holly gave Evil Nacho no satisfaction and she stormed off, with Kyle following her. Before Kyle left, he went up to Super Jakey. I knew you were just messin with me, bro. Whether youre kidding or not, man, its kind of time to get serious. I mean, just because you have powers and you cant die, doesnt mean we cant die either. Lets go. We gotta find Velouria. Im going to try calling her.

         As Kyle walked off, he took out his cellphone and frantically dialed Velourias number, just praying that she was okay. Super Jakey and Evil Nacho followed, as they began to head toward Velourias neighborhood, which was nearby the supermarket. Flying seemed more appropriate, but being detected by more Adoa was the last thing to achieve.  Super Jakey remained quiet and he really needed to. He didnt mean to constantly think about himself and only himself. He was just too stupid to realize it. In conclusion, he couldnt be more grateful to be around Holly. If it werent for her, Super Jakey would never realize how much an incompetent ape he really was.

 

 

 

 

Chapter 22: Epic Congregation

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Zjok, sir, Galgs voice came over Zjoks communication device, bestowed in his armor. No sign of Super Jakey, or Asids, in the area. Were blasting through everything we can and even our Probes have not detected anything. Furthermore, and I hate to say this because it makes me sad, Magnate Yayvox is dead. Well, presumably dead. We no longer have contact with him, Loof-koff, Ghed, or any other Mazer that was in Yayvoxs group. I had just sent a chunk of my team to a distant supermarket to see what they could find there and so far we have not heard anything.

         Keep scourging the Earth, Zjok ordered, without actually having the will to raise his voice. Chances are Yayvox and the others are dead. Perhaps Super Jakey is responsible for that. The Misara Serum is a powerful

 

Chapter 22

 

         substance. I must have that Serum. My future depends on it! I must not upset the Drokensmur.

         Yes, sir, Galg replied. For now the only conflict my group faces is the human military. Theyre not doing so great, of course.

         Good, Zjok said casually. Those pathetic homosapiens should give up, while they still have the chance.

         Zjok started laughing devilishly, and so did Galg, along with other Mazers and Strikers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Anything else, sir? Galg replied.

         Zjok took a sip of Kool-Aid. Eliminate them. Eliminate them all. Show no mercy; only show death.

         Indeed, sir. Easy as pie.

 

Kyles Neighborhood

 

         Walking through Kyles neighborhood was like running through an empty one. In fact, this was literally the statement! The neighborhood was completely empty! Everyone who resided in the neighborhood had fled, abandoning their homes to the Adoa.

 

 

Epic Congregation

 

         Kyle was busy calling Velouria on his cell phone for the past ten minutes. None of the calls resulted Velouria actually answering. Kyle was becoming anxious, scared, and more worried than he ever has been. Evil Nacho and Super Jakey were both quiet. After Hollys recent rage quit, Super Jakey didnt dare make another word. He felt awful and he was completely angry with himself. Being silent was his own personal punishment.

         Kyle, Holly said, holding her shotgun tight.

         Kyle sniffled desperately, calling Velouria once more. Ugh, w-what?

         Youve been calling her, like, 27 times. Arent you worried about your parents, too? Kyle was starting to sob, though not completely. Kyle, honey, whats wrong?

         Kyle was frantically waiting for an answer from Velouria. He was in no mood to talk to anyone, unless it was his girlfriend. The only sound Kyle made were gasps of anxiety and faint sobbing. After another thirty seconds of being on the phone no answer. Everyone could hear the voicemail from his phone. Thats when Kyle went on a slight rampage, slamming his phone on the concrete, yelling angrily. He turned and looked at the view of Kingzing City, looking at the distant Adoa Ships. He raised his hand in the air, flipping the bird intentionally towards the bad guys attacking the city.

         Hold this, Holly ordered, handing Super Jakey her shotgun and comforted Kyle. Kyle shoved her away with an angry grunt. Kyle, please. I know youre upset. The neighborhood is empty. Velouria said she would be home on this day anyway, remember? Shes probably with her family, out of this city, safe and sound. Im sure shes out there. And you can call her on Jakes phone, right Jake?

         Super Jakey took out his cell. It appeared to be severely damaged and unable to operate. That giant thing really got me good.

         Kyle started crying more, picking up his cell phone which he had thrown on the ground. W-why did I do that? Oh, God, Velouria Im so s-sorry.

         Holly knelt down beside him, rubbing his back gently. Kyle, I know its hard.

        

Chapter 22

 

         Shes my first girlfriend. Shes the only girl thats actually ever liked me, let alone think Im good looking.

         Super Jakey snickered. Holly looked at him angrily. Sorry! Thats just something that Zoolander would say. The good looking part, that is.

         Kyle sniffled, laughing weakly. Ha. Zoolander would say something like that.

         So, youre okay? Holly asked.

         Kyle stood up. Not really, but Im gonna consider what you said. Velouria did say she was home today. Shes probably all right. Although, we really should check her house. Holly, thank you.

         Holly smiled, giving her best friend a hug. Anything for you, love.

         At that moment, a sudden, new event had occurred. Blasts of alien ammunition struck the concrete, barely missing Kyle. There were two Adoa Bats hurdling toward them, with two more people running in front of them.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         It was Agents Nathan12 and Jon43 running from the Adoa.

         Run! Nathan yelled frantically, dodging the firepower. If you were as smart as I am, I would run like hell! Holly and Kyle began running, as Super Jakey and Evil Nacho stood in their place, even when lava bullets would strike them.

         Lets do this, buddy-boy, Super Jakey confidently declared, tossing Hollys shotgun aside. Evil Nacho roared with sheer evil, and leaped into the

Epic Congregation

 

         air, latching himself onto one of the Bats. As he did that, Super Jakey wielded both his elbows, shooting down the other Bat with his lasers. The ship crashed into the street before him, as Evil Nacho tore apart the other one thus landing into a nearby house. The ship exploded and the house caught fire.

         I was hoping to eat their faces off, Evil Nacho said with a cackle, as he approached Super Jakey.

         Yeah, that was a lot quicker than I thought. Anyone alright?

         Holly, Jon, Nathan, and Kyle were all standing in a distance behind them, catching their breath.

         A bit reckless, wouldnt you think? Jon replied.

         Hey! Super Jakey snapped. Theyve caused enough damage as is! Youre just jealous!

         Oh, who would be jealous of you? Holly laughed, picking up her shotgun.

         Super Jakey stuttered, for he was still a little frightened to talk to her. Uh, t-them?! Duh!

         Nathan took out his pistol, loading another magazine into it. Okay, can we all please pipe down? Jon and I just got out of the city. Those two ships followed once we passed the pier at the waterfront. For those who do not know, its hell down there. The city is theirs, now.

         So what do we do, then? Kyle asked. Just wait until they leave?

         They wont ever leave, Jon said. Theyre here for good. Theyre here to wipe us all out. Theyre also looking for something, or someone.

         Well, Holly stepping in, then who?

         Jon sighed deeply and pointed at Super Jakey. Its your powers, Super Jakey. They want them. Apparently, you stole what was theirs and they want it back. At first we thought they were also after two more known aliens, known as Preox and Rig. But nope! They just want you.

         B-but, what?! Super Jakey was more confused than ever. Then, it hit him, remembering back to when he first consumed the Misara Serum, all when he thought it was a simple energy drink called Boiling Blood. You mean these powers that I have, its theirs? Thats why theyre here?!

        

 

Chapter 22

 

            Basically, yeah, Nathan replied. Now theyre all just here to kill all of us, also. Apparently, they want to make Earth a new home. But, they want to start off with getting to you, first.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            So theres no way in negotiating with these space turds? Kyle asked frantically, though he was pretty sure he knew the answer. So, were basically screwed.

         I guess, Nathan replied.

         Super Jakey took a deep breath, tightening the ninja mask around his head. Alright, well Im not giving up this easily. And I think its time for me to go on a rant!

         Oh, jeez, not one of those, Kyle rolled his eyes.

         Super Jakey ignored him and continued. For years Ive been an ungrateful ignoramus. For years Ive been picking on the victims, Ive been nothing but a troublemaker, a player, a liar, a cheater and a loser. And now that things have literally gone to hell, within the past hour, this is no time to be an ungrateful ignoramus. However, I should never be an ungrateful ignoramus. Ever since I became Super Jakey, I forgot how important it was to have good friends, a good father, and a great life. Holly, I know you want to kick me in the balls as hard as you can, but I want to let you know how sorry

 

Epic Congregation

 

         I am. I mean it, from the very pit from where you want to kick me. Holly and I had sex last night and it was wonderful--.

         Oh, come on! Holly shouted, as everyone else started laughing. Evil Nacho was laughing the hardest, with nacho cheese drooling out of his nose. Jake, can you at least say we just went to dinner?!

         She aint denyin! Jon laughed.

         Shame, shame, know your name! Nathan laughed.

         Super Jakey shushed everyone. Okay! Okay, so its true that Holly and I totally did it and that it was totally awesome, but that doesnt disrupt the fact that I realized something that night. He looked over at Holly, she had her arms crossed and avoided eye contact. Spending time with Holly last night was probably one of the best times Ive ever had. There was her concert and Kyles play, of course, but knowing that Holly really likes, or liked, me made me feel how lucky I was. I have these superpowers, I have a job, I have a wonderful home to live in, and you might say thats lucky. Although, knowing that Holly actually wanted to spend time with me made me feel like the luckiest person in the world.

         Holly, youre seriously the hottest chick Ive ever seen. What I really like about you is that youre constantly independent and youre always on top of things (like me for instance, but thats beside the point.). What Im really trying to say is that when I was with you last night, all of that laughter, the good food, the good sex-making, it all made me realize how undeserving I am. I dont deserve you at all. Im a slime-ball who deserves to be put in a wood chipper, like that guy from Fargo.

         Holly, who was completely touched by what Super Jakey said, calmly replied with the middle finger. Yes, yes you do deserve that.

         Super Jakey nodded in agreement. Well thank you, Holly. Anyway, I want to prove myself worthy of you. Ive tried countless times before, with Kyle helping of course! And Kyle, Im sorry for everything. I dont know how many times Ive given you a black eye in the past, but I promise you it will never happen again.

         Kyle smiled and gave him a thumbs up. Super Jakey then finished with a determined conclusion. Now, I want to do this again, without screwing up, starting with protecting the people I care about. Its not about me, anymore!

Chapter 22

 

                       Its about us, all of us, forming together to fight back against what were standing up to. These alien dudes are really starting to piss me off. They killed my best friend, they almost killed these two agents here, they ruined Kyles play, and theyre destroying our home. Alright, buddies, lets go kick some alien ass! Lets rip em up to shreds and give them no mercy, until we have the city back!

         Im actually really pumped for this, Evil Nacho said with a grin.

         Holly ran at Super Jakey, kissing him full on the lips. Everyone gasped in surprise, except Evil Nacho. Holly parted lips with Jake, slapping him across the face. You are one lucky guy, you idiot.

         So whats the plan? Kyle asked. We cant just walk into the city and expect to not get obliterated. Remember, Jake, we can all die easily.

         Super Jakey thought for a bit. Well, we could go back to the Cheese and Crackers Supermarket, gear up as fast as possible, and make our way to the Dansko Bridge. We passed it, two miles out, and it seemed to be untouched.

         Sounds decent, Nathan replied. I could go for a machete and a bullet-proof vest, right about now. That is if bullet-proof vests can withstand these guys firepower.

         Super Jakey was as blunt as an atom bomb. Doubt it! Worth a try! Okay, guys, lets rock and roll!

        

Dansko Bridge. Status: Guarded by several Mazers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Epic Congregation

 

            The Dansko Bridge, which connects to and from the city, was inhabited by several Adoa Mazers. Their only objective, up until they were to find Super Jakey, was to keep the Dansko Bridge until the Elephant ships were to arrive. The Dansko Bridge was smothered with obliterated vehicles and even some dead bodies. It was a disturbing sight to see. However, since the Adoa had invaded the city, which was over the course of two hours now, it had been extremely calm. Citizens of the city were either dead, evacuated, or simply forced into hiding throughout the city.

         Two Mazers were walking along the Dansko Bridge, walking past a destroyed army tank, keeping an eye out for their surroundings. One Mazer, whose name was Ip, looked back at Kingzing City and gazed. Adoa ships were soaring around the city, like gentle birds. Some of the ships were firing their weapons upon buildings, as others were scavenging especially for searching Super Jakey. Ip looked back at the other Mazer he was paired with, whose name was Bee, and examined his body armor in a questionable motion.

         Whatre you looking at? Bee said.

         You look good, today, Bee, Ip replied almost immediately. I know thats a little creepy, but theres something about your appearance that makes you look spectacular.

         Flattered, yet concerned, Oh, thank you Ip. Yeah, I brushed my teeth today, they were turning yellow-colored. Too much coffee, you know what I mean?

         Ip nodded, keeping his rifle held tight as he felt his teeth. Yeah, I feel ya. I should have brushed mine, too. Jeez, ever since we arrived to this planet, my job has gotten so much easier.

         Right?! Bee agreed, he licked his teeth and moaned with satisfaction. These humans are as easy to shred as paper! The young ones are annoying when theyre dying, though, so I guess that can be the only downside to everything.

         Ip thought for a moment and casually nodded in agreement, with a slight chuckle. Then he thought some more, based on a different subject. Hmm, I wonder where Yayvox could be. He said he was invading on the   

 

Chapter 22

 

         other side of the bridge, near this city called Marsing. I wonder where he could be.

         Hes up your ass, bear face, came a familiar voice, a voice filled with confidence. It was Super Jakey who had defiantly insulted Ip. Kyle, Holly, Jon, and Nathan all approached them, aiming their rifles at their enemies. As for Evil Nacho, his adrenaline was fully prepared, similar to that of a loaded rifle. The humans were completely loaded with ammunition, also wearing bullet-proof vests and other protection gear. Super Jakey had no weapons. He only wore a bullet-proof vest, decorated with the custom writing of the initials S.J., with a small doodle of himself.    The Mazers growled, raising their hands in the air as a sign of surrender.

         You are aware that there are more of us at this bridges exit, do you not? Ip asked. Super Jakey and the others were standing at least five feet away from them, now. All of Zjoks troops are going to annihilate all of you, theres nothing you can do! Killing us will change nothing, it will never bring back the death toll we have given you! So go ahead, shoot me, Super Jerk! I dare you! Super Jakey was silent, but kept the tips of his elbows pointed directly at the two Mazers. Shoot us, you masked prick! You wanna know something? Meanwhile
