Chapter 22

 

lounge chair, with a concentrated expression on his face. He was ready to destroy anything in his path. He was ready to redeem himself from all of the humiliation of his past. He was ready to appease the Drokensmurs dying wish.

Weve only just begun, Zjok sang. So many roads to choose. A kiss for luck and were on our wayyyy.

I thought you hated The Carpenters, the Mazer said.

Well, I hate you too, but youre still alive right? Zjok snapped, keeping his eye on the front window of his massive ship. He sighed deeply. Im sorry, Nowndu. I should be nicer to you. Nicer than I was to Jorfb, especially. Now that Galg and Yayvox are dead, along with their many troops, Ive just been getting so angry, you know? Nowndu, is there anything you can do, as we descend into this planet?

Well, Nowndu thought for a bit, I do happen to be a shrink, Zjok sir.

Nowndu.

Yes sir?

You are now my new best friend. Mazer Pilots, full speed ahead! Once we arrive, activate the shields and use their power sources! Mazer Quilt! I want you to keep me updated on everything that happens down there! Got that, Quilt?!

Yes, Zjok, Quilt responded.

Good. And Vanish?! Where are you?!

Vanish appeared before Zjok, as fast as he could. Yes, Zjok sir?

Release the Probes. Then release the rest of the fleet, afterward.

Yes, sir. Vanish left the scene, as Zjok and Nowndu made their way out of the cockpit. Today will be the best victory of the Adoa, yet.


 

 

 

Chapter 23: Infinite Valor

        

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         Heroes of Kingzing City were here to save the day, at last. However, they werent welcome with cheerful chants and hugs. They were welcomed into Kingzing City with tragic upsets. A massive portion of the city was heavily damaged. Some smaller buildings were ready to collapse any minute, as some others were heavily damaged and partially in flames.

         Vehicles were flipped over, roads were beaten and cracked, and many citizens were either seriously injured or dead. Many citizens of the city were unfortunate to escape the Adoas clutches. Most of them were able to flee because they were on the other side of the Dansko Bridge. The civilians directly inside the city, however, faced a deadly struggle, especially with army forces who desperately tried to get rid of the enemy. There were some deceased Adoa, although it wasnt enough for everyone to call it a sheer victory. People were hurt, hiding, dead, or completely out of their minds. The current death toll was 36 and things were not looking good at all. There were

 

Chapter 23

 

         several Adoa Bats and human a military jets which have crash-landed into buildings or in the middle of the street. In better terms, Kingzing City was an absolute mess and only a small portion of the Adoa was responsible. A couple tanks had rolled in, armed police forces patrolled the streets, trying to keep everything under control. Paramedics, doctors, firefighters have all rushed out to help the wounded and clear the dead.

         Once the Asid ship had landed, followed by immense confusion from the concerned victims of the most recent attack, Preox, Rig, and all the others made their way out to help the ones who needed it. A child looked up at Kriket, he was at least six, while she was tending his broken wrist. He sniffled with sorrow. I-Is Mommy going to be okay?

         Shes going to be just fine, Kriket replied with a smile. Her arm is just broken, is all. Ill take you to her after Im finished with this cast. Ive never worked with these medical tools before. Theyre a little tricky.

         Youre very pwetty, the boy said affectionately, sucking his thumb. Krikets cheeks blushed faintly, as she laughed. Her face was slightly scratched and her hair slightly messy.

         Oh thank you, kid. There, all done, I think. Does that feel better?

         The little boy gazed into Krikets eyes, not taking one glance at his broken wrist. Much bettuh. Kriket smiled and carried the boy across the street, which was filled with people being taken care of. Kriket took the boy to his mother, who was happy to see that he was okay, and thanked Kriket. Kriket found it amusing to some of the humans take hardly any notice of her appearance at all. She felt as if she was a part of them, the humans. Although she wasnt, Kriket was thankful, yet surprised, that no one has made a racist comment towards her. Racial slurs such as, Hey, greenie or bug eyes. Kriket found Drox, who was sitting on the curb and talking to a marine.

         Yeah, I guess, Drox said, as he was in the middle of a conversation with a marine by the name of AJ.

         Crazy all this happened, AJ said, with a slightly nervous chuckle. One day Im shopping with my girl, the next Im shooting down alien-bear-things. Glad you guys are here, especially Super Jakey. He can really sucker-

 

 

Infinite Valor

 

         punch those ugly dudes. Also crazy that the Nacho Dude is helping you guys, too! Jeez, so much is goin on, man.

         I hear ya, Drox laughed. Im still a regular Asid soldier. Im not even a Private, yet, and Ive seen enough for an Admiral to see. Oh hey, Kriket.

         Damn, is that what all your women look like? AJ asked, catching a few kinky glimpses of Kriket.

         Oh shush, she laughed, beginning to blush again. Hey, Drox, we should go meet up with Preox. He has a plan for all of us to take part of.

         Alright cool, the Asid replied, where at?

         Some place called The Dookoran?

 

         This is where we had our first date, Super Jakey said happily, as he, Holly, and Kyle walked into the recently abandoned fancy restaurant, The Dookoran. Captain Derno, Nathan, Jon, Bxir, and all the others were present in the restaurant, all sitting along a massive dinner table. Rig was playing with is lightning antennae, like a cat, as usual.

         Hehehe! Let me catch you!

         Rig, now its not the time! Preox shouted hoarsely, throat gaining soreness. Good. Everyone actually showed up to this meeting. However, I must be absolutely sure. Raise your hand when you hear your name called. Super Jakey, Holly, Kyle, Nathan, Jon, Clarke, Drox, Bxir, Rig, Kriket, Zitkir, and Derno?

         Everyone had raised their hand, except for Rig, of course. Before Preox could continue with his formulated plans on how to deal with the Adoa, a random waitress walked on by. Would any of you guys like any drinks? You guys sure do look pretty busy!

         Excuse me? Preox said, confused as hell. Who are you?!

         Im Kayla! Kayla said happily. Im your waitress for today!

         You do realize that your city is under extreme martial law, right?!

         Kayla laughed and laughed, Rig laughing with her. Haha! Yeah, I know!

         I could go for some wine, actually, Nathan said, Preox gasping in anger.

        

Chapter 23

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            Oh, jeez, Admiral Bxir scoffed, yall need uh real drink! Apple juice, please? Kayla, the waitress, giggled happily as she jotted down their beverage requests.

         Is that all? she asked pleasantly.

         Ill have a water, Holly said.

         CHOCOLATE MILK! Rig shouted. Preox, fueled with anger, set his head on the table, waiting for everyone else to order their drinks.

         And what about you, sir? Kayla asked Preox.

         Ugh! Ill have an iced tea.

         Alright! Ill be right with those! You can get back to your clubhouse meeting.

         Kayla had begun walking away from the group, with Preox shouting back at her. Hey! This isnt a clubhouse meeting! Preox sighed deeply, once realizing that everyones attention towards him was now regained. Anyway, without any further distractions, I have devised a carefully formulated plan to wipe out the oncoming Adoa fleet. Luckily for us, and according to Admiral Bxir, we are not facing the entire Adoa Army of the Planet Fleek. If that were the case, we would be ultimately diminished and this planet would be lost. However, that doesnt beat the case that Zjok and his army branch is extremely dangerous.

        

Infinite Valor

        

         Zjoks fleet consists of a massive number of fighters, drop ships, and three grand mother ships. Thanks to those who were ultimately captured by Zjok and his team, moments ago, the ex-prisoners were able to gain more information as to how these mother ships (or Elephants) are structured to maintain its stability. All three Elephants are at least the height of your typical skyscraper, about half the length of a football field, with a width of fifty meters. They are big, highly dangerous, and can cause critical damage.

         Preox continued with the talking, along with a few extra details from Admiral Bxir himself. Super Jakey, whom of which was actually giving attentive notice, wanted to ask Preox more about the Misara Serum, how exactly it ended up on Earth, and why Zjok was being such a jerk-face. Preox answered all of his questions, without having the strain to interrupt him with all of them. In the middle of his discussion, Preox couldnt help but blame himself for losing the Misara Serum.

         Im sorry, all of you.

         Kriket rested her hand on his armored shoulder. You did what you could, Preoxy-poo.     

         I could have done better. I shouldnt have left you guys on planet Strom. I didnt even know how to control a light-speed ship, in the first place.

         HA! You admit it! Rig shouted, pointing his finger.

         Shut up! Rrrgh, enough with the apologies, however, I must get down to the real jist of things. I suggest that we split into three groups. We need three team captains, three of which that should have unique abilities in shredding the Adoa apart. Captains who are able to guide each group to make this plan run smoothly. The three team Captains, chosen by Admiral Bxir is Admiral Bxir himself, me, and Holly. Everyone clapped, happily, which wasnt what Preox expected. Okay, okay, everyone please stop. My head hurts, as is.

         W-why me? Holly asked. She understood perfectly as to why Admiral Bxir and Preox were named off as team Captains, though she didnt understand why they chose her as a third.

         Yew are extremely smart, from what Ive seen. Not only that, youre

 

Chapter 23

 

            also extremely intimidatin and over-powerin. I believe yew would be a powerful team Capn, indeedly!

         Super Jakey couldnt help but feel slightly jealous of Hollys new promotion. Why arent I a team Captain? Ive always had these powers. Super Jakey thought that these Asids really needed him to fight. Now that Holly had super-powers, even when she could kick some major ass without them, they seemed to turn their heads more towards her. He didnt blame them, however. Holly had a stronger, smarter mindset than Super Jakey. In fact, Holly was just about stronger and smarter than anyone else he ever knew! In conclusion, it didnt surprise Super Jakey that Holly was chosen for this specific duty, especially since she had ridiculous Flower Power, which she had received when her and Jake were having sexual intercourse, the other night. However, Super Jakey still wished he was Captain, just like the good old days when he was in Varsity baseball.

         As Preox continued talking, Holly took Super Jakeys hand and held it tenderly. He began to blush like crazy, once his fingers were wrapped around hers. Okayyy, what?

         Jake? Super Jakey heard a voice inside his head. It was not his, nor was it a voice from outside his mind. It was Hollys voice, speaking into his brain! Super Jakey looked at her, lips werent moving, nor were her eyes focused on him. He was seriously starting to freak out.

         Um...Hellooo?

         Hi.

         Ahhh, stop!

         Stop what? Jake! Its me! Its Holly! I think I can read your thoughts, if I hold your hand.

         They both looked at each other, raising eye-brows.

         Super Jakey, Holly, Preox said, nows not the time to be sharing eye-brow expressions with one another!

         The two of them giggled in their thoughts, Holly squeezing on Super Jakeys hand gently. Tiny white daisies began to bloom on her fingers, as a sign of affection.

         Jeez, I really did a number on ya last night, huh?

         Yeah! Holly replied in her thoughts. Thanks for the super powers, dude.

Infinite Valor

 

 

 

 


        

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         I was talking about the sex, in general, Super Jakey thought.

         Oh. Yeah. Ha.

         Holly could read minds by holding someones hand, as part of her superpowers, granted by the Drokensmur, and by Super Jakey himself, of course.

         You look beautiful, Jake thought.

         What?!

         I think youre beautiful. The most beautiful girl Ive ever seen. This morning, when I was woken up by you tossing a pillow at me, that was one of the happiest moments of my life.

         Holly turned and looked at him. The hell? Why cant you tell me this, other than in my thoughts?

         Super Jakey looked back at her, shrugging. Cause Id look like a pansy. Plus, its the thought that counts, right?

         Holly shrugged. I dont like the first part of your answer, but the second one was pretty sweet of you to say. Im going to make out with you in front of everyone, now.

         Super Jakey reacted hesitantly. What? Jeez! First ulterior motives and now mixed signals?!

 

 

Chapter 23

 

         I know right? Holly pulled Super Jakey towards her, planting her lips on his. Everyone around them pretended to ignore it, as they continued to listen to Preoxs constant babbling. Moosey couldnt help but stare, of course. Preox was just about to get to the final section of his ideas, until he immediately react to the sight of Super Jakey and Holly kissing.

         Oh, yes! Just make out in front of everyone, while were all under a pandemic of mass proportions!! Could you please stop?! Their lips parted and everyone was quiet. Super Jakey, Holly, and Kyle found it funny that Preox was always so moody. They knew that he was going to have a problem with them, but it was completely worth the laughs. Now then, before any more distractions arise, I would like to conclude--.

         I got your drinks, guys! came in Kayla, the waitress, holding a platter full of beverages. Preox drank his iced tea in the most casual manner, possible, trying his best not to rage quit.

         Oh Preox, stop it, Kriket said. Well be fine.

         Oh yeah? Well lets hope so! Lets also hope that the human military can get everyone out of the city, in time. The Adoas main focus, as of now, is on all of us, including those who have obtained the Misara Serum. Zjok will never stop to get his hands on Rig, Super Jakey, or even Holly! We must stop him, at all costs!

         We know, we know, Kriket said, kissing Preoxs cheek. Just have patience, alright?

         Ugh, fine.

         Everyone was enjoying their beverages, until a massive booming noise rang through the restaurant. The ground shook faintly, which startled many of those sitting at the dining table. Kayla, the waitress, looked terrified. She made a bunch of goofy, outrageous faces, as she screamed at the top of her lungs, and ran out the door frantically.

         Oh, man, Zitkir said, thats them. Theyre here.

         Moosey shrieked like a little girl, taking out his pistol. I-I think Im ready! Wait, whats the plan for the three t-teams, Pr-Preox?!

         I wouldve have gotten to that a long time ago, if there werent so many distractions!! Preox snapped.

        

Infinite Valor

 

         Another booming, muffled, sound came from outside the restaurant. Everything became extremely tense. Zjok and his whole Adoa fleet was here, at last.

         Then get on with it, now! everyone shouted, hesitantly. Preox jolted backward from his seat and finally revealed his plan.

         Just then, another distraction had occurred. The loud, obnoxious sound from Krikets Vambit was blaring loudly. Someone had hacked into her Vambit, once again. Oh no! The turrets inside her Vambit wielded out, aiming at everyone. Super Jakey pointed his elbows at her, standing up. Oh God, its not me, I swear!

         Jake, sit down! Holly ordered.

         But shes gonna shoot us!

         Or its gonna shoot us, Preox corrected, standing behind Krikets Vambit cautiously, trying to configure the hacking to cease. Someone is attempting to hack into Krikets Vambit, again.

         I thought you fixed that! Kriket shouted, simply horrified. Moosey hid under the table, as everyone else remained calm. Kyle was sweating horribly. He was in no mood for dying, today. Preox managed to shut off the hacking of the auto turrets, but not the transmission circuit. A holo-graphic face of an Adoa Striker appeared from Krikets Vambit. The Striker laughed manically.

         Hello, losers! Oh shoot, you turned off the turrets! Curse you, whoever did that! Anyway, other than blasting you all to bits, like my first plan was, Id like to introduce myself. I am Uug, an Adoa Striker. A few Mazers and I are here in this Monkey place and we are holding several humans hostage! HA! To make things easier, Id like you to either bring Rig or Super Jakey to us! It will make this invasion run smoothly! If you comply, we will let your humans live. We even have a pretty little girl here, shes so cute!

         Kyles heart sunk. W-whats the girls name?

         Uh, Verlina, or something like that.

         Kyle yelled at the top of his lungs, climbing over the table. Thats my Velouria!! GIVE HER BACK, YOU INSIGNIFICANT BEAR! Holly and Super Jakey pulled him back and Kyle started crying.

         HA! Uug laughed. You cant hurt me! Im a holo-gram, dummy!

Chapter 23

           

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Dont worry, Kyle, well rip all of his teeth out, Holly promised.

         Oh?! Uug exclaimed. Is that a threat, bimbo?!

         Holly looked at Uug, smiling faintly. Excuse me, asshole, but did you know I was the one who killed your friend, Galg? Uug roared angrily. Yep, I fried his brains into ashes.

         I saw it, myself! Moosey shouted. Everyone shushed him.

         Uug growled ferociously. Be here! Or everyone dies! The holo-gram switched off, thanks to Preoxs configuration.

         Okay Kriket, your Vambit should be fine. I double-double-checked, this time. Anyway! Theres been a slight shift in the plan, now that we know that these hostages are taken. Heres what we do! And dont cry, Kyle, for the love of God, well save your girlfriend. Kriket, Drox, Moosey, Kyle, and I will go to the Monkey place, wherever the hell that is.

         The Funky Munkey Caf! Holly shouted. Its on 73rd Avenue and Marie Street. Its a two-mile journey.

         Good, thank you Holly, Preox nodded. As for the other teams, you will all focus on taking down the first two Elephants. Its going to get rough, so dont expect this to be a piece of cake. When Adoa Elephants invade, they seek for the most energetic area in the invasion region. They extract their victims energy to keep their shields long lasting and to keep their war-guns    

 

Infinite Valor

        

         efficiently charged. Holly, Nathan, Jon, Clarke, and Rig, you will focus on one Elephant. Bxir, Derno, Zitkir, and Super Jakey are to focus on another. While youre out there, try your best to regroup with as many troops as possible, youre going to need it. Adoa is nothing but a bunch of scatter brains with hardly any infantry strategy, so its going to get messy! Another obnoxious-booming noise echoed from outside. This time it sounded a lot like thunder.

         Alrigh! Bxir announced, getting up from his chair. Yew heard tha lady! Lets move it, before them retards all land into tha city! We gots tah move, quick! Git into yer groups and lets go, go, go!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Military trucks, battleships, airplanes, jets, and tanks were leaving and entering the city. All were either evacuating civilians or getting prepared for any other possible attacks. Kingzing City was under human military siege, though would not stand a chance against the Adoa. If it werent for the main heroes of the story, the story would absolutely be different. Military soldiers looked up at the sky, the clouds were dark with flashes of purple lightning. They all gazed hopelessly at the sky, as Zjoks Elephants descended from the dark clouds, creating deadly flashes of lighting from their front war-guns.

The Elephants descended separately around the city, as hundreds of Mohawks and thousands of Bats hurdled downward. It would have to take lots of power to take down a fleet as massive as this. It would take an infinite amount of non-stop valor to end Zjoks reign of tyranny, once and for all.

Chapter 23

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Zjok looked out a window in one of the long corridors of his Elephant ship. He eyed on Kingzing City for the longest time, until Nowndu approached him.

         Are you feeling better, sir?

         Zjok was quiet, his face expression deep anger. Im fine, Nowndu. Its just interesting to be here. Preox could be down there, on Earth. He laughed gently, gazing at his fleet of ships descending into the city. I havent spoken to him in years, not since before I massacred a whole Council in the AKBHE. Its interesting to have all of that nostalgia approaching me all at once. Whats more interesting is that Ive never been on this planet and yet I can call it a place that deserves to be punished. I will make this possible, not only for the dying wish of the Drokensmur, but for myself. Its time I showed this planet, these pathetic humans, who theyre really dealing with. No more being ridiculed, no more HUMILATION! He thrust his fist against the massive window, cracking it slightly. He grinned and laughed some more, scaring Nowndu.

         I hope everyone is ready. This is just another, regular invasion. However, I sure do hope all of my Mazers and Strikers are ready for quite a challenge. Super Jakey or that Nacho Freak will be easy to kill. We will get what we want, what I want. Nowndu, get ready for this ship to station itself to

 

Infinite Valor

 

         their main power plant. We will be extracting their electricity from there. The other mother ships will be stationed in the small island close to the city and above that obnoxiously tall building in the middle of the city, itself.

         I think that building is actually called the Obnoxious Tower, sir. Its the tallest building in the city.

         Oh is it, now? Hmm, well, thats pretty cool. Too bad we have to destroy it. Anyway, I want you to adjust the lightning cannons to full throttle, spread the word.

         Nowndu reacted innocently. Im the new Chieftain, sir?

         Zjok nodded. Now go, before I kill you. If anything gets catastrophic in my eyes, I will notify you to release the Neeka.

         Nowndu gulped. Are you sure you want to do that? I mean, the Neeka is a powerful, powerful creature.

         Oh yes. Im sure of it and the Neeka will be released, if the time has come, of course. Super Jakey will not save the day, I can assure you.

         Nowndu was terrified, not just about the Neeka, but he was frightened of Zjoks daring decision on bringing it into battle in the first place!

 

         Everyone said their farewells at The Dookoran. It wasnt a classic May-the-Force-Be-With-You Farewell, their good-byes were shorter although they still had some emotion carried throughout.

         Kick their teeth in, buddies. Good luck, Super Jakey said to Holly and Kyle, hugging them both.

         Ditto! Holly and Kyle hollered. Moosey and Nathan said goodbye, in the hopes of chewing more bubble gum together, if they finish. Preox and Kriket said goodbye to Admiral Bxir and Envoy Zitkir, just before they had all split into their groups.

         Keep us posted and good luck, Magnate, Bxir said.

         Will do, Preox responded with a nod. He turned to Kriket, looking into her eyes, Lets go, sweet thing. Kriket began blushing uncontrollably.

         Aww, thats so cute! Rig shouted happily, hugging Preox from behind. Preox didnt even bother to deal with him, he just let Rig have his moment.

         Ill see you soon, Rig, you insignificant oaf.

Chapter 23

 

         Preox, Kriket, and Drox, activated the jet-packs on their Vambits and took off into the air, making their way to the Funky Munkey Caf. As for the rest of their group, Kyle and Moosey, Moosey offered a moose ride, knowing the fact they couldnt fly at all. Kyle looked up at the sky, as he got onto Mooseys furry back, seeing the immense amount of Adoa ships closing in on the city. He kept his rifle close, keeping it on safety, and wrapped around his torso. You sure this is okay, moose?

         Moosey laughed. Of course, pal! Ive given plenty of moose rides! Youre about as weightless as a patch of cloth, so Ill be fine!

         Not sure whether to take that as a compliment

         Kyle found it somewhat awkward that he was getting a ride from a talking moose, wearing a professional outfit. In fact, he found it almost completely ridiculous. Considering the position he was in, Kyle wasnt sure whether to feel frightened or to laugh his ass off. The two emotions did not mix well. Moosey took off on his four legs, running as fast as he could through the city. He tried his best to keep up the pace with the three Asids he was meeting at the Funky Munkey Caf, although he didnt worry about it too much because Kyle knew exactly where the coffee shop was located. The sound of thunder, erupting from the Elephants lightning cannons, grew louder as the massive amount of Adoa ships drew closer. Kyle gripped his rifle tightly, ready for any hostility to approach.

         I wont be able to fight while running! Moosey shouted, as they ran through the other side of the city. They took a slight detour, other than the Dansko Bridge. If you see any bad guys, shoot them!!

         What a coach you are!

         Hey! Watch it, Sammy Sarcasm!

         Kyle started laughing, for the first time in hours. He had a good time laughing, until he saw one of the Elephants appearing from out of the massive clouds. His jaw dropped. DUDE! WHAT THE HELL IS THAT?!

         Moosey looked up and he was close to whimpering, like a sad puppy. VERY, VERY BAD THING! Right at that precise moment of disturbing discovery, purple lightning shot out of the Elephants cannon, striking the ground in scattered directions, striking houses, trees, and ultimately destroying anything it touched. The lightning was also striking the concrete,         

Infinite Valor

 

         close to Moosey and Kyle. They screamed frantically, as Moosey tried his best to avoid getting blown up.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         A rod of powerful lightning struck a few yards from Moosey, the explosion spewing dirt in his face. Eew! Dirt! Yucky!

         First world problems! Kyle shrieked in sarcasm, holding onto Moosey, as tight as he could. Okay, were drawing near the Funky Munkey Caf, do you see Preox and the others?!

         NO! Moosey replied. He was beginning to really freak out.

         Kyle grunted angrily, he was really worried about Velouria. The thought of her getting viciously murdered by a clan of ugly alien beings from outer space, poisoned his brain into complete rage. Then, they must be in there, already!

         You dont know that! Moosey yelled. A massive rod of lightning struck the ground from behind them. Moosey and Kyle were getting very scared, now.

         I-I dont care! I have to save Velouria! Whether the Asids are there or not, were crashing through the big window of the Caf!

         ARE YOU TITTING ME?! HELL NO! WERE STICKING TO THE PLAN!

         What plan?! Preox didnt exactly elaborate what we had to do when we got there! He was too rushed to get into it!

Chapter 23

 

            Moosey laughed. Ha! Thats what she said! Oh, Kyle, I dont know! Im really scared!

         Kyle spat, as they dodged more strikes of lightning. Dont be scared, Moosey! I know, all of this warfare is scary as hell, Im scared too, but that should never tell you to stand down! Moosey, youre an awesome agent. I know we just met, but I can tell you work hard in what you do and that you would do anything for your career, even if it risked your life!

         I am a hard worker! Moosey agreed.

         And youre a freakin Moose! Moose are the most violent, most brutal, most badass wildlife there is! You can ram those aliens to death! Moosey, dont doubt yourself they were approaching straight towards the Funky Munkey Caf dont let your fears conquer your mindset! Moosey, were almost there, you got this!

         I GOT THIS! AGGGGHHHH!

         A few Mazers, who were guarding the entrance, were completely thrown off guard by the sight of Moosey and Kyle. Kyle aimed his rifle, as Moosey ran faster, and opened fire. AGGGHHHHH!! Bullets pierced through the Mazers skulls, killing them all instantly, as Mooseys horns shattered the glass of the massive Caf. Glass shattered all over the floor, sprinkling on the Mazers and hostages inside. Before Kyle and Moosey knew it, they had their guns raised and pointed at the bad guys surrounding them. Mazers squealed, aiming their Adoa rifles at the two. Kyle had his gun aimed at Uug, the Striker he had seen through Krikets Vambit before.

         LET THESE PEOPLE GO, NOW! Kyle was not only scared, but insanely pissed. Moosey was also in a moose rage, as he pointed his pistol at a standing Mazer. There were at least two other Mazers and just one Striker. There were only a few hostages, hostages including Velouria and even Jakes father. Their faces were beaten, scratched, and their clothes were torn. They all laid flat on the Cafs concrete floor. The Asids were also nowhere to be seen, but that didnt bother Kyle one bit.

         Uug looked down at Kyle, who was standing at least ten feet over his tiny head. I was going to have my lunch break. However, now that youre here, I guess thatll have to wait. Do you have what we want? Surrender Super Jakey. Surrender him and we will let these primates leave.

Infinite Valor

 

         Kyle looked over at Velouria, who was weakly lifting her head, looking back at him. She shook her head no at him, as she had looked like she was crying. Kyle gave Uug an angry look. You liar. Im ending this, now.

         Whoa, whoa, easy there buzzard, Uug laughed. The Striker tapped a few buttons on his armor and several blue lights were illuminated throughout the Funky Munkeys interior. You shoot me dead, the whole place explodes! The sound of thunder and lightning obstructing the city was overheard, as Uug gave his little speech. Once I am dead, the bio signature implanted in my armor will know, sending the message of activation to each one of these blue-illuminated bombs, which you see along these walls.

         Kyle sighed deeply, lowering his weapon. Fine, whatever. Moosey, lower your gun.

         Moosey growled angrily, setting his weapon on the ground.

         Uug gasped. Youre the little turd who tried to grab at me through that holo-gram, earlier! Oh, wow! This is rich! Hahahaha! I wonder if oh you were, or still are, angry about something other than us keeping this hostages, arent you? You mentioned someones name. A hostages name.

         No I didnt, Kyle lied.

         Yes you did!

         No I did not, sir.

         YES YOU DID! YOURE THE ONE WHOS LYING! Uug roared angrily. The Striker detached a section of armor from his side, unfolding it into a massive Striker beam gun. Mooseys eyes widened, as did Kyles and the poor hostages. The other two Mazers focused their crosshairs on the hostages, as Uug focused his beam rifle on them, also. Who was it that you mentioned in our minor conversation?! Tell me now, or I will kill all of you and the deal for handing over Super Jakey will be no more!

         The massive beam rifles barrel, about the diameter of a log, was just inches from Kyles face. Kyle was too afraid to blink. He was afraid that if he blinked, it would be the last time he ever did blink. Then, before he could answer Uug, Velouria herself did.

         H-here, she stuttered, laying down on the cold hard floor. She was breathing heavily, praying that Uug wouldnt stomp on her petite body.

         Uug laughed once more, turning back at Velouria.

Chapter 23

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            Uug, with an ugly expression of which he himself found attractive, turned back to Kyle. Looks like I can have my lunch break, after all! Uug started walking towards Velouria. Dont worry, sweetheart, Ill try to make this as painful as possible. Uug opened his gaping mouth, he was going to eat Velouria. She was too petrified to get up and run, although if she had done so, she would be dead just as easily.

         DONT YOU LAY A FAT, FURRY FINGER ON HER!! Kyle shouted. He wanted to run at the Striker, but the Mazers kept him in check. If Kyle, Moosey, or any of hostages, dared to move at this point, the two Mazers would blast them to bits. Velouria started crying as Uug drew closer and closer, close enough to where she could smell Uugs ugly breath. All hope was lost when the three Asids burst into the scene, through the broken window. Kriket and Drox focused on the two Mazers, Preox kept his focus on Uug.

         Step back from the lady, fatty, Preox demanded.

         Uug immediately turned around, aiming his massive beam gun at Preox. Well! If it isnt Preox! The last time I saw you was the planet Strom!

         Enough chit chat, bonehead, give us the girl and the other hostages, now. Do it before I blow your brains out.

         Uug laughed manically. Oh, Zjok would love your attitude! In fact, he thinks youre dead! I better give him a call, now.

 

Infinite Valor

 

         Dont you dare, Preox ordered. If you so as contact that hypocritical monster, your head will explode.

         You tell em, Preox! Drox said happily. He had always looked up to Preox as some sort of role model.

         Oh? Uug playing stupid. Oh, Preox, youre digging your own grave and your friends. If I die, these bombs will go--.

         Preox had shot him dead in the mouth, which happened to be a Strikers primary weakness. A Strikers thick skin and fur was the equivalent to that of typical body armor, though a straight shot in the mouth would splice a Strikers brain no matter what.

         It all happened so quickly. While Uug was falling to the ground, dead, Kriket and Drox shot down the two Mazers, before they could even react to their leaders death. An obnoxious siren blared throughout the interior of the Funky Munkey Caf, indicating that the bombs Uug had set were about to ignite. Preox told everyone, including his team, to run like hell. Kyle ran for Velouria, slightly climbing over Uugs massive dead body. Preox was yelling at him to move quickly, as the sirens blared louder and louder. Kyle picked up Velouria in his arms, knowing the fact she was too heavy for his thin biceps to carry, and ran as fast as he could. Velourias leg was seriously injured and he face was beaten harshly. He had made it out of the Caf, along with the others, or so they thought, of course. Jared Smithy was the last to make it out of there, running as fast as he could with the others. Moosey was giving the hostages a moose ride, as Preox and Kriket made sure that the others were okay. They were all able to make it to the next block, before a deafening and blinding explosion erupted, from where the Caf once stood. Brick, chunks of concrete, and large amounts of flaming dirt and wood were sent flying into the air and landing heavily on the ground. The explosion made everyone collapse, temporarily hurting themselves. Preox coughed up some dirt, realizing that his bottom lip was bleeding. Ow, that could have gone smoother. The Funky Munkey Caf was completely destroyed to crumbles of debris.

         Kriket weakly got up on her feet and immediately began aiding the people they had saved. Preox, I would like to say that was a stupid move you made, but it was really the only thing that could be done.

Chapter 23

 

            They were gonna kill us, either way, Jared stepped in. Hi, Im Jared Smithy.

         Preox felt dubious when he shook Jareds hand. It was a bit off-putting, yet somewhat pleasant. He wasnt staring at Preox like any human being would, if he or she were to actually see an alien from outer space, face-to-face. Im Preox, the Asid, Preox replied, with a side dish of sarcasm. Is everyone okay? Anyone hurt?! Adoa Bats and Mohawks were seen flying by. Preox was seriously hoping that the explosion wasnt the reason why they were flying so close to their position. Alright, we all have to get you out of the city, now! Theres a military check-point at your waterfront pier, they will take you from the city, along with other civilians, on their cruisers.

         Kyle had sat Velouria up, who screamed in pain, sitting her on a curb next to the street. She had been shot in the thigh, moments before he and Moosey had come to save her. Preox, you should have told us where and when exactly where to meet before all of this happened!!

         Dont start with me, human! Preox snapped back. Im sorry were late! But just because we were, doesnt give you the permission to just jump right into things! You and that moose could have been killed over there! Thankfully, the Adoa were stupid enough to not shoot you when they had the chance. Preox was right and that really bothered Kyle. Kyle was just trying to save his girlfriend from suffering a horrible fate. Kriket came beside Velouria, tore a massive patch of her jeans and started tending her thigh. She was shot by a lava bullet, leaving a brutal and gaping wound. Smoke was still rising from the wound and it was burning her. Kriket took off her Vambit, took out a glass vile of alcohol and dabbed a few drops on Velourias wound. Velouria screamed, crying her eyes out.

         Kyle, Im gonna need you to stand back, please, Kriket said calmly, as she was working her. Dont worry, sweetheart, this will only sting for only a minute. I promise, the pain will go away, once I take the bullet out.

         N-no, please, Velouria begged. Kyle stood by, trembling in tears. He didnt like to see Velouria like this. Kriket was taking out an exotic tool, of what seemed to be a massive syringe. The syringe looked about as familiar as the syringes used for Zjoks Steamy Vampire B-105, though a lot smaller.

        

Infinite Valor

 

         Sweetie, I promise the pain will go away once I inject the wound with this needle. The bullet is still pouring lava inside your thigh and within the next minute or so, you could lose your entire leg, if not more.

         I-it hurts, Velouria cried.

         Just do it, Kriket! Preox demanded. This isnt a medical lesson, we got to move!

         Youre the one who decided to go out and save these hostages! Kriket shouted right back. So shut up and let me work at my own pace!

         Preox was silent. Moosey snickered at him, as he helped some of the get back on their feet.

         Okay, Velouria, this is probably going to hurt a lot worse, Kriket said, as subtle as she could be. She didnt want to lie to her patients, anyway. Just close your eyes and I will be numbing the pain before you know it. The syringe is going to disintegrate the bullet and suck in all of the harmful material thats not welcome inside your body. You ready? Just try to be perfectly still.

         Kyle, get over here, please, Velouria requested. Kyle knelt beside her, holding her hand tightly.

         Kriket held the syringe firmly, counted from three, and aggressively slammed the syringe into the bullet wound. A gut-wrenching, ongoing shriek came from Velourias voice box, causing searing pain to Kyles ear and hand, as she squeezed is tightly.

 

 

 



Chapter 23

 

            The syringe made the noise of an alarm clock, along with a robotic voice shouting SUCK IT! and Kriket immediately did the job. The bullets remains were sucked into the syringe, along with a small portion of unwanted magma. Once the syringe was full, Kriket took it out of the wound, set it aside and rubbed more alcohol on the wound. The screaming wouldnt stop, until Kriket took out another glass vile, pouring a few drops on Velourias boo-boo. Velouria immediately started to calm down at last, as Kriket hastily wrapped a plastic bandage around her thigh.

         Are you okay? Kyle asked, quietly. Velouria nodded, kissing Kyles hand.

         Thank you, Kriket, Velouria smiled brightly. Kriket smiled back.

         Kyle slowly helped Velouria back on her feet. She could no longer feel the pain, thanks to the numbing, although she still had trouble walking.

         You should be able to walk normally soon, Kriket informed. The Asid woman looked around her, checking if anyone else was suffering any pain similar to Velourias. Everyone else was either scratched or slightly beaten. They were more than okay to move on, which was great for the heroes because they had to move quickly. Everything seemed to be in perfect check, until Kriket realized that someone was missing from the group. Preox, wheres Drox?

         Chills ran up his alien spine. Preox had not realized that Drox was nowhere to be seen. The others took it as a surprised also.

         Is that him? Jared asked, pointing in the direction to the other side of the road. Kriket gasped horrifyingly, seeing Drox laying there on the sidewalk.

         DROX?! Kriket hollered running frantically to Drox. He wasnt moving, his body was covered in neon-pink blood, and he certainly did not reply to Krikets calling. The others followed her, approaching to Droxs side, who lay face up on the concrete. His eyes were squinted and blood was pouring from his mouth.

         No, was that Preox could say, when Kriket got down on her knees and shook Drox aggressively.

         The explosion, Kriket sobbed, after checking the Asids pulse. Drox was gone from blood loss, broken bones, as well as any other critical and         

Infinite Valor

 

         and internal injuries. Droxs blood was also sprayed out on the street, indicating that he was sent flying from the recent explosion, which lead to the Funky Munkey Cafs demolition.

Preox took a piece of Droxs destroyed Vambit, which was crushed on impact of the explosion. They didnt know what else to do with the body, because the Adoa was already here and that would only slow them down. Preox set Droxs body in an upright posture, sitting up against a building nearby. Now, it appeared that Drox was only resting. Preox tapped the transmission button on his armor and spoke. Admiral Bxir, this is Magnate Preox, we have saved the hostages. Were making our way to take them to safety. Drox is down, he was taken out by an explosion set by an Adoa Striker.   

         Damn, Bxir said, for thats all he could really say about Droxs death. Im just here with Super Jakey, Derno, and Zitkir. Wes waitin on where our Elephant is gon be stationed for creatin their shield generators. We have reinforcements, also. I suggest you find some, yerself, the Adoa aint gon play easy.

         Zjok was always serious, so it doesnt surprise me. Ill update the rest of our group and Im not sure what were going to do about Zjoks Elephant, since the plan is practically taking care of two Elephants and remaining civilians.

         Well play it by year, Bxir stated and the transmission ended. Preox loaded his rifle and turned to the rest of his team.

         Alright, we gotta get you civilians with the army. Battleships and a carrier have made it to the citys waterfront. They will take you away from the city there. However, I am afraid that well be running into more obstacles than we have, before.

         One of the civilians, whose name was Zeke, spoke out. Well this isnt as simple as fishing, thats for sure. Do you guys have anything to defend ourselves with? Kriket and Preox gave Zeke and Jared their Asid combat pistols. Velouria took the liberty to take Kyles semi-automatic handgun.

         I wanna stay with Kyle, she announced. She was limping on her leg, but didnt show she was in great pain.

Chapter 23

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            Oh, and youre just not gonna get shot again?! Preox sarcastically reacted. You think youre just, all of the sudden, fit for this team to destroy a whole Adoa fleet?! Im sorry, tootsie roll, but that aint gonna happen. And youre lucky, Kyle, that youre even involved in this!

         I may not be fit, by your standards, Velouria said, shooting her semi-automatic at a nearby stop sign, perfectly hitting the center of the letter O, but I am fit to stand by the one who saved my life, the one whose always been there for me, and the one I love, no matter what conflicts lie ahead of me. I would like to let you know that I took shooting classes with my uncle, I have a gun license, and that thing who shot me just got lucky.

         Kyle looked at her. You just got 1000000% more attractive.

         Velouria giggled, her cheeks beginning to flush. Oh, thank you sweetie.

         Oh, shoot! a Probe shouted. Fire! Those are Asids, alright! Instead of retreating or taking fire, everyone including the saved civilians shot at the robots, taking them all down immediately. Preox began running down the street, shooting down any enemies that stood in the way.

        

Infinite Valor

        

         Theyre here! Concentrate your fire on them and only them! We must rendezvous to the waterfront!! 

         I kinda just wanna stay here and shoot these bastards, Zeke replied, putting a few lava bullets in a Probes face. Jared had almost gotten shot in the head, before taking down a Mazer. Kyle and Velouria held hands, blasting their weapons with their other hands. Kriket deployed her auto turrets, which rapidly fired lava bullets with an extremely loud recoil. Moosey roared angrily, ramming a Mazer with is horns and taking that Mazers rifle, thus taking down the ones surrounding him. Preox leapt on one Striker, wielding a massive dagger from his forearm armor, jamming it in the Strikers head.

         So what do we do now? Kriket asked, kicking a Mazers teeth in. Another Mazer had pushed Kyle down, Velouria killed the enemy as a Probe attempted to silence her. Kyle quickly got up, shooting the robot down. They kissed each other sweetly, as a congratulation, upon their minor victory. 

         I think we have to meet the battleships and carrier, regardless we have rescued civilians or not, Preox answered, pointing up in the sky. Check it out. An Elephant mother ship was hovering over a distant island, at least five miles away from the citys waterfront. Purple and pink lightning surrounded the area, striking the water and causing massive waves to erupt.

         There must be a major power supply on that island, Preox continued. Thats really close to where the civilians are being taken for evac. I suggest we should defend the bay area where the civilians are being taken, as Admiral Bxirs group, or Hollys, takes care of the mother ship. The other mother ship is hovering over the tallest building in the city. The plan should go accordingly. BUT, I have no damn clue where Zjoks Elephant is at.

         How can you tell the difference?! Moosey frantically asked, putting a few rounds in a Mazers skull. The first two both look the same!

         Any idea what the compartment is for? Preox asked.

Chapter 23

I honestly have no damned clue whats in that compartment. I dont think its good, either.

He fired his weapon, yelling as loud as he could. Bullets pierced through the Bats pilot window, killing the pilots instantly. The Bat steered out of control and crashed into the street behind Kyle, exploding on impact.

         Nice one, Kyle! Preox complimented. Now lets move it, now!

         Kyle, Im so making out with you after all of this madness, Velouria said. She had no struggle on running. Her leg may have not been in the best condition, for she completely ignored that. She was surely in no mood for dying.

         Its pretty fun!!

 

 

Infinite Valor

 

            Holly led the way through the center of the city, taking down any enemy that stood in her path. Once they saw one of the Elephants make its way to the tallest tower in Kingzing City, the Obnoxious Tower, Holly and her team made their way to take it down. Holly didnt an annoyance with Rig, like Preox would. In fact, she found him quite useful with his lightning abilities. Since Preox wasnt able to elaborate for what he had planned for the three-split teams, Holly took the liberty to do things her way. She ordered Rig to take out as many aircrafts as he possibly could, followed by a concerning question as to whether he had the ability to fly.

         NOPE! Rig answered enthusiastically, blasting enemies with his lightning. One rod of Rigs lightning hit an Mazer so hard, the Mazer blew up into nothing but blood and guts.

         Have you ever tried it? Holly asked calmly, gouging the eyes out of another Mazer with her thorny vines. Agents Jon, Clarke, and Nathan had no trouble when it came to keeping up with the two. Holly and Rig led the way, slaughtering every bad guy before any of the three agents could put a bullet in them. The United States Army were in with the battle also, though they were not a part of Hollys team.

         Well, not really! All I really know is that I can kills the bad guys and lift heavy things! Like rhinos! Rig replied.

         Well, give it a try now, Holly commanded, we need someone in the air to watch out for the ones on the ground. Not every military jet or helicopter can help us out!!

         Okey! I do as you please!! Rig ran up the hood of a car and jumped as high as he could. Something rather peculiar happened while the Aziquet was in the air, however. He didnt fall on his face, he didnt even fly. However, he actually glided, not in his actually body form, but as a thin cloud of blue smoke.

         Holly looked up in the air, concerned. What the hell did he do?

         WOO! I can fly! Like a wee little cloud! Rigs voice was heard. Referencing the moment when Zjok was acquainted with the Drokensmur, Rig seemed to have the power of the Drokensmurs transportation ability. When Drokensmur wanted to travel through space or around other worlds, it would evaporate into a temporary state of red smoke for smoother travelling.

Chapter 23

 

         Rig not only possessed this unique ability, he could also strike lighting upon his enemies, while being in this smoke state. It was quite similar to that of a storm cloud, of complete ludicrous. WEEEE!!  Rig rapily swerved through the air, striking down Adoa Bats and even a Mohawk. Ships crashed into the streets and buildings of Kingzing City, all by the causation of Rig. Rig may have been increasing the significant damage to the city, though how else would he get rid of the Adoa invading the planet?

         The Elephant mother ship lingered above the Obnoxious Tower, consuming the structure with lightning. Once Holly and the others were close enough, Mazers were crawling out of the building. There were so many of them that not even Holly or Rig could put up with them, which meant bad news for the agents and the marines who followed. Holly ordered the others to find some cover, while she and Rig put up with the sudden increase in reinforcements.

         Stand back, well take care of it!

         As usual!! Nathan yelled back with sarcasm.

         Holly knelt down on the concrete, in front of the oncoming Mazers and Probes, as Rig fought them off with his lightning, and unleashed the deadly solar flares from her mouth. The solar flares which impacted the closest enemy would ignite him on fire, causing a searing burning pain. As this happened, Holly dug her fingers into the concrete. Her ridiculously strong vines rose from the ground, strangling and slashing her enemies. Before Holly knew it, over-sized daisies grew along her vines, which each evolved into a walking and moving individual flower. Thousands of live, little daisies over-powered the remaining Mazers and Probes, making a clear path for the allies to make their way inside the Obnoxious Tower.

         How the hell did you do that?! Nathan asked excitingly, returning into combat when the crossfires came to a minimum. That was awesome! Look at the little flowers go!

         I honestly have no idea how that happened, Holly said, standing up. Rig returned into his regular Aziquet form, taking a Mazers rifle, shooting up a Probe who lingered on top of a nearby building.

 

 

Infinite Valor

 

         Lets follow the pretty flowers!! Rig shouted, running into the Obnoxious Tower, stepping on the dead bodies of the Adoa. Thorny vines laid all over the ground, which was a mess Holly could admit to.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Combat was gradually beginning to rush at a faster rate, which led to some major difficulty for the agents, marines, anyone else who didnt have any cool super powers, like Holly or Rig.

         Use their weapons! Jon shouted, taking down a Probe.

The Elephant was using the towers power, which effected other buildings surrounding it. Branches of lightning streamed downward from the very top of the building, causing damage to the interior. Massive debris fell from the floors above the lobby, blocking the way they came in.

 

Chapter 23

 

            We better hurry! Nathan suggested, once they approached the elevators. There were four elevators in total, enough for everyone to make one trip to the very top of the tower and meet at the same time. Im not sure about these elevators, considering the state that the building is in, however.

         Lets just try, anyway, Holly replied, smashing a Mazer to the ground with her vines. We wont get up there in time if we take the stairs!

         Good! Preox said to only go for the engines, right?

         Holly looked at him. What?

         Im just making sure. Preox said to only go for the engines, not their self-destruct sequence. He said that if we destroy the engines, the Elephant will only fall to the ground, causing much less damage to the city. If we hit the self-destruct sequence yeah! We dont want to do that. Were you paying attention to Preox when he was babbling about his plan in the Dookoran?!

         Holly felt too guilty to answer, for she had been too busy talking to Super Jakey inside her head. An Adoa Striker came charging at them, as they waited for the elevators. The Striker had no beam gun, though instead used his arms and mouth as his only weapons. The little daisies attempted to destroy the Striker. Being a group of delicate flowers, the Striker smashed them with his feet and fists. Holly ordered everyone to stay bunched up against the elevators, while she took care of the Striker.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Infinite Valor

 

            Aw, whats wrong furry-boy? Holly asked pleasantly. You dont like flowers? Her forearm began to mutate, which astounded her allies. The Striker stood there defiantly, as Holly took steps closer to him. Her forearm began to transform into a thick tree branch, with a sharply pointed tip. It was similar to that of a sword. Do flowers give you allergies?

         The Striker snarled at her. I will feast upon you!!

         Oh? Holly raised her eyebrow. Come at me.

         The Striker roared, making the ground shake, and charged at Holly. Holly ran towards him, wrapping her vines around the Strikers neck before he could get his hands on her. She threw enough force against the Striker, that the beast fell to the ground, gasping for air. She leapt on top of the beast, choking him out until she finished him off by digging her tree branch arm deep into his skull. Gray blood spilled all over the Strikers face and onto the floor. Holly pulled her arm out of the Strikers head and formed it back into her regular forearm. She wiped all of the blood and tissue on her pants. She stepped off of the Striker and regrouped with the others, just in time for the elevators to take them over seventy stories high.

         I didnt know I could do that either, Holly said, referencing about her newly discovered power, as the elevator took them all up the Obnoxious Tower.

         Rig laughed of sheer immaturity. Haha! You have wood.

         Jeez, are you five? a marine asked. It was AJ.

         Nope! Just awesome!

         How would a five-year old know about wood, anyway? Nathan asked, concerned.

         I was talking about his immaturity level, not five-year olds, in general!

         Is that a threat?!

         STOP! Holly screamed as loud as she could. Youre all acting much younger than five! The last thing we need is a fight in a damaged elevator!!

Chapter 23

 

         I could beat all of you guys up, with or without my powers, so I suggest you all shut up before it gets ugly!

         It got silent, until Jon broke the silence. I would let you beat me up.

         Before Holly could say anything, a talking daisy climbed up Hollys shoulder and sat down. Dude! Have some manners for the lady!

         You survived? Holly questioned the daisy.

         The daisy nodded. Yep! Since youve created me, Ive been your humble servant and I always will be.

         Why, thank you, Mr. Daisy, Holly said with a giggle. She enjoyed this flowers company.

         May I ask you of a favor, Miss Holly? Mr. Daisy asked.

         Go ahead. Make it quick, were almost to the top.

         Please dont call me Mr. Daisy? I just prefer Mr. Flower. Oh, and another favor to ask of you. Could you make me a bodacious rose? I will need a mate, sooner or later. Roses are beautiful, but theyre really feisty. I like me a little flowery kink.

         Holly was a little creeped out. Yeah, sure thing, Mr. Flower. Hey, Nathan, where would the engines of this Elephant be, anyway?

         They should be just below the cockpit, Nathan answered. It will be quite the trip. The Elephant is bigger than several skyscrapers put together.  Holly sighed deeply. Well this should be fun!!

         *Ding*

         The four elevators opened, the allies opened fire upon nothing, all were dumbstruck to no enemies. They could see the entire view of the city, watching ships fight each other. Almost a sixth of the city was destroyed. At least twenty feet above them was the bottom of the first Elephant, which exceeded the Obnoxious Towers width. They all look up at it in amazement, not sure of what to say about it. The Elephant was massive and what lay beneath it simply amazed them. Between the rooftop and the bottom of the Elephant, was a plastic red slide leading from an entrance to the ship. The slide was about as wide as a two-lane street and it looked extremely fun.

         They have a slide?! Rig shouted happily! Lets go up it!!

         Holly and the others followed the blithering idiot, as she gazed at the lighting, striking downward upon the city. This is too much, man.

Infinite Valor

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            Meanwhile

        

         The battle between the citys waterfront and the Trans Island (where the other Elephant was stationed) was becoming a bit too much. The Adoa was attempting to breach the waterfront, while Admiral Bxirs team attempted to breach the small island. An immense amount of civilians were to be taken away from the city, via the waterfront, in order to be evacuated. However, the Elephant approached the island before the navy carrier could launch.

          Ever since battleships showed up and the carrier went under heavy fire, with about a thousand civilians there in the hopes of escaping this apocalyptic crisis, Preox, Kriket, Kyle, Velouria, Zeke, and Jared were helping alongside the human infantry to take out the Adoa who dare to attack the carrier. The civilians were kept safely inside the carrier, as those who were willing to fight, stayed outside. A couple of the battleships were already destroyed, slowly sinking into the Pacific Ocean. It was only a matter of time before the Adoa ships could actually reach the carrier and started attacking it, as well.

         Followed by the one and only Asid ship, as piloted by Admiral Bxir and Zitkir, Super Jakey flew through the skies attacking any Bat or Mohawk who all opposed him. Super Jakey latched himself onto a Mohawk, tearing away its armor and blasting it with his lasers of death.

Chapter 23

 

            Hell, he even descended into the Mohawk, taking out all of the Mazers and Probes who resided inside it. The Mohawk crashed into the water, once Super Jakey was finished with it, and he proceeded onward with his other opponents. Super Jakey wore a special ear piece, made from Asid technology, and it was used for him to keep communications with Admiral Bxir and the rest of the team who were inside the Asid ship. As Super Jakey was fighting a group of flying Adoa Probes, Admiral Bxirs voice rang in his ear like a blaring siren.

         Ay, boy! Take it easy out dare! We wanna take down some ships, too!

         Okay, Barry Banshee! Super Jakey shouted right back. There are plenty of these buddy-boys to go through! Also, you dont need to yell, I can hear you just fine! Super Jakey decided to gain speed, as did Admiral Bxir and his crew. The crossfire between human military and the Adoa was getting heavier, the closer they got to the Elephant. The Elephant hovered over Trans Island, which was a small island specifically for a local military base. For energy resources, the Adoa seemed to find this island very valuable.

         That Elephant will continue to fire its lightning cannons, Zitkir told Super Jakey. The lightning can detect harmful fire-power, thus will deflect any ammunition that attempts to penetrate it. Youll need to get in close in order to get to the engines. Simply entering the main doorway will be too much work, especially under all of this heavy firepower.       

         Super Jakey shot down a few Bats before responding affirmatively to Zitkir, followed by calling him buddy-boy. The masked teenager flew as fast as a rocket, approaching before the Elephant within seconds. Alright, where exactly were these engines, again?

         Just below that massive window where the cockpit is located, Zitkir answered.

         And what if youre wrong?

         Im not, I was held prisoner in one of those!

         Seriously, whats with the yelling? Super Jakey smiled and he was almost about to cause some damage to the Elephant, until he was ultimately struck by its powerful lightning. Thousands of volts of electricity ran through his entire body, the burning sensation almost too great for his own    

 

Infinite Valor

 

         withstanding. Before he knew what had happened, Super Jakey had plummeted deep into the ocean. After his body had twitched and jerked for a few seconds, from the electricity, Super Jakey opened his eyes. He could see a sunken battleship, along with sunken Adoa ships, deep inside the water. He could see dead bodies, broken machinery, and all sorts of broken. Deep inside his thoughts, Super Jakey was feeling absolute remorse for those who have fallen against the Adoa. Especially for his best friend Cale, who had perished, recently. However, Super Jakey found it acceptable to not let all of the emotional trauma consume his mind. He felt his body completely heal from the heavy damage, given from the Elephants lightning cannon, and began to swim back to the surface of the ocean.

         Super Jakey held his breath in for a long time, even when a great white shark was drawing near. He screamed, though was muffled from being under water, and blasted the shark with his elbow laser. The shark died instantly, with blood flowing from its gaping laser wound. Super Jakey gasped for air, once he reached the surface of the Pacific Ocean. Everything was loud and abrupt from the constant battle. Super Jakey took notice that he was close to Trans Island, just a few kilometers away from the Elephant. Woo!! You guys should have seen that! I just shot a laser at a shark, in the face!!

         No need tah yell! Bxir replied, mocking Super Jakeys voice, which didnt bother him one bit. He was very excited about his recent shark killing. Get back up thar, now, boy! The Adoa knows youre here trying to destroy the Elephant, so getting hit by that lightnin was nawt an accident.

         Yeah! Derno said, for thats all he could really say at this point. He and Zitkir were too busy fighting off ships with the Asid ships guns. Before Super Jakey could spring back into action, an Adoa Mohawk crash-landed, into the water, behind him causing a massive wave to over-power him. Super Jakey then realized that the Elephant was just barely floating above the water, rather than the actual island itself.

         Wait, buddy-boys, he said, flying out of the massive waves and making his way back to the Elephant. So if I take these engines out, this bad boy wont explode, but just go down, right?

         Preox said it would cause the least amount of damage if we did so, Zitkir replied immediately.

Chapter 23

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


            Ugh, he might as well be telling us to recycle.

         Takin out the engines is our best bit, Bxir said. He swerved the Asid ship between two opposing Bats, when Derno and Zitkir shot them down. We aint got much time! The Adoa has almost over-thrown tha forces on tha waterfront.

         But if I take down this baby, it would flood the city, right?

         Yes, you dumb idiot! Derno shouted. Its our best option! Now getcher ass up there, befo—. Super Jakey had lost communications with the Asid ship and immediately began to worry. He was just about to break into the Elephant, though he couldnt help but see that the Asid ship (from a distance) was up in flames, hurdling through the sky. A Mohawk was shooting at Admiral Bxir and the others, causing Super Jakey to fly as fast as he could to them.

         Get outta here, boy! Bxir yelled furiously. Derno is down, I have a glass shard in my stomach, and Zitkir is gone too. I know this is sudden for you, kiddo, but lifes got alotta suprises!

         Let me help you! Super Jakey yelled back, taking down a few ships. There were so many ships that Super Jakey could not keep a close eye out for Bxirs. He couldnt believe this was happening. He couldnt concentrate on what was reality and what seemed like an unsettling dream. He found the ship again, which was bursting in flames and headed towards the Elephant.

Infinite Valor

 

            Super Jakey screamed angrily, once a Bat intentionally fly right into him. He crushed the ship with fists and took its wings and destroyed other ships that followed. He began making his way to catch the Asid ship, again, for he had to save Bxir and Zitkir from this, yet somewhat expected, pickle. Thats when a group of Probes began flying after Super Jakey, firing their laser weapons at him.

         As Super Jakey fought off the annoying Probes, Bxirs voice came through the ear piece. He sounded like he was about to die. Dont worry bout me, princess. Theys nothin else you can do here. This ship has enough mass to cause an explosion to actually damage the Elephants exterior. Im headed toward tha engines location, now. Once I crash this ship, yew should be able tah git in wit no time, at all. It will make tha job a whole lawt easier. Its bin good servin wit yew for the first nd last time, Super Jakey. Try nawt tah be a total smart ass for the rest of yer life. Oh hey! Tell Preox that hes a lil bitch! Haha! Just kiddin, tell him that hes tha best damn Magnate I ever saw; tell Kriket shes hawt as hail. YEEE HAW! GET ALONG, UGLIES! ADMIRAL BXIR IS HERE TAH KICK YER ASS FER THA LAST TIME, BABY!! YEEEEE-HAW! Ow, my stomach!

         Super Jakey never heard so much enthusiasm from someone, who was on the brink of his death. It was kind of funny, yet sad at the same time, because he knew he was never going to hear that kind of humor, ever again. And neither was Preox, Rig, Kriket, or anyone else who knew Admiral Bxir, by heart. Captain Derno was gone, also, as was Zitkir. He had just barely met the two and he could only imagine their peers reactions. It wasnt going to be easy giving them the news, because Super Jakey knew what it was like. Once he realized that, as he flew as fast as he could to save Bxir, the ship had exploded on impact. Bxirs final words of useful information were correct, fortunately. The ship did create significant damage to the Elephant. However, Super Jakey couldnt help but feel like he could have done more. Maybe if he wasnt too damn busy blasting a shark to death, with his lasers, maybe this wouldnt have happened. The hero did not go to the extent of blaming himself. He knew this wasnt his fault. It was the Adoas. It was all of their fault and that made Super Jakey extremely angrily. He flew faster and faster

 

Chapter 23

 

         towards the damaged patch of the Elephant, making swift maneuvers to avoid from getting struck by any more lightning.

         The eighteen year-old, overly-confident, dork smiled brightly before smashing through the Elephants exterior. Alright, buddy-boys. Come at me.

                


 

 

 

 

Chapter 24: The Fall of Two Elephants

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Preox knew that the Adoa would attack any part of the city, rather than just attacking the waterfront. However, saving the civilians aboard the Navy carrier was his number one priority. He felt slightly confident about his master plan, although only about seventy-five percent was elaborated. The fact that he had never worked with Holly, Super Jakey, Kyle, or anyone else new to his presence, was what worried Preox the most. He was hoping they could get a good grip on not only this plan of his, but the entire battle versus the Adoa, also. Agent Moosey17 and the rest of the A72A took forever to realize that aliens were going to invade their planet and completely tear them a new one. If a professional, secret government agency wasnt capable of getting their head in the game, Preox had every right to worry about random teenagers, whom he had just met and had just joined him into an epic battle of righteousness.

The Navy carrier was still docked on Pier 87, alongside the citys water-

 

Chapter 24

 

front, currently unable to launch. Several battleships were there to aid the carrier, fighting off the Adoa that came from Trans Island. Luckily, for those on the carrier, taking out the Adoa was more simplistic. The fact that the carrier was being heavily defended, made things easier for those were actually operating the guns on the massive ship. Another fortunate trait of this conflict was the fact that the civilians were kept safe and secure inside the carrier itself. Unfortunately, however, the carrier could no way, in hell, move from its position. Those operating the Navy carrier did not want to risk getting bludgeoned from an onslaught of purple and pink lightning, from the Elephant hovering above Trans Island.

What was also unfortunate was the fact that the carriers safety was only temporary and Preox knew that to be very true. There was another Elephant hovering above the Obnoxious Tower, so whos to know when the reinforcements from that Elephant will be approaching from the other side? Preox wished he had more time to actually plan against Zjoks branch of the Adoa Army, as he, Kriket, Kyle, Velouria, Zeke, Moosey and Jared assisted the battle on the carriers bridge.

Preox was relieved to see that not as many Adoa ships were flying in close to the carrier. He was able to catch his breath, reload, and make his way to the bridge. Once he reached the bridge, leaving Kriket in temporary commandment of the team who waited outside, Preox approached Colonel Grandpa. Yes, that was really his name. The entire interior of the bridge was a mess. Shattered glass was spread across the floor and some Navy soldiers were on the ground, being tended to their injuries.

At least it isnt as horrid as it is on the battleships, Col. Grandpa limped towards Preox. He was a middle-aged, skinnier man, who had a bum knee. The entire enhanced flight deck is either empty, or full of war debris. Im sure youve noticed.

I did kind of shoot down a couple Bats on that deck, Preox responded. You wanted to speak to me, Colonel?

Duh! Grandpa shouted. When can we get out off the waterfront?! Two battleships have gone down. I dont think the rest can hold those alien freaks off any longer. That Elephant thing is MASSIVE and so is that         

The Fall of Two Elephants

 

lighting! Preox, for the first time, in any of my military experience, I am actually really scared tit-less.

Preox couldnt tolerate this pansy. He sighed deeply and responded in a most calm manner. Colonel, Im about as worried as anyone else on this carrier. Im worried about the civilians, Im worried about the soldiers, and Im worried about the Adoas annoyance. However, I have two very trusted teams taking care of this sort of ordeal, as we speak. Admiral Bxir, I told you about him, the red guy, said he will contact me the moment they descend into that Elephant, right there!! Preox pointed at the Elephant hovering above Trans Island, which seemed to have a hint of bright light on the top of it.

Preox and Colonel Grandpa both reacted, as Grandpa lit a cigarette. Damn, Preox. I guess you were right.

Thats where the ships engines are located! Preox exclaimed, taking Grandpas binoculars, which hung around his neck.

Careful with my binoculars! Those were Grandpa Grandpas!

Shut it, pencil-boy! Why didnt Admiral Bxir get ahold of me? Must have lost communications. Anyway, Colonel Whiner, launch this carrier now. This Elephant could probably end up in the water, creating a massive wave that could potentially hit the city with full force. We couldnt just blow the Elephant up from using its self-destruction.

Well why not?! Grandpa shouted.

Please dont shout at me! And would rather have massive amounts of debris hitting and damaging your carrier?!

Well, the carrier isnt exactly MASSIVE WAVE-PROOF!

Preox did not stand down with this argument. Well maybe if you moved your ass maybe your carrier wont be affected! When it comes to destroying these Elephants, I try my best to do as little damage as possible. If my calculations are correct, once the massive wave hits the city, the wave would be at least 20-feet tall. So stop crying and get this ship moving! Do it for Grandpa Grandpa!

Now, lets talk about the finances--!

I DONT WANT TO TALK ABOUT THE BLOODY FINANCES!!! MOVE IT! THATS AN ORDER, YOU SCRAWNY TART!

 

Chapter 24

 

Grandpa jolted in hesitation after Preox yelled at him for the last time. Preox knew that the Elephant was going down and it was time to get moving.

A glass window had been broken, with shards scratching the side of Preoxs face. He groaned angrily and found Kriket right nearby.

I thought I told you to move it, Preox said, wiping blood off his face.        Im obviously in love with you, so Im obviously not going to leave you, Kriket said. nine-millimeter semi-automatic.

Howd you know his name?!

Im his friend, Kyle!

Weird! Hes never told me about you!

Kyle scoffed, as Velouria giggled. Hes never mentioned me!

Bummer, dude! But do you have any idea where he is?

Jared was feeling hopeful, as Kyle was hesitant to tell Jakes father that Jake, himself, was actually Super Jakey. Uh, you know that Super Jakey guy?

HA! That silly looney that saves the city? I havent even seen that guy, yet! He must have chickened out!

Kyle made a disagreeing grunt. Ugh, not exactly. However, your son is kind of him.

Jared laughed. Are you serious? No son of mine would ever a girly, little mask like that.

Preox snickered, as they all approached Pier 87. They were back to running through the streets of an empty, yet partially damaged, Kingzing City.

Kyle, Im afraid Im gonna have to man-handle you, Preox said.

What?! A distant explosion was heard, faintly, from a distance. Kyle and the others looked back to see the massive Elephant, above Trans Island, gradually decline from altitude. They could see purple flames emitting from the top. The lightning cannons have ceased fire and they could see other Adoa ships desperately make their way out of the mothership.

The ship is going into the ocean! Preox shouted. Its gonna send us a big, friggin wave! So let me carry you up a building, so we dont get caught in it!

 

Chapter 24

You dont understand this pickle were in! Put your weapons down, now, or I will take the bloody innards of your fat ass and make your entire gang wear it as make up!!

The Fall of Two Elephants

IF YOU WERENT BEING AN ANNOYING, PUTRID BUG, I WOULD TIE YOUR BALLS SO TIGHTLY AROUND YOUR NECK, EVERYONE WILL THINK YOURE WEARING A FANCY FLESH TIE! PUT THE GUN DOWN, GIVE US THE HUMAN FEMALE, OR I WILL PERSONALLY GO ALL MEDIEVAL ON YO ASS!

         Yes, Magnate.

Kriket and Preoxs aim were top notch. She open her eyes, out of certain fear, and looked around to see the dead gang sprawled out on the concrete. P-please that was scary.

Chapter 24

 

            Navy carrier make its way out the reaches of the tidal wave and the Adoa. The civilians were safe, at last, and Preoxs plan was working perfectly. Well, sort of. Damn it, Rig!! HE did this! This is going to cause significant damage to your city. We need to get in the building, now!
