The Fall of Two Elephants

 

            Twenty Minutes before Preoxs Team had made refuge in the Money Poop Bank.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Super Jakey found it a real pain in the ass to get into the Elephant that once hovered above Trans Island. He clambered through the debris, left from the heavy damage of the crashed Asid ship. He lifted all of the heavy objects that were in his way, and destroyed anything else with his fists.

         Jeez, this is pretty annoying, venturing through all of this, Super Jakey said to himself. He burst through a metallic wall, which startled many Adoa Mazers.

         Oh, Jesus Christo! Its Super Jakey! Annihilate him, Mazers!

         Can you not? Super Jakey took a deep sigh and fought around in a seemingly long corridor. He kind of figured why there were so many Mazers in this particular area. Most likely because, well, Admiral Bxir crashed a ship (the size of a bus) into their very own Elephant mothership. He used a Mazer as a shield, once the others had opened fire upon him. Using the Mazer shield with one arm, Super Jakey fired his lasers with the other. A gun rack had caught his eye, as he fought valiantly, and noticed that the Adoa had their own customary grenades. The grenades were red and pear-shaped, sitting on a shelf that labelled, Explode-y Things.

 

Chapter 24

 

         Heads up, chumps! Super Jakey shouted, followed by a hysterical laugh.

         It took him a few seconds to get the idea of how the Adoas grenades were to actually be activated. He actually had to twist the darned thing, like a glow stick. He chucked a couple grenades at a few Mazers, chucked them like he would throw a baseball in a district game. The Mazers failed to take cover in time, before an implosion blast, of a great radius, shredded Super Jakeys enemies and any other object that was caught in the grenades wrath. Super Jakey ended up getting a big gash on his forearm from one of the imploded blasts. He didnt care, he was going to heal right up, anyway.

         He shouted at the top of his lungs, in confidence, after using as many of the grenades as he possibly could. He ran all around through the ships corridors, looking for where the Elephants engines could be. He couldnt find them, which was really irritating. Bxir had just gotten himself killed, helping Super Jakey get to the engines, and he couldnt even find the damned things. Okay, think dammit! Urg! I wonder if Preox gave a precise location as to where these engines are, while I was not paying attention. I shouldnt have been looking at Hollys chest the entire time we were at that meeting. Actually, I take that back! Come on, SJ, think. Think of what Preox was saying, not of Hollys chest. Ugh, no, the wondrous image of what has been seen cannot simply be unseen! I feel like Superman. His weakness is being touched by kryptonite, as my weakness is think of Holly Ransfields boobies! Hell, even if I am to touch those miraculous thingies of existence, there still would be no hope for me.

         What the hell are you talking about? a Mazer asked Super Jakey, whom he had been passing by. The Mazer didnt even come close to thinking of shooting the superhero. Instead, he asks him this dull question, as Super Jakey himself passes by.

Its sad to see you dying, not knowing of their existence, their fantastic warmth, their fine delicacy, and over-whelming—okay, now I really gotta stop before I start throbbing Super Jakey noticed

 

The Fall of Two Elephants

 

that his elbow laser created a massive blast radius in the metallic wall, revealing another room.

Strikers were keeping the area heavily guarded, which gave Super Jakey the idea he had never thought he would come close to thinking of. Oh boy, here we go. Super Jakey flew all over the room, firing his lasers at the angry Strikers. The Strikers roared, as they fired their massive carbines. The carbines blasts were so powerful, Super Jakey took the advantage of making the Strikers accidentally shoot at the massive engines throughout the massive room. There were several engines on the floor, ceiling, and both sides of the room, causing Super Jakey to literally move all over the place, like an annoying horse fly. Fortunately, Super Jakeys little tactic eventually worked. The Strikers were in fact obnoxious and abruptly stupid enough to miss a few rounds on Super Jakey, thus hitting the engines instead.

         Because youre ugly! a Striker immediately replied, before Super Jakey smashed his cranium. He lifted the Strikers dead body and remembered the time when he first became Super Jakey. He remembered lifting that heavy thug, above his shoulders, before smashing the guy on his 1999 white Camaro. The Striker was the thug, the engines were the white Camaro. He smiled brightly, remembering that he was meant to do hardcore stuff like, and smashed the one ton brute against the first couple of engines, until they were in critical condition.

He could barely see himself passing by the city. Super Jakey felt like he should

 

Chapter 24

 

         be dead. He could feel the Serum healing his body, but for now it wasnt enough for him to control it. Super Jakey had no idea that the engines were all going to explode, the minute he had destroyed all of them. That wasnt his fault. While Super Jakey was Destroying Trans Islands Elephant

         Holly, who had not listened to Preox either, relied on Rigs below basic IQ. Rig seemed to be the only one who was actually paying attention to Preox. Sort of.

The Fall of Two Elephants

 

         bloodied bodies of the Adoa. There were dead Mazers, for the most part, a dead Striker, and a few broken Probes. They really did a work on this place. The seats to each table, in the cafeteria, each had a pointed tip and they looked incredibly uncomfortable to sit in.

         Are these chairs? And do these freaks sit in these? AJ asked Rig. Rig became the most resourceful when it came to learning about the Adoa.

         YES! Rig shouted, happily.

         AJ rose an eyebrow. Looks kinky.

         Where should we go now? Mr. Flower asked Holly. The little, living daisy was holding an Adoa rifle. He was one strong flower. Im only gonna talk to you because, well, youre cooler. And wheres my rose?

         Yes, now shut up.

         They ventured out of the cafeteria, taking down any bad guys that got in their way. As they fought through corridors of the Elephant, along with a couple marines getting killed, Holly couldnt help by think about Super Jakey. All of this violence, killing, and invading, all made her think of the one idiot who really understood her. Somehow. Of course she had Kyle as her best friend, but something about Super Jakey really made her feel special. She was starting to really like the jackass.

         Mr. Flower shouted excitedly, bringing down Mazers with his rifle and punching in their faces. Mr. Flower seemed to have super strength, given by the Misara Serum. I really miss the other flowers I was with! He put a few bullets in a few Mazer heads, as Holly slaughtered more with her vines.

         Ill gather more flowers to aid you, when we get to the engines! Holly replied.

Chapter 24

 

         You know what the engines look like, right Rig? Holly asked appropriately.

         Rig nodded and turned into a cloud of blue smoke. Come on guys! Lets go! Hooray!

         Nathan laughed hysterically, as they ran around a corner to see the massive center area of the entire ship. There were massive pipes and structures ranging the height, length, and width of the Elephant. They all stopped for a moment, gazing at the magnificent view.

         Lets hurry this up, Holly whispered. We dont want ALL of those guys coming up at us.

She stood back and unleashed her army of strong-powered daisies. Mr. Flower shouted victoriously, as he and the other flowers attacked their enemies, diminishing them within seconds. Holly looked unleased her deadly vines, shredding the bad guys who seemed to be coming from behind. The vines accidentally took out a part of the railing, which was placed over

The Fall of Two Elephants

 

                     the edge over what was the rest of the Elephant. Some of the daisies were sent over the edge, plummeting thousands of feet from their position. Agent Nathan12 noticed that Agent Clarke10 was under a lot of stress from the oncoming firepower of a Probe. Nathan took notice of this and fired too gun shots to the Probes face.

Holly, too, went into rage mode, as her eyes transformed into the glowing of the sun.

From what Ive learned about your powers, they have a safety mechanism for if you were to fall from an astounding height. Does that make you feel better?

The Fall of Two Elephants

 

         Holly sniffled, beginning to cry. Not one bit, Mr. Flower. The daisy frowned and Holly jumped out of the massive cockpit window, following the others who had jumped out. Holly could hear the Elephant falling apart, as large amounts of debris passed by her and the others, as they fell. Mr. Flower held onto her tightly, a few of his flower petals chipping away from the great gust that passed through him as they fell. Once they got closer the streets of Kingzing City, Holly struck out her wrist and a massive, massive leaf erupted from it.

         They landed onto the thick, comfortable leaf, getting back on the street and running as fast as they could.

         That was fun!! Rig shouted happily. Everyone was too freaked out from what was happening, they really couldnt say anything out of the ordinary. Immense amounts of debris continuously fell from the ship, crunching down on buildings and on the street.

         KEEP RUNNING! Holly shouted, fighting back the tears. More explosions erupted from the damaged ship and all Holly could absolutely remember is a massive flash, lighting up their entire surroundings. A great force from the Elephants vertical explosion sent everyone flying into the air and evidently smack their skulls hard against the concrete. Unfortunately, they were all sprawled out on the concrete, unconscious, as the explosion the second Elephant continued its destruction. The Obnoxious Tower, which was once the tallest building in the city, had collapsed into the dirt. Other buildings around the area soon followed its fate.


 

 

 

Chapter 25: The Neeka

 

 




 

                       

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

    Stupendous National Forest is due north from Kingzing City, just south from its neighbor, Marsing City. Stupendous Forest is a great place to go camping with your family, friends, boyfriend, girlfriend, hand, pet, anything really! Stupendous will grant its visitors amazing views of the Triplet Falls, trees ranging from one hundred feet and beyond, as well as the beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean. Its a tourist paradise!

         However, just a quarter mile from the forest itself, resides a hydroelectricity plant! Most of the electricity there goes to Kingzing City! For a city as massive as Kingzing, its rather impressive. Marsing City gets a fair share of this, also. Unfortunately, Zjoks Elephant is going to pay this electricity plant a visit! Zjoks Elephant is much bigger, stronger, and more resistant. The military base on Trans Island and the Obnoxious Tower were all amazing sources of energy for the first two Elephants, though Zjok found it extremely appropriate to settle his Elephant further away from the city. Reasons, for that being said, are various.

Chapter 25

 

            I think the humans are very mean, Nowndu simply said, as he walked with Zjok through the long corridor, before they were to actually walk back to the cockpit. Zjok wanted to get a tasty snack from the vending machine, for he was too stressed and too angry to even function. Ever since the two Elephants were destroyed, which was about an hour ago, Zjok tried his best to not lose his temper and kill any more of his Adoa. That sort of temper was getting old.

         I seem to be quite mistaken, Zjok simply said, looking out of the massive window that ran along the corridor. He kept his eye on Kingzing City, which was now up in smoke and flames. He looked to the left and could see the Elephant, which hovered above Trans Island, had only been sunken by three-fourths. The Elephant was completely unable to rise up again. Zjok looked at area in disgust. I have underestimated my enemies. I should have killed Admiral Bxir and his crew, rather than just keep them prisoner. Theres a lesson in this, Nowndu.

         What is that, sir?

         To not be SO NAVE! AGGGHHHH! Zjok punched Nowndu in the face, knocking the Mazer down to the ground. Zjok stood over him, stomping his face in, until there was nothing but a bloody mess. Mazers avoided Zjok as much as they could, now that theyve seen him kill Nowndu. Get back to work! YOU! MAZER! COME HERE!

         A Mazer, by the name of Gfejio, approached the tyrant hesitantly. Y-yes, sir? Want me to clean that up?

         No, Zjok replied, looking down at Nowndus dead body, I want you to find me Vanish. The last time I talked to him, I had ordered him to sent down the entire fleet of the two Elephants. I need him this time.

         For what, sir? If you dont mind me askin!

         Tell Vanish to transfer as many information to the Neeka as possible. The Neeka must know who hes hunting for, before I move the Elephant into the city. Tell Vanish to get information on Super Jakey, Rig, and our newest common enemy Holly. She seemed to have obtained the Misara Serum, under physical circumstances, according to the Probes. Tell Vanish to print out still images of these three, incompetent, annoying frog turds, so I can show them to the Neeka. Once the Neeka has their ID, hell go from there.

The Neeka

 

            The Neeka will try to kill you, though, Gfejio inquired.

         Zjok took a deep breath and replied with a sarcastic tone. No, Gfejio, yah think so?! However, thats not the case. You see, Ive programmed the Neeka to only do my bidding and Galgs bidding.

         What about Jorfb, before he died? Didnt you ask him to release the Neeka, when the time was necessary?

         Zjok shrugged. He was annoying me. Anyway, go tell Vanish of the news, please, while I make my way down to the Neekas storage compartment. The compartment should be detached within the next half hour. I have attached a bomb to the Neekas brain, so when it finds and destroys the three buttholes, I will detonate the bomb. After having killed the Neeka, my fleet will move into the city and take over from there. Get yourself ready, Mazer.

         Gfejio took a deep breath, saluting to his leader. Yes, your awesomeness. I will have my Mazers and Strikers ready.

         Zjok smiled. Good! Now, off with you. I want to gaze at this horrible view and enjoy it because its all about to be mine. Oh, if only the Drokensmur were here, now. He would be so proud of me.

         Whats Drokensmur?

         Zjok snarled at him. Get the hell out of my sight, before I kill you too.

        

Money Poop Bank – 9:08 pm

        

            Once the Elephant in Kingzing City exploded, the explosion sent a massive, pushing force, which sent many buildings to lean over or ultimately collapse. The radius of that force was about ten miles in diameter, whereas the blast radius, in itself, as being vertically shaped, was only one block wide. The pushing force caused critical damage to Kingzing City, including the Money Poop bank, the building which Preoxs team took refuge. Once the pushing force struck the bank, the bank was ultimately pushed slightly against another building. Thanks to that building the bank and its entirety would have collapsed into pieces. After about an hour since the explosion, the

 

Chapter 25

 

         flooding from the other Elephants impact had decreased, as the water spread all throughout the city and beyond. The water had only reached up to two feet in depth.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Fortunately enough, Preox and the others were only knocked out into unconsciousness and were completely separated from each other, throughout the four story building.

         Kyle and Velouria were sprawled out on a massive piece of cement debris on the first floor of the bank. The bank was partially flooded with ocean water, with the interior in a complete mess. The ceilings above them were askew, the walls were severely cracked and/or punctured, and everything else was horribly damaged or torn apart. Interestingly enough, this was the same bank where the homosexual couple, Stuart and Kevin, robbed money for their honeymoon.

         Kyle, now blushing, Im sorry! I didnt mean to!

The Neeka

         Velouria nodded. Well you are my boyfriend, you silly poop.

Debris of the ceiling, along with the seven foot tall mammal, created a massive splash in the shallow water, completely soaking Velouria. She shrieked, once the cold water completely drenched her chest. Today was Kyles lucky day.

Moosey took out of his jacket pocket of what seemed to be his Area 72 Agent badge. He looked at it, his eyes faintly opened, gazing at the soaked picture of his smiling face. I got this on the first day I was promoted to an actual agent, of Area 72, back in 1994. I look so happy.

Kriket jumped in surprise from all of the screaming, as she climbed over the counter and got on her feet. Her body and armor were beaten, and her Vambit was broken. She leaned against the counter, moaning slightly from the pain in her cranium. She must have hit

         So, that happened.

         Its night time, Kyle said, looking at the massive, shattered windows.

Chapter 25

 

            Jared stumbled from the staircase of the bank, hitting his head on the wall. Everyone was startled and after Jared had stumbled, Kriket solely reminded herself to unfold her rifle and keep it close. She was thankful that wasnt broken, also.

         You lost my hand gun? Preoxs voice came through the interior of the building. They didnt see him, until he walked out of the janitors closet, nearby. I really liked that gun.

         Kriket splashed through the water, giving Preox a big-ass hug. He appeared to be in better shape than everyone else. In fact, he appeared to have been on his feet longer than everyone else. Kriket figured that Preox allowed everyone to rest, knowing that they were all okay. However, Moosey was continuously complaining about his butt, after having it hit hard against the floor, after falling from the second story. I can fix your Vambit, Kriket. Damn, those things seem to be more delicate than I thought.

         Seriously.

They could see a bright green light, shining upon the flooded street. The water looked gorgeous as it was illuminated with the light, though the slow-moving Mohawk completely ruined the experience. Moosey tried his best to make sure his horns didnt become a dead giveaway and he was constantly moving around in the water. Preox shushed him again, especially when they could see two Strikers walking though the street outside the building. Each step they took resulted in a massive splash, from their massive feet. The Strikers, and Mohawk, seemed to have been searching the city. Searching for survivors? Searching for enemies? Searching for Preoxs, Admiral Bxirs, or even Hollys team?

         Am I fat? the Striker asked the other.

         You look fab, the other answered. Guess what?

         What?

         Youre beautiful, just the way you are.

The Neeka

 

            Dude, thank you. Thank you so much.

They were completely gone, until Preox got up from behind the deposit counter and unfolded his customary rifle. The rifle glowed a light blue in the night, as Preox switched on the flashlights on his Vambit. He motioned for everyone to stay behind the counter, as he went and investigated the scene. The cool night breeze rushed through the shattered and broken windows and it was disturbingly quiet. There were a few occurrences of distant fire power, however, so the remaining Adoa, from the two Elephants, are still putting up a tough fight. Fortunately enough, the distant firepower was far beyond Preoxs teams location. It was something to worry about, then again it really wasnt. Kyle and Velouria were starting to make out, Kriket told them to stop immediately.

         Well we could die, tonight, Kyle whispered with complete sass, sticking his tongue at her. They heard Preox return to the deposit counter, from the sound of splashing water.

         Alright, he started, the Mohawk proceeded eastward. There are several other ships, scavenging the area near the waterfront, so we should be okay. Theres water everywhere, so we have to be very freaking quiet! Stick close to me and if you find a gun, I highly suggest you take it with you!

         Jared and Moosey seemed to be the only ones without a gun of any sort. They took what they could (that being a lead pipe and a rock) and they proceeded out of the building, as quiet as they could be. They made it to the street in front of the building, seeing that their surroundings were in ruins. Some buildings were either collapsed to the ground, or just about as damaged as the bank itself. Vehicles found were crucially destroyed or up in flames. A crashed military jet, completely on fire, was even seen lodged in a distant building. Those who were inexperienced with warfare, as well as aliens from outer space, were completely stunned and fearful once they saw the destruction of Kingzing City. It was depressing, shocking, and like it was unreal. Some of that was refreshed, after seeing some buildings still illuminated with the night sky. They could also see the beautiful night sky, filled with bright stars. It was rather a bitter-sweet mix.

Chapter 25

 

            Okay, Klondikes, Preox whispered. Were going to head toward where Hollys Elephant exploded. I have no doubt her team survived. Stick to the alley ways, the Adoa is very lazy when scavenging the battle field--.

         That military base on Strom was the only piece of architecture on that rubbish planet, Preox snapped, so the Adoa knew where to look. This is a whole new planet to Zjok and his army. This city is massive, so the remaining Adoa from the two destroyed Elephants will not find us unless were super quiet and we stick to the alleys. We have to move quickly, at least before Zjoks Elephant moves in.

         I forgot there was another one, Kyle complained.

         We can do this, Preox said with determination. If we can destroy two Elephants with such a small crew and a small army of militants, we can sure as hell take down three.

         If it werent for Rig, Holly, and Super Jakey, wed be screwed, Kriket said. Preox nodded in agreement.

         But lets not forget us, also, in protecting the Navy carrier. It is now far beyond the Zjoks reach, now.

         So what do we do after we find this Holly woman? Jared asked. Its funny. Jake mentioned talking to a girl by that name, before.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


                            

The Neeka

 

            After we find Holly, its back to the waterfront, Preox said.

         Are you crazy?? Moosey said, louder than everyone else. They shushed him, once again. Im sorry! But did you not say there were more of them near the waterfront?

         They should be well scattered throughout the city, by the time we get to the Elephants destruction, Preox answered immediately. After we find Holly and the others, which we will (I promise), we will go to the waterfront, in search of Admiral Bxir and his crew.

         You couldnt get ahold of any of them? Kriket asked, with deep concern. Not even Rig?

         Not even Rig.

         But he loves talking to you.

         Preox sighed deeply. I know and thats why we gotta go find them. I sure do hope Super Jakey is looking for us, also, with his ability to fly and everything.

         This all too much, Kyle complained. Velouria pulled him over for a kiss. He felt better, after that. Thanks, babe.

         Before Preox could make a final statement, the Money Poop bank completely collapsed into a giant pile of rubble. The entire building collapsing to the ground was simply loud and atrocious. It alarmed everyone in Preoxs team. Okay, we gotta go now! Stick to the alley ways! If you see a Mazer, Striker, Probe, any of that sort, steer clear before they see you! The Adoa may be terrible at finding things, but theyre not all incompetent!

 

Meanwhile

 

         Two campers, by the names of Carl and Ophelia Minor, have been married for over thirty years. After flying from Maryland, Carl and Ophelia had finally reached the beautiful coast of Oregon. For their vacation, the couple decided to elope at the Stupendous Nation Forest. After all that has happened on this eventful day, Carl and Ophelia have heard no word of it. After a great day of hiking and visiting hot springs, Carl and Ophelia had finally made it back to camp. It was time for supper!

Chapter 25

 

            Oh, sweet Ophelia, Carl said, as he held his wifes hand. The two of them were at least in their mid-fifties and they both seemed to be in good shape.

         What is it, sweet Carl? Ophelia responded, smiling brightly at her husband.

         Its time for some soup. I am Hungary, like a Hungarian. Ophelia laughed at Carls embarrassing pun and the two finally settled down, once the two made it to their tent. They both gathered around their campfire, which illuminated the dark of the forest, and began cooking some delicious crme soup. Once the soup was finished, the married couple immediately began their main course. The soup was deliciously refreshing.

         The last time I had this soup was the summer of 74, Carl said with a smile.

         Ophelia smiled. I remember that day. That was the last time I had this soup, also. I remember finding an engagement ring in my bowl.

         Carl laughed. Oh yeah! And you almost choked to death on it.

         Oh, my, those was good times.

         Carl chuckled lightly. I miss those times. Im going to go potty in the woods.    

         Ophelia laughed. Carl would talk like a child every-so-often, which she often enjoyed. Being a fifty-seven year-old man, Carl never seemed to care about the way he talked or behaved. He just enjoyed having a good time. Ophelia proceeded to eat her tiny bowl of soup, gazing at the night sky, as Carl proceeded with his natural, bodily functions. She watched her husband return to the camp, with great haste, wearing a concerned expression on his face.

         Are you okay, sweetie?

         Carl had tightened his belt when he replied. I think I found someone. A younger guy. I think hes Super Jakey. You know, the crazy ninja-dude who has been known for around in these parts.

         Nuh uh, Ophelia said, standing up. Let me see! Where is he?

         Hes lying in the ground, a few yards from behind the tent. It looks like he, I dont know, crash landed, or something.

         It was in fact Super Jakey, who laid in the soil of the national forest.

The Neeka

 

            By the looks of it, Super Jakey appeared to have crash-landed into the forest shortly after he was ejected from a massive explosion of the Elephants engines, which had had recently destroyed. His clothing was dirty, bloody, and torn, although his physical body appeared to be in perfect, healthy condition. However, he also appeared to be sleeping.

         Is he dead? Ophelia questioned. She really couldnt believe what she was witnessing.

         Of course not! Carl snapped. Hes Super Jakey! He cant die! It looks like hes just sleeping.

         But hes covered in blood! Should we help him?

         Of course we should!

         Super Jakey woke up slowly, about ten minutes after he was moved into the Minors tent. A hot, wet towel was displayed on his forehead and he felt just fine. He realized he was laying on an air mattress, covered in several blankets, with his head rested on a white, fluffy pillow. Once he was aware that he was in a tent, he noticed a bowl full of soup sitting next to the mattress. The soup was fresh and warm, as a sticky note was displayed on it, saying EAT ME!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Feeling somewhat obligated to do so, Super Jakey started taking a few spoon fulls of the soup. It was good. This is hella good, man. He could hear Carl and Ophelia chattering, from outside, and realized that they did nothing to his mask and cape, for they were still on his body. Super Jakey felt content with this sudden hospitality, and he did not feel threatened of any sort.

Chapter 25

           

         After a long day of battling with alien douches, Super Jakey was glad to be resting. However, he was worried about his friends, especially Holly Ransfield. He had to leave the forest and help them out with whatever they needed. For all he knew, Holly and everyone else could be in grave danger.

         Super Jakey stumbled lightly, out of the tent, to see Carl and Ophelia sitting in lawn chairs just talking to one another. They had finished their soup and could do nothing but talk and look at the stars. The campfire light up the small campsite, making the area seem warm and cozy.

         Oh! Carl exclaimed, scrambling out from his seat, after seeing Super Jakey approach them. He shook his hand violently, which Super Jakey did not expect. Big fan, Mr. Jakey!

         Hey, thanks bro. Its good to hear from a fan, especially now, anyway.

         Why? Not a lot of people like you anymore?

         Super Jakey shook his head. Have you not heard of whats been going on, buddy-boy?

         Oh jeez, Ophelia, he called me buddy-boy! Thats what he says to people! And no, I have not heard of whats been going on. Whats going on, myyyy broooo? Super Jakey finished eating his soup, once he had explained everything: The aliens, the sudden battle of Kingzing City, his worries about Holly and how hot she was. A shocked expression spread over Carls face.

         So what should we do? Ophelia stands up. Should we just leave?

         Well, I would! Super Jakey replied immediately. Hey, you guys dont happen to have a cellphone on you, by any chance?

         Carl laughed. Who do you think we are?! I mean, no disrespect to your awesome stature, but Ophelia and I dont believe in those things. Were fine with the ones we have, now. The ones with the cords and such.

         Super Jakey sighed loudly. Are you serious?! Its the year 2005, man!

         Why dont you fly to the city and look for whoever youre looking for?

         Super Jakey paused. Ophelia did raise a good point for that. Oh, yeah! I forgot I could do that. Well, on second thought, Ill just fly back to the city, then! Right before that, I have to go to the bathroom.

         Before Super Jakey marched away from the campsite to take a raging piss, there was the sound of a loud BOOM!

The Neeka

 

            Followed by that obnoxious boom, a screeching (yet rather disturbing) roar came from beyond the trees. Super Jakey had chills down his spine, for he had heard nothing like it. Carl and Ophelia felt the same way, for they have never heard anything of a screech like that.

         That didnt sound very friendly, Carl said, taking his wifes hand. Ophelia, I think its best to leave here, now.

         It was nice meeting you, Super Jakey, Ophelia said pleasantly, as the couple went into their car. They didnt even bother to do any packing. They were soon in a hurry, once the screeching sound was heard from again. Super Jakey did not like this one bit.

         Yeah, nice meeting you guys! Super Jakeys stomach sunk, once he saw a few evergreen trees in front of him collapse to the ground, before him. Whatever was making the awful screeching sound, it was coming towards Super Jakey. Okay, buddy boy, what and where the hell are you?

         He unzipped his pants and urinated on the camp fire to burn it out. Once the fire was out, the screeching noise had occurred again, this time it being much closer. The sound of falling trees echoed throughout the forest, and the sound of massive footsteps were stepping on them, bark cracking and breaking. Super Jakey took a deep breath, after zipping up his jeans, and decided to fly upward to see what was going on.

         Once he had exceeded the height of the tall, tall trees, he saw something very disturbing and he was about ready to crap his pants. O-ohhh, oh no. Ohhh, not g-good. Very ugly. Oh my God, Oh my God.

         The Neeka, standing over one-hundred and twenty-five feet tall, was wandering through the forest of the hundred foot tall trees. Its eyes were devilish, its teeth were illuminated by the lights displayed on his armor, and its body mass looked almost indestructible. It was a monster of a bad guy! Super Jakey hovered in air, dumbfounded. Super Jakey couldnt say a word, regardless whether the Neeka would hear him or not. He was literally scared shitless.

         The Neeka had seen him. He looked directly at Super Jakey and screeched, once more, followed by a chilling message. SUPER JAKEY! DIE NOW, PUNY HAMSTER!

        

Chapter 25

 

         I-Im not a h-hamster, Super Jakey replied, wiping the sweat off his forehead.

         YES YOU ARE, the Neeka snapped right back. His intimidation towards the superhero was unnerving. YOU DIE! ZJOK WILL BE PLEASED! The Neeka stretched out its massive arm, his six fingers tightly pressed together. Before Super Jakey knew it, blue flashes of plasma firepower escaped his fingertips, soaring towards Super Jakey with increasing speed.

         Oh, dear God! AGGH! Super Jakey screamed as he darted away to dodge the massive blobs of searing, burning light from hitting him.

         WORTHY OPPONENT MUST BE DIMINISHED!

         Super Jakey couldnt do nothing but fly away as fast as he could, shooting as many lasers as he could at the terrifying Neeka. The Neeka laughed evilly, as he chased Super Jakey, running through and ultimately destroying any forest tree in his path. This was not good, not one bit. What Super Jakey really had to do, now, was to keep the Neeka as far away from the city as possible.

 

Meanwhile – Remains of the Obnoxious Tower

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


             


The Neeka

 

            Holly could smell the disgusting odor of the Adoa, after being rudely awaken by a Mazer, who jabbed her in the stomach with his rifle. Hey, fatty! Wake up! Youre under arrest for being a human!

         Holly scoffed at him, getting up slowly. Mr. Flower stood proudly on her shoulder. She noticed that none of her team were in the area. Where could Rig, Clarke, Jon, AJ, and the other marines, be? Her clothes were torn, though her skin and face was perfectly healthy-looking, thanks to the immense healing of the Misara Serum. However, she was excruciatingly offended when the Mazer called her fat.

         Its okay, Holly, said Mr. Flower, well get out of this. There were only a few Mazers; Holly could easily take down these jerk wads. As Mr. Flower had spoken to her, Holly looked up at the night sky, and all around herself. Behind her, about two blocks away, were the ruins of the Obnoxious Tower and Elephant mothership. They had done it! The Elephant was destroyed, alright, but all of the buildings around her were diminished to the ground. It was rather a disturbing setting to be a part of, especially since this was pretty much all of Hollys fault. She knew she knew better than doing a wrongful act, under her responsibility. Ever since Agent Nathan12, along with several other marines, had died, Holly sort of just snapped. She snapped, similar to that when Preox snapped, once the gangsters held Velouria at gunpoint.

         Shut up, daisy! the Mazer ordered, aiming his rifle at the two. The other Mazers around the area were searching through the great amount of debris, looking for any other survivors.

         Whatd you say to me? Mr. Flower said, his rage beginning to rise.

         Hollys eyes turned into sunlight, the light blinding the Mazer. He cried in agonizing pain, as Hollys eyes illuminated the dark of the ruined city. She could use her eyes as flashlights! She opened her mouth, breathing her deadly solar flares at the rest of the Mazers, disintegrating them immediately.

         Yeah, Holly! Mr. Flower shouted proudly, who chose to stay on her shoulder. She had just noticed she was in, ankle-deep, of ocean water. The massive wave had reached her area, as well.

         Holly transformed her arm into the deadly, wooden stake, calling out for her team. Jon?! Clarke?! Rig?!

Chapter 25

 

           

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

            Right at that moment, an Adoa Mohawk had approached Holly, its hovering sound ceasing the quiet of the night. The ships (being about the size of a whale) green lights shined upon Hollys face.

         Oh, jeez, Mr. Flower said with uncertainty.

         Dont worry, Mr. Flower, Holly said, with tiger lilies growing throughout her body, we can take em.

         ON THE CONTRARY! came Rigs voice. A cloud of blue smoke swirled around the ship, striking it with lightning, with intense power. Mazers desperately tried to escape the Mohawk, but Preox and Kriket have made to the scene, just in time to shoot the infantry dead.

         Holly turned around to see Moosey, roaring at the top of his lungs, running on his four legs, and charging at the Mazers, knocking them flat on the ground. The enraged moose stomped on his enemies and took care of the rest with a Mazers rifle. The Mohawk was in crucial damage and went down, as it went up in flames. Rig returned to his Aziquet form, knocking out any bad guys he forget to destroy.

         The small battle was over and first sentence anyone ever said, was Preox yelling. OKAY! WHO DID THIS?! WHO MADE THIS HAPPEN?! I TOLD YOU ALL TO SPECIFICALLY DESTROY THE ENGINES, NOT BLOW UP THE ENTIRE SHIP!

 

The Neeka

 

         Okay, Preox, calm down, Kriket suggested. Preox wanted to yell at her, but he really couldnt. He loved her too much to do so.

         RIG! YOU IMCOMPITENT SACK OF LARD! WHAT HAPPENED?! DID YOU NOT LISTEN TO MY PLAN?! IN CASE YOU HADNT NOTICED, THE ELEPHANT DESTROYED NEARLY A QUARTER OF THE CITY!

         It was me, Preox, Holly said abruptly, and she Christs sake, will you shut up? You dont want more of those grotesque cows coming at us, do you?

         Y-you did this?! Preox shouted right back. Oh, and forgive me, Miss Sammy Sass, I didnt know I was being such a loud mouth. As if we havent caused enough commotion, as is! We just destroyed a Mohawk, along with other idiots who were mercilessly killed by our hands. Theres going to be more coming and Im pretty sure they know of our location, by now!

         Then why are we standing here and yelling at Holly for?! Kyle snapped. How about we move our asses, for once, and look for Super Jakey and the others?!

         Dont start with me, talking pencil! Youre lucky youre still alive, if it werent for me, of course.

         Kyle was getting a raging headache, he couldnt take more of this. Bull tits! There have been plenty of times where me, Velouria, Kriket, and even you have gotten killed! All you do is talk talk talk and you never do anything, without giving some sort of insult!

         Why you little--.

         SEE?! Kyle shouted, laughing hysterically and pointing his finger at Preoxs face. Youre doing it again! Why dont you just shut up and do something about it, for once, instead of just calling me names or saying what youre gonna do to me?!

         Preox yelled angrily and began strutting forward to Kyle, about ready to punch his lights out. Holly grabbed him with her vines, pulling him back. Kriket gasped, as Preox ripped the vines off, unfolding his rifle and pointing it at Holly. Her eyes turned into sunlight, once again. Preox was breathing heavily, with anger. Holly stood there, as calm as a sheep. You dont want to do that. I know I screwed up. Im sorry.

Chapter 25

 

            Preox, stop it! Kriket yelled, shedding a few tears. Preox hated to see her cry, like that. He stored away his rifle, as Hollys eyes returned to normal. Velouria went up and held Kyle tightly. As for the others, including the marines, the other A72A agents, and Jared, all stood and watched.

         Preox looked around at everyone, who all just stared at him in disgust. Never, in his career of being an Asid Magnate, had he experienced this much embarrassment. He looked like he was about to break down and cry. Before he could do that, Kriket went up and hugged him tightly. Preox, honey, its okay. We have to keep moving, alright? No more yelling, no more calling names. We have to keep moving. Please?

         Preox looked down at her. Im so sorry. Ahem. Everyone, please excuse me for my rude behavior, especially to Kyle and Holly. We have to keep moving, everyone. Im pretty sure that all of the surviving Adoa of the two, fallen Elephants, are all in the center of the city, looking for casualties. Im not sure when Zjoks Elephant will be around, but we must make it to the waterfront and look for Admiral Bxirs team. Everyone, weve made quite a bit of commotion just recently, so I suggest we be as quiet as possible.

         Everyone agreed, including Holly and Kyle, who have forgave Preox of his upmost apology.

         Why not use the sewers? came a sinister, yet familiar voice.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Neeka

 

         A sewer lid had been opened, sucking in more of the flooded water and there stood Evil Nacho, grinning as usual. I couldnt help but overhear your distress.

         Where the hell have you been?! literally everyone asked him, besides Jared and the other marines. Those guys just looked at him, deciding whether or not to shoot Evil Nacho or not. Evil Nacho was back, from whatever he was up to.

         Oh, Ive been working on a little project, Evil Nacho said with a laugh. Down to the sewers they go, those idiots will never find us.

         And what if they do? Preox said.

         Evil Nacho laughed again. You guys have been battling this whole time and not once have this Adoa even remotely thought of using scavenging the sewer system.

         What were you doing the whole time we were all busy?! Holly shouted, angrily.

         Evil Nacho smiled. Youll see.

         They wandered through the sewer system, Evil Nachos sewer system, seeing that all of the waste was reduced to nothing but a river of nacho cheese. Evil Nachos plan was to use the sewer systems as geysers of nacho cheese as a super weapon to take down the Adoa. In conclusion to that, Preox thought this super weapon idea was brilliant.

         As they ventured through the sewer, Moosey went up to Holly and asked her a question. Hey, Holly, is it? Um, wheres Nathan? Hes my A72A partner.

         Holly felt sorry for the moose and she stopped walking, as did Moosey. His face looked poor and miserable. He had already known what had happened, just by looking at Hollys face.

         Hey, you guys coming or what?! Jared yelled.

         Yes, just give us a second, Holly said calmly, looking up at Mooseys sad, furry face.

         Hes gone, huh? Moosey said quietly. Holly nodded weakly, as Moosey began to cry. He was really going to miss his partner in the A72A. Ill forget him and his continuous chewing of bubblegum. Moosey knelt down and gave Holly a big hug, before the two continued to move on.


Chapter 25

 

            Near Kyle and Velourias Neighborhood!

         Super Jakeys adrenaline was at its maximum, once the Neeka began to chase him. The monsters horrifying powers were unlike anything he has ever seen, before. The plasma blasts ejecting out of the fingertips of the Neeka were powerful enough to make Super Jakey explode, on impact! He wanted to destroy the Neeka, for running away from it was not the best option. However, comparing Super Jakeys size to that of the Neeka, fleeing the city and forgetting everything that ever happened seemed like a great idea at the time. He was flying, not at his fastest speed (though fast enough to keep the Neekas attention and continue following him, firing as many lasers as possible. The lasers seemed to do very little damage to the Neeka of course, which gave Super Jakey a massive anxiety attack. Aggh! What do I do? What do I do?!

         Super Jakey tried his constant best to stay out of reach from the Neeka, who plowed through the forest like snow, and tried his best to keep the Neeka away from any rural areas. If this thing was in the city, things would go haywire.

         I KILL YOU NOW! the Neeka yelled furiously, as red blobs of pure plasma leaked out of the Neekas back. The hot, boiling blobs of plasma followed Super Jakey, like heat-seeking missiles. Super Jakey couldnt help but maneuver, as well as scream like a little girl.

         Stop doing this, please?!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


The Neeka

The Neeka

 

         HA! THE NEEKA WILL DESTROY, WITHOUT MERCY!

         Super Jakey swerved and did his best to avoid from getting hit from the crazy amount of plasma. He was doing exceptionally well, until two blobs of heat-seeking plasma imploded against one another, causing a blast radius big enough to send Super Jakey straight into a house. After crashing through the roof and landing on the carpet of the seemingly inhabitable home, Super Jakey weakly got up as his body healed as fast as it could. What? Is this Velourias house?

         The Neekas massive fist slammed through the interior of the house, like a wrecking ball, the house getting critically damaged. Super Jakey climbed onto fist quickly and ran up the Neekas arm. The Neeka screeched angrily, after Super Jakey slammed his fists on the monsters forearm, thus destroying pieces of his armor. Okay, all I gotta do is keep hitting and maybe—OOF! The Neeka back-handed the hero away, sending him straight into the middle of a local neighborhood. The neighborhood which Kyle lived in. Some civilians were still inside their homes, leaving them frantically. Super Jakey quickly got up, as the Neeka fired more plasma and stormed through the houses of the neighborhood. The hero lifted up an entire, damaged, vehicle, and threw it aggressively at his enemy.

         The vehicle slammed against the Neekas face, destroying more of his armor. He screeched ferociously, stomping his feet on the concrete, shaking the earth. Super Jakey took another nearby car, flew up to the Neeka, and intended to smash it on his skull, though was completely rejected by another onslaught of plasma. One blob of plasma hit the vehicle he was holding, blasting him away. With the vehicle completely destroyed, Super Jakey groaned in pain as he struggled to keep up in the air. Okay, buddy-boy, youve pissed me off long enough.

         Super Jakey darted as fast as he could, clenching his fist and slamming it against the Neekas teeth, shattering a few of them. The Neeka screamed in agony. OWWW!! STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING! ACCEPT YOUR FATE! DIE NOW, RUDE PERSON!! The monster fired more plasma, desperately trying to eliminate Super Jakey. The masked teenager, being swift and careful, stomped on the Neekas head, thus creating a sonic boom of      

 

Chapter 25

 

         mass proportions. He had not done his sonic boom power in a long time, and he felt good that he was able to get the hang of it. The sonic boom was powerful enough to send the Neeka face plant on the concrete. Super Jakey climbed on top of him, punching away and firing lasers on him and his armor. The Neeka screamed angrily, firing a few plasma bursts at a house,  right next to them. The house exploded, where the force of the explosion sent Super Jakey flying involuntarily, once more. The Neeka grabbed him and slammed him hard against the street. The sudden pain from impact was really giving Super Jakey a headache. He laid there, groaning slowly, as the Neeka pointed his fingers at him. The Neeka was finally going to kill Super Jakey. ANY LAST WORDS, HUMAN?!

         Super Jakey coughed up some rocks, feeling a burning pain from his stomach. It was a pain that did not come with the great slamming against the road. It was a far more different pain, yet vaguely familiar. Now, Super Jakey felt like he was going to throw up. Oh, God, not this again! Yeah! I got a few for yah, buddy-boy! Eat this!

         Super Jakey opened his mouth and out spewed a geyser of hot, molten lava. The lava went high enough to burn the Neekas face. They both found themselves screaming in pain. The Neeka was screaming from the pain of the lava obstructing his face, while Super Jakey screamed from feeling the hot lava pass through his interior. He stopped puking lava, rolled back up onto his feet before the Neeka could shoot him with his plasma, and leapt onto the Neekas back. The Neeka was really pissed now, as he tried to get Super Jakey off and get the lava off his face. Super Jakey thrashed at the Neekas armor, trying his best to stay on his back. Amongst all of the thrashing and tearing at the monsters armor, Super Jakey discovered something rather peculiar. He could see continuously flashing, blue lights under the Neekas skin.

         Super Jakey puked more lava on the Neekas back, the monster screaming as loud as it could. Not realizing that the object inside the Neekas body was in fact a bomb, Super Jakey tore it out of his body, gripping the massive explosive tight. The Neeka was now on his knees, gasping for air, as the lava burned his face and back. Super Jakey intended to hover above the

 

The Neeka

 

         dying Neeka and slam the object onto his head, one last time, with as much force as he could. Any last words?! Super Jakey had asked, hovering at least twenty feet above the massive creature.

         M-mercy the Neeka said weakly.

         Super Jakey raised the object over his head, still completely unaware that the object in his hands was a bomb, and simply said, No mercy, buddy-boy.

         Once the explosion occurred, which almost reached Super Jakey, though not quite, the Neekas green blood and guts were sprayed all over him. He fell back on the ground and into the lawn of a property owner. Over half of the neighborhood went through destruction. The Neeka was destroyed and Super Jakey just laid in the grass, almost too stunned to say any words after what had just happened. This night is the night.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Super Jakey rested for another two minutes, until he thought he saw a flash of lightning, hearing a distant crackling. Oh, God, I forgot there was another one of those ships. Can I just go home, now? Please? Super Jakey whined and complained more, once he got up and watched the third Elephant, make its way down into the distant forest. Of course, the hydroelectricity plant. Super Jakey could barely see more Adoa ships following along with the Elephant. Super Jakey looked around himself, he was covered in blood from three different species, including his own, his

Chapter 25

 

            cape and mask were torn to the point where he just didnt want to wear them anymore. He took off his intriguing costume for the last time, and put on his baseball cap, which he had kept in his back pocket during his whole time of battling the Adoa. He walked slowly through the neighborhood streets, once he noticed a clean baseball bat laying in the middle of it.

         Jake Smithy picked up the bat, holding it firmly in his hands, and smiled. You know, I never really got to finish this season of varsity baseball. I think its time to show off that they really needed me that night. Jake looked up into the night sky, eyeing the Adoa ships with sincerity. Alright, freaks, lets get freaky one last time. Taking the baseball bat with him, Jake took flight and flew as fast as he could toward Zjoks Elephant. It was time for him and Zjok to face off, at last.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Part 6:

Could Have Been Worse

 

 

Chapter 26: Zjoks Providence

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


    Approximately five minutes before Jake decided to take on the last Elephant on his own, with sheer confidence, everyone else was still venturing through Evil Nachos sewers. Evil Nachos plan to wipe out the rest of the oncoming Adoa was simple, especially when they were to approach the citys waterfront, once again. Kriket looked up at Preox, taking his hand as they followed Evil Nacho through the cheese-infested vicinity, and made sure he was alright. Preox has had a few moments where he would absolutely snap and it worried others, especially Kriket. She was completely devoted to him, even though he had this sort of temper.

         Preox, are you doing okay?

         Preox took a few seconds to answer and Kriket knew he was about to lie to her face. Yes, I am fine, Kriket.

         Right now is a perfect time to do so, sweetheart.

Zjoks Providence

 

            Velouria nodded, staring at him. Kyle sighed and smiled at her. Okay, I will apologize. Youre right, you always are. Ive seen so much violence, today.

         So have I, Velouria said, feeling a little down.

         Finding Mooseys act of thankfulness to be full of awkward, Holly smiled at him. Youre welcome.

         Hey, Moosey, buddy, Mr. Flower said, getting on Mooseys shoulder, if you ever need a pal, Im here, man.

         Whatchu wanna talk about?!

         Well, Moosey thought for a moment, I really hate stinky socks.

         Mr. Flower. Me too! Thats why I dont wear them!

         Mr. Flower laughed, slightly disagreeing with that idea. Haha, sure! Lets do it! It will be our own Stinky Sock Adventure!

         The two of them laughed more and before they knew it, Evil Nacho had climbed through the ladder of a sewage entrance and climbed out, followed by everyone else. The entire waterfront was a washed up mess and there was no sign of the Adoa. The only essence of Adoa was only coming from their wrecked ships in the water, or destroyed in the city. Preox noticed that a few battleships were still afloat in the Pacific Ocean. Lights were lit up on the ships, indicating life. Look at that. The battleships are still at the waterfront. Now thats commitment.

         Maybe something big is about to happen, Jared said, clutching his weapon of a Mazer rifle.

 

Well what do you think? a marine asked Preox. They had approached the

Chapter 26

 

            citys waterfront, where they met a massive group of military soldiers. By the looks of things, reinforcements must have snuck into the city after the Elephants went down. Rumors that you said that there is in fact another Elephant we must destroy. However, I cant help but think of the enemies who are all in the heart of the city. How shall we deal with them?

         POOP ON THEIR FACES!! Rig shouted, randomly.

         He does that, Preox answered, before General Murphy could question.

Zjoks Providence

         Can he do it?

         Absolutely not, Preox immediately replied. Zjok has something planned for him, I just know it. After all this time of knowing who Super Jakey was, theres no doubt in my mind that Zjok has prepared something special for him.

         Holly got a little worried. What do you mean?

         Maybe a weapon that could extract his powers, Preox said with a shrug. It wouldnt surprise me if he created any material that was against Super Jakeys super-powered advantages.

         Holly looked up at the sky again, faintly seeing Jake, now. The ship is over the Stupendous Forest. Must be after the energy from the hydroelectricity plant.

         Makes sense, Preox said. Youre thinking of going after him, are you?

         Please dont go, Kyle begged. Holly, youre my best friend. Ive almost lost you and many other people I care about.

         What about Jake? Holly questioned.

         I-I guess him, too, Kyle stuttered. I mean, its already too late to stop him from going into the Elephant.

         Oh, snap! Thats what she said! Agent Jon and Rig both shouted at the same time, giving each other a high-five.

         That was a really good one, Kyle said with a smile. Anyway. Holly, please think about what youre doing, here. If this Zjok guy is as bad as he sounds, please consider it.

         Well, Ive already made my decision, Holly immediately said, despite Kyles plea. Im actually really starting to like that idiot. Hes saved my life,

Chapter 26

 

         hes been plenty of sweet to me, even though he can be a raging jerk, and I dont think I can find anyone else like that. Hes never insulted me, never called me out on my anger, and especially my hatred towards him.

         You still hate him, huh? Kyle said with a smile. He was happy for Holly.

         By, like, about 45%, Holly shrugged.

         Want me to go with you? Mr. Flower asked.

         Holly shook her head. I got this, Mr. Flower, thank you. Preox, will you be okay without me?

         Preox laughed gently. Holly, Rig can transform into cloud of lightning and smoke. Im more than okay, thank you.

         Holly laughed back, so did some of the others. I guess I can go and find a car and drive my way down there.

         Oh, that wont be necessary, General Murphy cut in, I can lend you one of my Humvees.        

         Youre one of the nicest Generals in the history of ever, AJ said with a chuckle. Holly thanked General Murphy with great sincerity and before she was to take off in the Humvee, she said her goodbyes to her team. She gave Kyle a big-ass hug, telling him that theyll always be best friends forever.

         We should get friendship necklaces when this is all over, Kyle said, holding Holly close.

         Lets do it, man, Holly simply replied and the two of them separated. Holly followed General Murphy, along the pier, to get her new sweet ride. She really deserved to drive a Humvee, especially after Evil Nacho had destroyed her car with his nacho cheese.

         So, how are we going to deal with enemies coming from the inside of the city? Moosey asked Preox.

         Evil Nacho approached the moose, chucking sinisterly. Oh, no need to worry, thats for me to take care of.

 

Zjoks Cockpit

         Let him come! Zjok shouted angrily, throughout the cockpit. The Mazers were scared of him, now that Super Jakey had destroyed the Neeka in

Zjok took out the Steamy Vampire B-105 gun out of his thigh armor and loaded a massive needle in it. The needles which looked similar to that of Krikets medical kit.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


          The tyrant slouched back in his lawn chair, eye-balling the forest and the entire city below him.           Zjok stood up, the Steamy Vampire gripped firmly in his fist, and walked up to the many controls at the center of the cockpit. A whole line of holo-graphic, organic bubbles were being switched from one side of the holo-   

Chapter 26

         

          graph to the other. The Mazers, Strikers, and Probes, watched their leader, cautiously.

          Youre moving the ship?! Xrfisap exclaimed.

          But the lightning! Xrfisap and Gfejio shouted.

          You could kill the survivors left in the city, Vanish said, who happened to be nearby.

          Zjok groaned and switched the organic, holo-bubbles back on the left side of the graph. Then I guess we can send in more troops, since you say there are a decent amount of survivors, am I correct?

          A significant amount, Vanish replied. They can attack from the opposite side of the waterfront and the troops we send can take care of the other side.

          Without killing our enemies, yes. The lightning can be controlled and having a wider range for the cannons will make it more effective.

          No problem, home skillet.

He had never seen so many auto turrets on the other Elephant he destroyed. Zjoks mother ship seemed to be more powerful.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Chapter 26

 

              Jake fought his way around the turrets, either crushing them with bat or blasting them to shreds with his elbow laser. Pier 87 – Kingzing City Waterfront

Chapter 26

        

         were dealing with. He was about to explain why he wanted the two of them to take a break, up until Kyle said something he didnt agree to.

Ever since he became Super Jakey, Jake raised his grade point average to a decent 2.5. It was much better than having a 0.0. Near the waterfront

Some of the sewer lids would slice right through Adoa Bats or knock the hell out of some infantry.

Chapter 26

The cheese was about as hot as molten lava and all it did was tear ships apart and cause searing pain upon the infantry.

Chapter 26

 

        at Holly, all while she was trying to get up. Holly screamed in pain and attempted to gouge Zjoks eyes out with her vines. The needle was sucking the Serum into the massive vile, attached to the needle itself. All while that was happening, the needle was also sucking out all of Jakes own blood, evaporating it into the air. Jake was getting weaker and weaker, as he powers were ultimately stolen by Zjok. He couldnt get the needle out of his chest, nor could he fire lasers, fly, or even move, for that matter.

       

 

Zjoks Providence

MY REVENGE HAS FINALLY COME TO A CEASE!

Blood splattered all over the area, all over Holly, and all over Jake. The first thought that could ever approach Hollys mine was a simple emotion of pure confusion. Okay, what the hell? Shards of Zjoks armor pierced into the main controls of the Elephant, causing the entire ship to avert directly, diagonally, downward to the right. The ship was     

 

Zjoks Providence

 

        going to crash into Greedy Beach, right in front of the Stupendous National Forest. Not only that, the Elephants lightning cannons had ceased fire.

The Waterfront

Chapter 26

Chapter 27: We Did It?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Greedy Beach was a beautiful resting place for Zjoks Elephant, although it did deserve nothing of that sort. The sun shined upon the oceans calm atmosphere, along with the crazy amount of debris, left from annihilated Adoa ships. Deceased bodies of the Adoa, only some, were scattered around the beach, and the third Elephant laid on its side, along the ocean shore. Once the Elephant had impacted, nothing but absolute silence roamed all over the beach. There was nothing but crashing waves, cool sand, large amounts of debris, and the dead bodies of Earths deceased predecessors.

Holly was surprised that the Elephant itself didnt explode on impact, rather than just hitting the ground in a casual manner. Of course, the ship was heavily damaged and appeared to be inoperable, but Holly found it somewhat        

Chapter 27

 

appalling to realize that the ship could sustain so much damage from falling out of the sky. Holly considered herself to be extremely lucky because if the Elephant were to actually explode, she wouldnt be sitting on the beach, completely soaked in water, hold Jake close to her.

Jake was still unconscious, though was going to die any minute and there was particularly nothing Holly could do about it. She continued to stare at his unconscious, expressionless, pale-white face. She held his hand, trying to read any thoughts that may have been roaming through his mind. From Jakes mind, Holly kept hearing her name. She wanted to cry, though she wouldnt allow herself to. Jake, you big, dumb idiot dont you dare leave me. Dont leave me when Im just starting to like you and your stupid, stupid smile. You rescued me and the minute I rescue you, youre on the brink of death. Would kissing you help? Holly pressed her lips gently against Jakes, which were cold and wet. The kiss obviously didnt work and Holly kind of hating herself to believe that it actually would. I wish I didnt have to watch Disney movies all the time. If youre still alive, Jake—and you better be—Im making you watch every single Disney movie in existence.

Jake didnt move and Holly could feel his heart rate decrease and decrease. A tear started running down Hollys cheek. Dammit, youre the first idiot-boy to make me cry. Holly held Jake as close as she could, as beautiful flowers started to sprout from areas along her arms and in her hair. She gasped and pushed Jake into the sand. EW! You coughed right in my ear! Oh, damn, sorry! Holly pulled Jake back up in her arms, as his eyes started to open.

O-oh, why hello, fair princess of the ocean, Jake said weakly, grinning like an idiot. It was the grin that Holly had always adored, even when she hated his guts. Holly slapped him hard. Ow. If youre gonna cuddle with me, at least me nice, because I almost died and stuff.

Holly smiled, kissing Jake hard. I dont know what I did, but it worked!

 

 

We Did It?

 

Jake thought for a moment. Well, when I had my cool powers, I first discovered my lasers by accidentally blasting my windshield. I hope my car is okay, by the way.

Holly laughed. At least you have a car; I guess I can heal other people too, other than myself.

I think you got better powers than I did, Jake said, out of jealousy. He sighed deeply, for he was going to miss his superpowers, which he no longer had. He got up from the sand, standing on his two feet. He was completely healed, within seconds, thanks to Hollys healing ability.

Are you alright? Holly asked, getting close to him. For once in her life, she was actually grateful to see that Jake was alive and well.

Jake nodded, with a slightly confused look on his face. Yeah, Im just confused.

Hmm, whys that?

Chapter 27

 

Well, if this werent for you, being the dummy you are, all of this would not have happened. And that didnt happen?

Holly shook her head. Nope. Instead of being crushed by that annoying alien, he blew up.

Yep! Blew. Up. Into nothing but flesh and blood.

Dont worry about it, Holly said with a smile. Ive been through some crazy stuff. If you need anything, just know that Im here.

For those of you who dont know what a Drokensmur is, they are an extinct species that could obtain unnatural powers beyond imagination. When they are about to die, they grant their special abilities to those who seem worthy of obtaining. The last Drokensmur to ever exist, or so we think, visited Zjok on the brink of its death. Zjok was always a disturbed Asid, but the Drokensmur saw what Zjok was capable of. The Drokensmurs dying wish was to grant Zjok his powers to use it for the greatness and protection of his kind. dire consequences. Ever since Zjok had the Drokensmurs powers, which were bestowed in the last drops of his blood, Zjok intended to use the blood only for evil and destroying those who have hurt him. After the most memorable celebration party of many lives, Marsing City dramatically increased in population. The city of Kingzing went under martial law. The entire month consisted of hunting down and being rid of any remnants of the Adoa. Preox, Kriket, and Rig commanded this movement.

We Did It?

 

            By the time one whole month had surpassed, it was time for Kingzing City High Schools Graduation for Class of 2005. Whats more was that Jake was actually able to pass all of his classes, for the first time in his life. The graduation ceremony took place inside Marsing State University, which was where Kyle was pursuing his acting career. The MSU stadium was massive, yet small for the numerous amount of people. Once the entire stadium was full, and when the time was right, students of KHS started walking down a long, narrow blue carpet.
