They were so duly noted that they were given permission to sit next to the members of the school council. Holly seemed to be the only person who was absolutely ecstatic about sitting with the old geezers. Before the four teenagers, there sat an astounding audience, along with the graduating students and before Jake had realized that he was actually graduating, the ceremony had begun.   

Wow, Kyle whispered, as he straightened his graduation cap, we did it? Even when we just fought off a bunch of alien invaders?

Pretty sick, if you ask me, Jake said, leaning back in his chair.

Holly rolled her eyes at him. Damn, I hope my speech isnt too long.

Same here, Velouria said, how about yours, Kyle?

Eh, so and so, Kyle replied, taking out a piece of paper from his gown. He began reading over his graduation speech and stuffed the paper back in his gown. There! All memorized.

Jake was confused, and scared. Wait, whyd you guys write a speech?

Youre supposed to, numbskull, Holly whispered sharply. She was getting frustrated from her tassel continuously getting caught in her hair. The school district asked, from the four of us, to write a speech for the graduation ceremony!

And why was I not informed?

You were there with us, when we all agreed to do it, Kyle said, trying his best not to laugh his ass off.

I was?

I guess you were slightly hung over, from the party, the night before, Velouria said, shrugging. Weve been having a lot of parties!

Chapter 27

 

Jake gulped, looking around the astounding audience. Well, of course I would be hung over! Ugh, what should I do? Ive looked like a douchebag enough as it is.

Were all used to it, Holly replied, with a smile. Despite the fact that she and Jake were together, that still didnt stop her from giving him so much crap. Jake glared at her.

Just go with it, man, Kyle advised. Do what I do, like in drama class, improvise! Oh, and always say yes!

Why do I have to say yes?!

Thats the rule of improv, yo!

Holly nudged Kyle to shut up. I wouldnt worry about it, Jake. We dont give our speeches for about another hour, and they go in alphabetical order according to last names.

First, there was Velouria Lancelot, then Kyle Manning, Jake Smithy, and then Holly Ransfield. So, Im fine?

No way, Holly said, and laughed at her own sarcastic remark.


 

 

 

Chapter 28: Class of 2005

 

 

 

           

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Velouria Knight Lancelot, will you please stand at the podium? the student body had spoken into the mic, calling for Velouria to give her speech. Kyle pat her on the back gently, as she took a deep breath and rose from her seat. She had a small stack of note cards, which contained the material of what she wanted to say to the students of 2005 and its enormous audience. She shook hands with the student body, members of the school district, and the janitor, and stood behind the podium. She was facing thousands of people and while showing very little signs of stage fright, Velouria began talking. Kyle and Holly listened attentively while Jake was spacing out, due to the amount of anxiety solely from the fact that he had no idea what he would want to say. He pretty sure that everyone knew who he really was, as Super   

Chapter 28

 

Jakey, also. So, not saying a few kind words to the citizens of Kingzing and Marsing City would be upsetting. There were also young children in the audience, wearing Super Jakey ninja masks, red capes, and even holding Super Jakey dolls.

 

Hello everyone, hello people of Oregon, Velouria started, with a bright little smile. She lowered the mic slightly, due to her shorter height. She looked so cute in her blue graduation gown. My name is Velouria Lancelot and as far as some know, I usually go by Vel or Sir Lancelot. Today, class of 2005, we are here to celebrate an accomplishment, an accomplishment weve been waiting for since we started kindergarten. There are so many wonderful, familiar faces I see in the audience. Faces Ive been seeing since I was the age of five. It feels so heartwarming to see all of these familiar faces sitting in front of me, just waiting to finally toss their cap in the air and shout, WE DID IT!

The audience clapped and cheered for a good thirty seconds, along with Kyle, Jake, and Holly. Velouria then continued with her speech. As far as many of you may know, there was an attack, at least over a month ago, Kingzing City ended up in a heap of danger, along with many of its inhabitants. I, myself, along with my three best friends and many other brave souls partook in fighting back, against the force that threatened the human races way of life. Fortunately, we succeeded! Unfortunately, weve lost plenty. I pray for those who were lost on that day and for those who are still in mourn, including me and my friends. Ive learned a lot this year, especially after the invasion of Kingzing City. Ive learned that no matter how hopeless a situation can be, all youve got to do is keep your loved ones close to you, whether he or she is there or not. Keep those people close. Velouria took a slight glance at Kyle, and smiled at him gently. I would like to thank my parents, my family, my teachers, and my peers for keeping me up on my toes in whatever direction I was headed, whether it was bad or good. I would also like to thank all of the brave souls who fought valiantly, last month. You guys will always be true heroes to us all. Thank you, everyone, for this incredible opportunity to speak to all of you, I love you all, and GO KINGZING RATTLESNAKES! SSSS!

Class of 2005

 

The entire audience clapped, roaring with cheers, with the students hissing like a bunch of rattlesnakes. Even a few students have maracas to represent the rattlesnakes tail. Velouria immediately received her high school diploma, once she had stepped down to sit next to her friends, once again. It was now Kyles turn to give his speech. He stood before the audience, holding no notecards, placing his hands on either side of the podium and gave everyone a huge smile. HI! Hello, everyone! Allow me to introduce myself! Im Kyle Manning and I am more than happy to be speaking in front of all you lovely people, tonight. I cant believe it myself, were actually graduating, class of 05. Look at us, all grown up, determined to create the future weve always dreamed of. Weve all known each other, seen each other, for over ten years. It kind of breaks my heart that Im not going to see much of you guys, anymore, especially the ones who were responsible for calling me names. Names such as Pencil, Skinny Boy, or just Shit-Face. Oh, yeah, Ill miss those people sooo entirely. Moving forward! Much has changed for me, since these past three months. Ive faced new challenges, Ive killed aliens from outer space, and I made a new friend. A friend I never thought I would even have the pleasure to give a proper greeting. Of all thats happened, I too have learned a valuable lesson: Never back down. Great, now I have that Tom Petty song stuck in my head!

The entire audience laughed at Kyles little remark. He laughed softly into the mic, smiling his biggest smile yet. When I first started high school, I had a hard time expressing who I really was. Ive found it difficult to say the right things around others and I always worried what they would think of me if I did whatever. No one should ever worry about the way he or she is! Its almost inhuman and wrong. Thanks to my most recent experiences, such as fighting for my life, as well as others, Ive learned that standing up for yourself for something that you could change, or improve, is worth taking any risk. And if something gets in the way, just knock it down! Plus, be sure to never lose, or forget, who you really are and what youre standing up for. As individuals, we are all powerful, there is no weakest link. All it takes is that positive mindset and youll be on your way to victory and happiness. In modern terms: Tell them haters to back up!

Everyone roared with laughter and cheers. Kyle wiped a tear from the

Chapter 28

 

            corner of his eye. He laughed softly into the mic, before finishing his speech. Holly smiled up at Kyle, as she took Jakes hand and held it tight. Jake was beginning to feel confused about Hollys thought process, once again, but then realized he would just have to get used to it. Velouria was almost crying her eyes out. She was clearly devoted to Skinny Boy.

Please remember what I said tonight, Class of 2005, Kyle began, and be proud of who you are. Dont let anyone else tell you, otherwise! I would love to thank my parents and family for all of their support, I want to thank my friends, and Paul Archibeque! As a most lucky student to have you as a teacher, I salute to you, sir! Peace, Im out of here, and congratulations Kingzing City High School! Youve taught some pretty amazing students! Kyle stepped down from the podium, taking his diploma from the school district.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Jake started laughing about Kyles final words. For some reason he found them funny and he could help but say in his head, Ha! Gayyy!

Holly was still holding Jakes hand when he thought of that. She turned and looked at him, smiling sweetly, as she squeezed Jakes hand as hard as she possibly could. Jake could feel the power of the Serum crushing his hand and it hurt like hell. Ow, ow! OW! OKAY! Im sorry!

Holly smiled, letting go of his hand. Good boy.

Kyle had sat back down at his seat, giving a kiss on Velourias cheek, and it was time for Jake to stand on the podium. Jakes heart rate began to    

Class of 2005

 

increase, especially when the student body announced his full name and requested him to stand. Will Jakeronovitch Matthew Smithy please come to the podium?

Kyle spat laughter, as the audience clapped for Jake. Oh my God! I didnt know that was your full name! Jakeronovitch?! BAH!

Jake stuck his tongue at him, as he proceeded to the podium, as his hands were shaking and eventually beginning to sweat. Once he had seen the entire audience, directly in front of him, Jake was really wishing he had remembered to write a speech. Some people in the audience were chanting Super Jakey, Super Jakey, Super Jakey over and over. For another minute of constant chatting and no words from Jake, the ridiculously nervous young man finally spoke. Before he did, he had remembered of Kyles advice about improvisation. Time to put that to the test.

Uh, yes! Oh, yes! Yes, yes, yes! Jake stopped, wearing a ridiculous smile on his face. YES! Yes, we are here!

The audience roared with cheers and thunderous clapping. Jake reacted, raising an eyebrow, realizing how easy it was to entertain the audience. U-uh, hmm, well hi!

Hi, said the entire audience.

Jake wanted to wipe the sweat off his forehead with his brown graduation outfit. He looked down at his feet and took a deep breath. Jake immediately began thinking about what all has happened over the course of three month, then rose his head back up. Hi, everyone, my name is Jakeronovitch. Most people just call me Jake, most people call me Super Jakey--.

YEAH SUPER JAKEYYY!! the audience roared, scaring the hell out of the school district members.

Okay, okay! Jake shouted nervously. The audience calmed down at last. Hah, yep! Im Super Jakey. So much for keeping that a secret, right? Anyway, most of you people might also know that Im one of the most popular teens in Kingzing City High Schools history Holly rolled her eyes, crossing her arms, though was completely thrown off guard when and the most sadistic jerk in the history of the universe. Before Super  

 

Chapter 28

 

Jakey, I was picking on innocent kids who were smarter than me, were better than me, and were mentally tougher than me. I think about this now and I regret every single taunt, every punch, and every harassment, everything that I have done to most people, which was completely unnecessary. After becoming Super Jakey, I was too nave to believe that life as a superhero would be fun and adventurous, just like in the comic books. I realized that life is not all about fun and games, the moment I first got shot in the chest, the moment I lost one of my best friends, and especially the moment when I was getting the tar beaten out of me by a hundred-foot tall monster from outer space.

The entire audience was immediately confused, once Jake mentioned him fighting the Neeka. He sighed. You know that big, dead, purple-ish monster they found near the Dansko Bridge?

Yes, the audience replied.

Jake nodded. Yeah, that was me, I killed that thing. No big deal, or anything. However, this is completely irrelevant to what I have to say here. Anyway, if it werent for being Super Jakey, after getting know people who have actually despised me in the past, after saving many lives from terrifying fates, I would never had noticed how much of pompous turd I was. Especially my dad, Jared Smithy. My dad has done nothing but stand by and made sure I learned the basics about life and what will be thrown at you, once you enter the real world. Being a wealthy father, who had enough money to pay for my car, my phone bills, and my education, he made me get a job. At first, I whined like a little kid, but then I started getting paid. After a few months of working there, Ive realized that doing hard labor and helping others actually felt good. Once Super Jakey came into view, I realized, Hey, Im helping others, right now, regardless if Im working or not, and it felt really good. Then I thought, Why live a life, where everyone hates you and doesnt get respect out of what you have to show, because youre such an ass to them? Having my eyes completely open now, Im really thankful that I turned out this way, the way that I am now. Whats more is that I gained new friends, friends who also respect me, and I cant be more thankful for that. I truly mean it. Jake could feel himself tearing up a little, but fought it back by giving a normal smile, rather than just a goofy grin, to the audience.

Class of 2005

 

Whether I have super powers or not, Im happy where I am, no matter what. Along with my friends, I would also like to thank my dad for pushing me up to where I need to be. I also want to thank my teachers, who all put up with my constant annoyance, and everyone else especially. You are all awesome, thank you. I would also like to give my condolences, again, to Cale Omnous family. Cale was a good friend and he will be missed, dearly. Oh, and another thing, I would also like to thank someone who means a lot to me. I know, it sounds very corny, coming out of my big mouth, but this special person has had my stupid, tiny heart, ever since I first looked into her eyes instead of her chest. If anyone should be Super, it should be her. Always. Shes also the most beautiful thing Ive laid undeserving eyes on. Shes smart, wonderful, charming, a bit crazy (but she has her reasons), shes independent, and she smells amazing. This goes out to the rest of you buddy-boys and buddy-girls. Those who are graduating, that is. Dont be a cocky, little monkey. It will never get you far, nor will it get you away from trouble. Stay classy, 2005!

Jake stepped down and when he first touched his diploma, he almost hyperventilated before he could get back to his seat. The audience continued to cheer, as Holly and the others stared at him. They were so impressed with Jakeronovitchs speech, they almost couldnt believe it.

Now thats what I call improv, Kyle said, laughing, giving Jake a majorly awesome high-five.

Jake smiled, laughing along with Kyle. Hollys thoughts have gone blank. She couldnt get what Jake had said out of her head. It wasnt her fault, although shed always wanted the man of her dreams to say something as sweet, and weird, like that towards her. Once the student body called Holly Astrid Ransfield, Holly calmly rose from her chair and proceeded to the podium, without saying a word. The audiences cheers, chants, and claps had finally ceased, once she faced everyone. From Jakes ridiculously sweet speech, Holly was almost unable to give hers. She took a deep breath and spoke. Living in a world of hate, utter stupidity, crime, and anything else negative that I can think of, I was almost too convinced that the world was literally too crappy for me to live on. Wrist cutting, self-hatred, constant       

 

Chapter 28

 

screaming only made it worse and there was literally nothing I could do about it. At first glance, I figured a permanent departure would change nothing, until I found myself as to what Im really made for. We, including myself, are much stronger than that one terrible day, week, or maybe even year. We are stronger than what tries to hold us down and expects us to suffer for something not worth suffering for. We are stronger than the ones who deliberately abandoned us, we are stronger than the ones whove tried to hurt us, and WE are stronger than anyone else who dares to bring the darkness with them. We will make mistakes, we will question our wrongs, we will lose balance every once in a while, but removing yourself from the rest of world will only make things worse. Removing yourself will only remove the chances of anything ever improving. Your existence is not worthless; there is no such thing as someone unwanted.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


There were some small whoops and cheers coming from the audience, though the rest gave Holly the silence she deserved for this moment. Jake and other two were getting chills up their spines. They have never heard anything like this coming out of Holly, the prettiest girl in school. Holly started to tear up. As soft, miniature droplets of eye fluids started to roll down her cheeks, she continued. I-I have no parents to thank tonight, but I know plenty who I can look to and be happy with. Class of 2005, you are strong. Were headed down a path thats going to challenge us, but nothing is going to change the   

 

Class of 2005

 

what we are going to accomplish. Love yourself and better yourself. My name is Holly Ransfield, I am honored to be up here on this stage, and I am more than honored to be a part of an amazing class. Good luck to you all, thank you.

Everyone in the entire stadium of MSU cheered as loud as they possibly could, all looking down at Holly from her most intriguing speech. She smiled, once she received her diploma, with a couple tears rolling down her cheeks. Jake, Velouria, and Kyle got up from their seats and pulled her in for a group hug.

Youre the badass of badasses! Kyle shouted happily, amongst the constant cheering.

Youre a role model for us all! Velouria shouted.

Jake was really hesitant to say anything, however. Uh, youre very pretty!

Holly laughed, thanking Jake by kissing him on the cheek.

The graduation ceremony was nothing but smooth sailing for the next two hours. It was more like two hours of constant anxiety for Jake, especially. He was so excited to toss his graduation cap into the air and not have to worry about school, ever again. Although there was college, school seemed to be the last on his mind. This was usual. The moment when everyone had thrown their hats into the air, Jake had never realized that his cap struck another student in the face, for he didnt even bother to go look for the damn thing, once he threw the thing.

Immediately after the ceremony, the graduation gradually turned into an autograph intervention. Kids and adults were going nuts for a picture with Jake and Holly. People scrambled for Kyle and Velouria to at least say Hi to them (Kyle recalled that he had never said Hi so many times in his life.).

Jake noticed his good friend, Hayson Prent, walking by and hugging his parents. Hayson noticed Jake and the two of them proceeded to approach one another and shake hands. Hows it hangin, Jakeronovitch? Hayson laughed once he said Jakes real name. Damn, dude, I had no idea that was your real name.

Sometimes I wonder if its even real at all, Jake replied. The two of them laughed.

Chapter 28

 

So, what are you doing in the future, Prent?

Serving my country, thats what Im doin, dawg, Hayson replied with a smirk, lifting his chin up. Wuda bout you? Still be Super Jakey?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Jake shrugged. I dont think so. I kind of lost my awesome powers.

Hayson reacted in a confused manner. How?!

Sighing, Its a long story.

Oh no, you miss your powers? Holly asked, taking Jake by the hand, who had snuck up behind him. I can change that.

Jakes eyes widened, as Hayson remained in a state of confusion. Jake had completely forgotten about how exactly Holly obtained her special abilities with flower power. Holly still had the Misara Serum in her system, therefore, since Holly seemed to be in the mood, Jake literally got too happy to be in public. Gee, you think so? Jakes flirtatious tone of voice confused Hayson even more. For a school jock who had been with countless girls, young and old, it seemed surprising that Hayson was not catching onto what Jake and Holly were hinting at.

Graduation party, Holly replied with a wink, then was abruptly brought to the attention of a little girl. The little girl had been tugging on Hollys gown, impatiently saying Holly over and over. Oh, hey there!

 

 

Class of 2005

 

The little girl appeared to be an innocent, sweet ten year-old, who had been losing her baby teeth. She was absolutely adorable. I heard you can make flowers.

Holly knelt down to the little girl. Why, yes I can. Whats your name?

Rylee. Sometimes I like to pretend Im a dog.

Holly laughed. Do you like dogs and flowers?

Rylee nodded happily. Ruff, ruff!

What flower would you like? Holly asked sweetly, adoring Rylees amazing dog impression.

Petunias!

Holly smiled and presented her palm. A fresh, purple petunia flower grew from the middle of the palm, as Rylees eyes widened. Holly plucked the flower and gave it to Rylee, who barked happily. Hows great!

Ruff! Rylee held the flower in her mouth. Thank you! I have to go find my parents, now.

Rylee left Holly, barking at the top of her little lungs. Holly stood up and faced Jake and Hayson, before she was requested by more children who wanted a flower from her. Oh jeez, Jake Im going to be a little busy.

And so will I, tonight, Jake responded, winking at her.

Hayson had finally caught on. Oh, snap! Dynamite!

Holly only gave the two a slight chuckle. So, Jake, I have a gig, tonight at the Cray-Z Baboon Caf. Kyle and Velouria are coming, want to tag along?

Um, is that a question? Jake questioned. Hell, yeah! Can Hayson?

Ill understand if you still hate me, Hayson replied, laughing a bit.

Holly spat. Sure! Im over it. Its a public event, so go right on ahead. I gave my only free tickets to Kyle, Velouria, and nooowww Jake! Holly rummaged through the pockets of her pants, under her gown and handed Jake her last free concert ticket.

YES! All access, baby! And what I mean by all, I mean ALL!

Settle down spaz, Holly said with a smile. Concert starts at ten, see you then.

See ya, Jake said with a smile. Jake and Hayson left Holly proceeding to venture throughout the stadium. Jake was often stopped by Super Jakey

Chapter 28

 

fans, asking for autographs and pictures. Jared Smithy had found his son signing a few shirts for a group of local school dancers, and gave him a huge hug. Oh, son! OH! My boy! Youre officially smart enough for society! Actually, I lied, you still got a lot to learn, buddy-boy.

Looking forward to it.

Jared smiled at Jake, shaking his hand. Son, you make me a very proud father. A very proud one, indeed. Now, if your mother was here--.

She would be passed out drunk?! Jake shouted, laughing hysterically. Jared began laughing and so did Hayson.

Aiiieee, snap! shouted Hayson giving Jake a high-five.

Suddenly, they all heard a woman shrieking as if she was getting bludgeoned to death. Many people turned their attention to the direction of the sudden screaming, only to see Preox, Kriket, and Rig walking on the fake grass of the MSU football stadium. The woman, followed by many other fanatics, were shrieking by the sight of the three aliens. Girls swooned over Preox and Rig, taking their alien and heroic stature to be the most attractive features theyve ever seen.

Kriket held onto Preoxs arm, giving the women death glares, allowing them to crawl all over Rig instead. WOW! I want to stay on this planet forever! Boobs! Boobs everywhere!

Hello, courageous idiot, Preox said, giving Jake a faint smile.

Preox, whatre you doing here?

Preox quickly shoved a girl off his arm, Kriket threatened to start throwing punches. No, dear, that is not necessary, anyway, Ive come to tell you some better news. And to congratulate you in your next step of education, of course.

Jake shook his hand, which Preox found definitely odd and unfamiliar, Thanks, bud. That means a lot, it actually really does. Anyway, you want to stick around with Holly, Kyle, Vel, and I? Hollys performing tonight. What about you, dad? Hayson are you still going?

Im goin, Hayson answered.

Ill go, Jared shrugged, I dont start up work again, until Monday, plus Ive been staying in the rental house for too long.

Well pass, Preox said, Kriket agreeing, I also speak for Rig, since

Class of 2005

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


he practically doesnt know how to.

Aw, come on, man! We need more variety!

I hope you dont mean that in a racial manner.

Eh, kinda.

I guess no offense is taken, then. Anyway, as far as you know, Kriket, Rig, and I have been working on restoring your city and I am relieved to say that everything is back in order. No more Adoa, no more foreign technology by your human standards (I double checked on that. I will not allow curious humans using the technology for any use of weaponry. Trust me, Rig and I got a wonderful impression of your race, when we first ended up here. I made sure everything Adoa was rid of.), so you guys should be good for reconstruction for the next couple years. Oh, and the city is no longer Kingzing.

Really? Jake was surprised. He was kind of hoping that the state government had renamed the city to Super Jakey City.

Its rather corny, Preox replied, youll have to find that out for yourself. In the meantime, while your city is under reconstruction, Kriket, Rig, and I will be leaving your planet to our own.

Jake blinked. What? I thought you said--.

I did. However, when the city was still under martial law, we discovered that Zjoks Elephant was still operable. Weve been working on

 

Chapter 28

 

its functions and we should be on our way home, within the end of this Earth year.

Well, dude! We gotta at least chill, before you leave!

No time, Kriket informed, we need to fix the Elephant as fast as possible, so we can tell everyone what had happened.

The rest of the Adoa will not be happy about this, one bit, Preox said. Between the Asids and the Adoa, were supposed to be under a Peace Treaty. We need to settle things out and, hopefully, turns out smoothly. Jake, this may be the last time we see you, because well not be coming back.

We goes to our planet now? Rig said, sniffling. I-I love you, Jake.

Jake laughed, he really couldnt believe Preox, Kriket, and Rig were leaving. It felt like he should have spent more time with them, especially since they were a group of badass aliens from outer space. Jeez, I wish you could have told me and the others of this, earlier.

Were going to tell the others, also, Kriket said with the smile, so its not all over, just yet.

YES! PREOX BUY ME A MILKSHAKE! Rig shouted, scaring the crap out of a few people. I WANT IT TO BE THE BIGGEST MILKSHAKE, IN THE HISTORY OF SHAKES! OH MY GAWL, LETS PUT PRETZELS IN IT! MMMEEERRRRRAAAAAGGGGHHHH!!! CORN STARCH!!! LOTS OF CORN STARCH! Rig had evaporated into his thick, cloud-like form and started shooting lighting into the air in excitement. The lightning looked beautiful in the night sky and everyone surely had lots of fun watching the amazing lightning show.

Preox focused his attention on Jake, completely ignoring Rigs little episode. Jake, its been a wonderful pleasure working with you. I know we didnt get to know each other as much as I had hoped, even though you do seem to be a great guy –aside from the fact that youre annoying, as hell –and I wish you luck in the long run. I also wish you luck with Holly, shes a feisty one.

Jake laughed, admitting to what Preox said about his girlfriend. Couldnt have said it any better than that! Come here.

 

Class of 2005

 

Jake walked up to Preox, his arms spread out. Preox took a few steps back, confused. Whatre you doing?

Its a bro hug, man, Jake responded, hugging the seven-foot tall alien. Youre my bro. Preox just stood there, not wrapping his arms around Jake. Kriket started laughing, amongst the completely awkward event.

I appreciate the compliment, Preox said, but this couldnt be any more awkward than it needs to be.

Jake let go of him. Yeah, youre right. Its your height.

Its your height, you ass!

The two of them laughed, along with everyone else. Rig was attempting to laugh harder than everyone else, because, well, he was Rig and he liked to be loud. He always did.

 

Saying goodbye to Preox, Kriket, Rig was more difficult than what Jake had thought. Despite that he only knew the three for only a short time, he was really going to miss his amazing partners of combat. The same, emotional status occurred for Holly, Kyle, Velouria, and even the others who had met the three most astounding soldiers. Preox was thankful for human resources, by the time they left because the Elephant required lots of orange juice for fuel and the humans had plenty of it! Rig was also thankful not just for the fuel, but that the orange juice was mighty delicious (This tastes better than that Misara Serum crap!! HEHEHE!). Kriket was thankful for being a part of Preoxs life, she didnt care so much for the orange juice. Kriket decided to stick by Preoxs forever, taking care of him, making him smile, and making sure he wouldnt beat Rig for his idiot personality. Once the Elephant took off in 2006, the two Asids and Aziquet were gone for good, only to leave their astounding moments on planet Earth as a nostalgic, wonderful gift, for everyone to remember and tell through story.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Chapter 29: New Adventures Await

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Not all of the fun was over, once the KHS class of 2005 graduated with great excitement, rejoice, and bitter-sweet emotion! There was still a concert to attend to, of course! The Nasty Pen had finally gotten back together, fully ready for some roof tearing, after all that has happened in the past month. Unfortunately, The Nasty Pen was unable to perform in the Funky Munkey Caf, which is currently nothing but a pile of rubble, but the Cray-Z Baboon Caf was just as promising.

Jake and the others made it there around the time Holly and the rest of her band made it to the caf, giving them enough time to get ready before the big show. Jake was wearing his lettermans jacket, as he strolled along with Hayson Prent, Kyle Manning, Velouria Lancelot, and of course Jared Smithy, to the caf.

I think she and the band are already in there, Jake said, reaching for the front door. He was ultimately stopped by a middle-aged man riding a skateboard. He stopped, looked up at Jake, and mooed at him. Couch Jim? Whatre you doing here?!

Chapter 29

 

 

Nasty Pen, duh! Couch Jim replied, taking off his skateboarding helmet and knee pads. He stuffed his safety gear in his backpack followed the others inside.

You two know each other? Kyle asked, concerned. And did you just moo at him?

Moo! Couch Jim replied, giving a soft laugh. The Cray-Z Baboon was completely empty, other than the employees themselves. There were posters, antiques, retro technologies, movie DVDs, and dimmed colorful lights throughout the entire caf. Similar to that of the Funky Munkey Caf, the Cray-Z Baboon really lived up to its predecessors potential.  They all went beyond the beverage area and gift shop, through a doorway which was replaced with red curtains.

This place is dope! Hayson hollered, excitingly, as he and the others who didnt get free tickets, received their admission. Why havent I discovered this kind of place, before?

Cale and I used to go to Funky Munkey all the time, during school, Jake replied, as they went through the curtains, after giving their tickets to a friendly ticket booth lady.

I was high the entire time I was at school, Hayson replied, I dont even remember being a part of it.

Im glad youre not my son, Jared said, with a sigh of distress. The show box area was larger than the Funky Munkeys, which was really impressive for Marsing. Couch Jim had already taken a spot and sat next to a familiar figure. It was Zeke, one of the civilians Preoxs team had saved.

Well look who it is, Zeke had said, who wore a perfectly groomed beard. Kyle had barely recognized him, but didnt take long to do so.

Zeke?! hollered, shaking hands with Zeke. Whats happenin?

Oh, you know just at this place, with Couch, over here. Its funny, I was just recently held hostage in a place, similar to this one. Nothing like a good rush of wonderful nostalgia.

Moo, indeed.

Kyle and Velouria laughed, taking note that Zekes comment was entirely true.

New Adventures Await

 

Have we always had places, like this? Jared asked, who took appreciation in the one-of-a-kind interior of the caf. He was quite impressed with the place and his love for coffee had increased.

In Kingzing we did, Jake replied. I wonder if they have banana, caramel cappuccinos, here.

Jared was slightly disgusted. Ew, what?

Its a lot better than it sounds.

Having standing next to the stages backroom, Holly slowly poked her head out of the doorway, attempting to summon Jake without causing so much commotion. Psst! Ugly, get over here.

Jake immediately responded to Hollys request and went into the backroom. The backroom was small, home-some, and toasty. There was a massive couch towards the end of the room, surrounded with more posters on the wall, some Chinese lanterns hung on the ceiling, several vinyl records scattered across the floor, and The Nasty Pens band equipment was being hauled inside the room, from the other door that led to the backside of the entire building.

Cody Gadomski, the other guitarist, had brought his equipment in, and was also helping Zamie Green bring in her drums. After helping her, Cody walked up to Jake and gave him a big, gentle hug. Mmm, Ive been needing a hug. Come here, Holly, I need one from you, too.

Holly smiled, giving Cody a gentle hug. Jake was officially convinced that random bro hugs were one of the most awkward moments anyone could ever have. Anyway, Jake, I just wanted to say thank you.

For?

What you said about me at graduation speech, Dumbo.

Jake decided to play his smart-ass card. Oh, I wasnt talking about you. Holly laughed and slightly punched him, which was strong enough to hurt.

Okay, I know you have super powers, but take that fist lightly, okay?

The two of them looked at each other, immediately saying at the same time, Thats what she said! The two of them laughed together, for the first time in history.

Jake.

Chapter 29

 

Yes?

I also want to thank you for showing me that not all guys are complete sausage heads.

Jake blushed slightly, as Holly kissed him on the cheek and took his baseball cap of his head. She adjusted the size of the hat and tried it on, herself. Whatre you doing?

Im gonna wear it during the concert!

Ha! Oh yeah? Whyre you acting so nice, all of the sudden? I feel like this is a trap, like youre gonna hurt me or call me names, sooner or later.

Oh, Im gonna hurt you, alright, Holly replied, with a wink. Okay, Bozo, go away, were going to start sound check, in five.

Jake obeyed his woman and proceeded to leave the backroom. Jake was immediately welcomed by a massive crowd of people, who had all shown up for the concert. The Nasty Pen was completely sold out and many disappointed, unlucky fans were left in the dirt.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


So what, Hayson said to his buddy, you hittin it up with a super-powered rock star, who used to hate chu?

Jake nodded, with a slight chuckle. I think she still hates me, slightly, but everything else is for sure.

I used to hate him, too! Kyle shouted, who was standing with Velouria, more towards the very front of the stage. Everyone was having a        

New Adventures Await

 

great time and many of The Nasty Pens fans were more excited than ever. Not only was Holly Ransfield a killer rock star, as part of a killer rock group, but she was also a killer super heroin. In conclusion, this show was going to be KILLER! After a few sound checks, the band was ready to rock and roll.

Hello, Marsing City! Holly shouted into the mic, as their audience went absolutely crazy. She was wearing Jakes hat, which really did not match the rest of her outfit, at all, but she didnt care. The band would like to thank you for making it tonight, as we not only pleasure your ear holes, but to pay a tribute to a dear friend of ours, a friend to everyone. He was a part of this band and we lost him last month. Greggory Stanley, also known as just Nathan, this new song is for you.

The band began to jam out and Jake was able to enjoy it more thoroughly. The last time he was at a concert, he felt alienated and removed. This time, he was able to enjoy a concert, without that slight fear. As for Jared, being someone who didnt go out and socialize very often, seemed to fit in well. He really enjoyed Hollys singing voice, along with Charles Thompsons supporting vocals and frequent shouting. The rock music was loud, persistent with passion, and just awesome. Even a few hardcore Nasty Pen fans fainted, when Hollys beauty shined in the stage lights. Her eyes had turned into sunlight, as flowers slowly grew along her guitar. Everyone found it a bit emotional to see that there was no electric piano on stage, which would be used by the undercover identity of Agent Nathan12, especially for Holly who had witnessed his unexpected demise.

 

So now what? Kyle asked. He, Velouria, Holly, Jake, and Jared were all in the back room. The concert had ended about an hour ago and everyone was just hangin out, listening to records, preferably records that Kyle himself enjoyed. After listening to the final track on that Dinosaur Jr record, Holly finally answered Kyles question. Im really not sure, actually. I mean, we just graduated, so I guess we can have a vacation or something.

Jakes ears perked up. Camping?! Just the four of us?

Oh, is Dad too amazing for you to bring along? Jared said, sarcastically, with a slight chuckle.

Chapter 29

 

You graduated, like, a hundred years ago, Dad.

Dont worry, Mr. Smithy, Ill look after your son for ya, Holly said, patting Jake on the back.

Jared snorted. Be sure you have a leash.

Ill get him a muzzle, too.

Everyone laughed, except for Jake, who obnoxiously took his hat from her. This is mine, anyway.

Holly pulled him close, tightening her arms around him and little flowers grew along them. Aw, dont be such a butthole.

Well you are what you eat, Holly, Kyle said. Holly snorted, followed by a crazy roar of laughter. Jared and Velouria caught on, their laughter lasting for minutes. Jake admitted to Kyles burn.

That was a really good one. Nice, Kyle.

Ha, thanks! No offense.

Eh, some taken, regardless.

Jared laughed at his son, Well, I best be on my way home, Im beat. Hey Holly, nice show tonight. That performance you made makes me realize how much of a gem you are, especially for Jake who remains to me a shard of coal.

Hey!

Thanks, Mr. Smithy, that means a lot. I put a lot of work into what I do.

Thank nothing of it. Oh, and you can call me Jared. Calling me Mr. Smithy just makes me feel old.

Well you are Jake said softly.

 Hey, watch it bud. Ill see you at the rental home.

See ya, Dad.

Good to meet you all, Jared said with a smile. I wished we all could have met on softer terms, rather than the middle of a crazy alien war conflict. Its been a crazy month for all of us, but like Holly said, were all strong. Ill be seeing you around. Everyone waved goodbye to Jakes dad, as he left the backroom, and shutting the door quietly. The rest of The Nasty Pen have all gone home, taking their band equipment with them. It was now just Jake, Holly, and Velouria, all sitting in an empty coffee shop, which was closed,

New Adventures Await

 

and only Holly had all-access.

I wouldnt mind camping, Velouria said, I havent been for a long time.

I was gonna say the Stupendous National Forest, Jake pointed out, with Holly sitting on the couch with her legs rested on his lap. He really liked that.

Yeah, but its kinda half-destroyed, right now, Kyle said.

Exactly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


The Dinosaur Jr record had stopped playing its tracks and Kyle took the record off the player. Nice collection they got back here, Kyle said, standing up with Velouria, taking her hand. I think Vel and I are about done, for tonight.

Holly and Jake laughed. Riiiggghtt, sure you are!

Velouria began to blush, as did Kyle. They were just too cute, together. Y-yeah, wellye-yeah whatever! You two behave! You guys available tomorrow?

I got work, Jake said with a shrug, Cheese and Crackers transferred me to the other one, here in Marsing. Kinda sucks, but whatevs!

I got rehearsal, Holly said. Were working on a new album.

Oh? Whats it called? Everyone was really interested in Hollys music, so whos not to be interested in a new album by The Nasty Pen?

Chapter 29

 

Holly adjusted her position on the couch, now laying across, and her long legs stretched over Jakes lap. He pretended it was no big deal, at all. I named it based on what weve all went through these past few months. You know, the drama, how all four of us came together, the ill warfare, the aliens, the super powers, everything. Its gonna be called Infinite Valor. Its what Ive thought of, so far, anyway.

I like it, Jake nodded in approval. Holly snatched his hat back and put it on her head.

Thanks, dummy, youre so nice.

Ill listen to it, fo sho! Kyle said happily, as did Velouria. You got some good talent, Ransfield, use it to your advantage.

Thanks, BFF, Holly said with a smile, getting up from the couch and giving him a big hug.

Yeah, I need to get a job, too.

Same here, Velouria said. Well, lets get going, sweetie.

I just cant wait to get into your pants, Jake laughed, imitating Velourias voice, as the two of them walked out of the caf. Holly snorted, shutting the backroom door behind them. Holly took off her jacket, her massive boots, and put on a new record, before laying back down on the couch with Jake.

Who are these guys? Jake asked, as soft, yet upbeat, music brought the room back to life from the quiet.

Sonic Youth, Holly answered. The song is called Sugar Kane. I need to introduce you to more bands.

I like this song. What other bands are on your mind? Holly sat up and kissed Jake on the lips. Her soft lips were sugary, tasteful, and addicting. Jake didnt expect Holly to even hold his hand on this night, so he finally realized that he could actually expect a little more.

Well, Holly said, kissing Jakes lips, if youre looking for music, other than local, I guess you could check out A Place to Bury Strangers. If youre in a tasteful mood for great alternative rock, theres Pixies, Alice in Chains, and Beat Happening.

Jake continued to kiss her, after taking off his jacket. I will definitely look into those bands.

New Adventures Await

 

Theyre amazing, Holly said, taking off her shirt. She took it off faster than Jake could say buddy-boy.

The Sonic Youth record continued to the next song on the album, which was more hardcore than the last. Wow, whats this song?

Youth Against Fascism, Holly said quickly, for all she wanted to do was just touch and kiss the person she used to hate.

I like this song t--.

Shut up, or youre not getting your super powers back.

 

Kyles Neighborhood

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Kyles neighborhood, Watermelon Seed Paradise, was the closest to Kingzing City anyone could get to, without getting stopped by military forces. The neighborhood itself was partly, critically damaged from the Neekas crazy rampage, but not enough for the entire neighborhood to be under strict security.  No one was allowed to enter Kingzing City, until the city itself was in decent condition, but that didnt stop Kyle and Velouria from gazing at the gorgeous view of the city from Kyles rooftop. However, as Kyle was expecting that was what he and his girlfriend were doing for the rest of the night, Velouria had something else in mind.

Kyle, lets make love tonight. That was all she said. Just five words to make Kyle almost swerve into someone elses newly repaired home. He slammed on the brakes of his 1993 Buick Century.

Chapter 29

 

He ended pulling to the side of the road, breathing heavily. Velouria giggle, completely out of fear from the fact that Kyle almost crashed. Im sorry, Velly-poo, but what was that? The radio was too loud.

The radio isnt on, sweetie, Velouria replied, with a smile.

Oh, yeah, its still broken.

Kyle, its okay if you dont want to have sex with me--.

NO! Uh, erp, I just—Im sorry, what?

Velouria took off her seatbelt and leaned close to Kyle, kissing his cheek. Kyle, I really, really think youre great. I know its only been three months since we first started, but I really do want you. I need you, Kyle.

Kyle gulped. S-so, Id be allowed to see your cleavage?

Velouria laughed. Of course, silly, and more. Much more.

Kyle inhaled and exhaled as carefully as he could, he really could not believe this was actually happening to him. My parents are home.

Mine arent

Your house is destroyed, Vel!

It was just a hole in the roof! Its fixed. The house is empty, Kyle. But, are you ready? I really care about you, sweetie. If you still wanna wait, I understand.

No, Im ready, Kyle said, looking at her in the eyes. Youre probably the only girl who finds me interesting (Other than Holly, shes my friend, and my mother), the only girl who laughs at the dumbest jokes I ever say. I mean, I know I kind of stole you, but--.

I (you) needed to be stolen, they both said together, before making out like a couple of animals. They stopped kissing and Kyle proceeded to drive to, not his house, Velourias house.

I like this night, I like it a lot.

 

Three Years and Five Months later - Nov. 2008

 

Over the past years, since the vicious war conflict between the forces of planet Earth and Zjoks branch of the Adoa, Moosey became the new Commander of the A72A, a higher ranking more than that of Captain Derno.

New Adventures Await

 

In their memory, Mooseys first order of business was to build a memorial statue of Agent Nathan12 and Captain Derno, right before someone were to actually enter the, now TWO, A72A bases. On another note, Moosey was able to build the second A72A base near Longview, Washington. Commander Moosey also hired Mr. Flower as an Agent, who was more than interested in doing so. As of now, Mr. Flower has become formally known as Agent Flower14. Mr. Flower now has a wife, Mrs. Rosie-Flower (who is a red rose) and three baby daisies. Plants move through life fast, one should know. Ever since the conflict, Moosey and Mr. Flower have become best of friends, similar to the friendship Moosey had with Nathan.

Preox, at first glance, was infuriated that Moosey wanted to continue the A72As legacy, since the agency captured and held him and Rig as prisoners, in the first place. Moosey promised to never go after the Asids, or Aziquets, ever again, not since theyve helped the planet Earth so much. Preox, who didnt give a damn about the rest of Mooseys career, was okay with that and allowed Moosey to carry on with his business. Ever since that, the two of them have been on good terms, even when the three aliens finally left planet Earth in 2006.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


        

 

 

 

Chapter 29

 

Longview, WA – A72A Base #2: Floor 12

 

         Mooseys horns had certainly grown, over the past few years. His uniform was perfectly decorated with special, A72A customary badges. Badges for bravery, persistence, and even keeping a positive and keen attitude! The overly massive, crescent-shaped, desk, which was Mooseys, was neatly decorated with office supplies and personal objects. There was a giant, framed illustration of him, Captain Derno, Agent Nathan12, and many of his other friends on his back wall. Friends such as Jake, Preox, Rig, Holly, etc. One object was for certain to piss off Preox, which was taken place in Mooseys big office, in the office itself. Below the framed illustration was an Adoa Mazers rifle. The gun was taken care of, clean, and much larger than the average-sized human rifle. It was a rifle Moosey had stolen, while he was in combat. Moosey had also kept two cartridges of ammo in the bottom right drawer of his desk. Preox knows none of this.

         Moosey was busy, concentrating on special paperwork, and was rudely interrupted by Captain Jon, who was formally known as Agent Jon43. He opened Mooseys office door, not shutting it, and slammed a pile of files on Mooseys desk. Completely broken out of his full attention on the paperwork he was working on, Moosey squealed and jolted from his seat. AH! Dont do that!

         Im sorry, Commander, I just really needed to bring you these.

         What did I say about shutting the door behind you?

         To not to right? Jon replied, headed for the door to shut it.

         I guess you could leave a crack. Its a bit toasty in here, anyway. What is it, Captain? I was just finishing the case of the yeti.

         Wow, its been three years since you looked into that, Jon said, stunned. Is it the way you hoped for?

         Just a snowman, Moosey said, taking a deep sigh. Anyway, what do you go me, now?

         A case that will blow your mind, Jon said, leaning over Mooseys desk. Okay, three groups of A72A Agents, of our own of course, each went on an expedition to investigate the city of Atlantis.

 

New Adventures Await

 

            Moosey was immediately interested and leaned closer to Jon, looking over the paper work he had set on his desk. Go on, Im just gonna look at these.

         Okay, so the first group was sent in 2006, after gathering all of the information they needed. They ended up in Presung City, Florida. After two more days, the A72A hasnt heard from the group since. No communications, nothing! The other groups were sent for a search and rescue AND a continuation of the expedition for Atlantis. In February of this year, a Navy found three crashed yachts on the shores of the Bahamas. Heres the kicker, by the time the Navy found the yachts, there were no traces of the agents. Not anywhere! The Navy now has the destructed yachts in Washington, D.C., but whenever someone took a picture of the destroyed yachts, he or she would die within the next day.

         Moosey found a few disturbing pictures in the files and almost vomited. Looks like someone doesnt want us knowing what is going on. Are these the agents who went missing?

         Again, there are no current traces of the agents. There are about thirty of them that are missing, by the way. Those are photos of those who tried to get us pictures of the yachts.

         Oh good lord.

         Jon laughed nervously. Yeah! Morbid, right?! The yachts are being kept underground, under maximum security, in Washington D.C. and not anyone has taken a look at them since. Oh, and get this, and only the government, that Navy carrier that discovered the yachts, immediately sunk and disappeared between Florida, the Bahamas, and--.

         San Juan, Puerto Rico, Moosey finished. Jon, its the

         Bermuda Triangle, they both finished together.

         What do the forensics say about these victims?!

         Nothing like theyve ever seen before, Jon answered. There have been some, including forensic scientists, who have stared down at these deceased victims have either become very sick, scared out their minds, or just end up screaming continuously, until their throat is destroyed.

        

Chapter 29

 

         Moosey gulped. We gotta do something about this. Im surprised we arent like those who have seen these photos, before. Jon, these are the most disturbing images Ive ever seen. This is a brilliant case, Jon, but we really got to do something about this!

         Uh, duh!

          Moosey threw all of the yeti documents off his desk and spread out all of the paper work, about the yachts, all over it. Get me Agent Flower14, were investigating this situation.

         Its his day off, Jon said. Hes with Rosie, making pollen. At least thats what hes told me.

         Eww.

         Yeah, I just realized that now.

         Moosey sighed. Well, get him to my office, once hes back on floor 12. Were going to investigate these yachts.

         First, let me go to the bathroom, all this anxiety really makes me need to pee.

         Yes, yes, hurry back! Moosey began looking through all of the paper work, and was willing to bring back more than just papers. He spoke to himself, as he looked through the papers. Oh jeez. Agent Flower14, you remember our conversation about gross socks and our silly discussion about a Stinky Sock Adventure? This may as well be it, except without socks. Oh, man, do I need a candy bar.


 

 

 

Chapter 30: A Chilling Christmas

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Welcome! Welcome to Infinite City, population of almost a million! Just sitting on the beautiful waterfront in the state of Oregon, Infinite City never fails to be a part of an awe-inspiring community! Other than the citys free-spirited people, gorgeous climate, and amazing new architecture, newer and familiar residents will soon be apart from what used to be Kingzing!

         Infinite City was named, due to the inspiration of heroism partaken against a force that threatened the entire world. However, Jake Smithy, who was now at the age of twenty-one, didnt think it was a very good name. Jeez, why Infinite City? Kingzing was so much better.

         It was kind of the mayors decision, Holly replied. The two of them were taking an elevator up to Jared Smithys apartment. Jake was holding a small stack of Christmas presents and Holly was holding a plate of apple pie. The two of them have been together for over three years, they were both living in a house of their own (near the Dansko Bridge), and things couldnt be any better for them. Holly was still with The Nasty Pen, which had   

Chapter 30

        

         increasingly grown in popularity, almost to the point where the band was actually known from all over the globe. Jake spent his career managing Cheese and Crackers Supermarket and coaching for Infinite High School. His career status was the best he ever had. He was happy and so was Holly.

         Well, I guess life cant be all that great, Holly said sarcastically, rolling her eyes. I hope your dad likes the picture. Im actually surprised hes never gotten a copy of Velourias illustration, yet.

         Yeah shit.

I cant believe its been almost four years since I was last here, living with my dad and all.

         Well, now youre a man, Holly said, with a smile. She knocked on Jareds door and he had opened it, almost immediately, as if he was waiting for the two of them. The fifty-six year old wore a Santa beard and hat, while only wearing his classic apparel of a flannel and baggy jeans.

         Hey! Merry Christmas, you crazy kids! Just set the presents under the tree, over there, Jake. Hey Holly, how are you doing?

         What about you, buddy-boy? Jared asked, with a smile. Youre packing up more meat.

         Well, I gotta be prepared, dont I?

         Of course!

A Chilling Christmas

Almost four years, bud. Its crazy, I know. Welcome back, son.

Oh, hey! Open this present! Jake went for a big, rectangular-shaped wrapped gift and handed it to Jared. Jared held it, surprised by the presents unexpectedly heavier weight.

What the hell is it?

He smiled, looking up at the two of them.

Merry Christmas, Dad.

I did, came Velourias voice, as she and Kyle made their way through the door. Jared had forgotten to close it. He did, once he had realized it. The two of them wore their winter clothes and had been carrying Christmas presents, as well. Im surprised you havent gotten your copy, up until now of course. Why didnt you wait for him to open it, before Kyle and I came?

 

Chapter 30

Its Astrid! Holly said, giving Jake her famous death glare.

Its cute, Jared shrugged. You know, like the kids book? They looked at him strangely. Okay, jeez, sorry for trying to help. Im gonna go get the eggnog. Jake, see if you can find a Christmas program on TV.

I was gonna watch football, Dad, Jake already had the remote in his hand. Everyone groaned in mental agony.

You dont need football every damn day, Holly said. Come on, search through the channels and see if you can find A Charlie Brown Christmas.

Jake rose his hands in the air, surrendering to her complete sass. Okay! Sorry! Excuse me for wanting to express my harmonious happiness and beliefs. Kyle and Velouria laughed, once the two of them sat on Jareds massive couch with Holly, as Jake stood in front of the massive television, skimming through channels.

A Chilling Christmas

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Jake took a few glances at the city, just outside the sliding glass door to Jareds deck. The view, as usual, was marvelous and Trans Island was seen in a distance. Although the city was granted with constant overcast and gloomy climate, the view could not be obstructed in any way. It was perfect and this Christmas morning couldnt get any better.

Kyle eyed on his favorite view, and that was glancing at Velourias tummy. He smiled, resting his hand on Velourias pregnant belly, feeling a few kicks from the infant inside. My, my, what a lovely fetus you got in there, Miss Lancelot, I do declare.

Velouria giggled, resting her hand on his. Its your lovely fetus, too.

Holly stared at them. Could you at least say baby?

Fetus and baby are the same, Kyle said, with an extra dose of sass.

I know, but it just sounds weird.

Well, if you were pregnant you would understand, Kyle said.

Kyle! Youre not pregnant!

Im speaking for Velouria and the baby!

Velouria continued to giggle, as usual. Holly, have you thought of having a baby? I mean, Kyle and I sure didnt before my pregnancy started, Im just wondering.

Holly shrugged. Im not sure. Ive thought about it, plenty of times.

Jake laughed nervously, after receiving a glass of eggnog from Jared.

Chapter 30

 

I sure hope youre not tricking me into something silly, babe.

Oh, nothing to worry about, dearie, Holly replied, giving Velouria a wink. Not sure, Vel, maybe someday. I still got Nasty Pen to focus on, right now. Whats this about you starring in a movie, Kyle?

Kyle smiled brightly. Well, its a long story, I met a few people, they took a liking for my acting and Im going to be a co-star for a romantic comedy.

Sweet, brutha! Jake shouted, still skimming through channels. Thats right down your alley!

Ill say, Im pretty excited! Kyle giggled, as did Velouria. It was a little scary.

Jared took a few steps towards the sliding glass door, gasping. Wow, its snowing. It never snows, here.

The gorgeous sight of gentle snow falling down on the city immediately caught everyones attention, with sheer amazement.

I dont think Ive ever seen snow before, Jake said, his mouth gaping. He was actually talking in seriousness, which appalled Holly.

The—what?! Youve never seen snow? Pssh, you big, fat liar.

Jake snarled at her, adjusting his baseball cap backwards. The closest Ive seen snow is dandruff!

How about we all stop arguing, Kyle started, be thankful that its Christmas and that Santa has the generosity that he didnt give you guys any coal, this year! He got up from Jareds couch and approached the two class doors to the balcony. Now, how about we all enjoy a marvelous view of complete splendor?! Kyle opened the glass windows and, no one could really believe it at first, but a great pile of smile slammed onto the porch, scaring the life out of Kyle. The snow itself, somehow, formed into an evil snowman, with a substantial gaping mouth and arms.

Nyah haha! Its time for a bit of a chill! the evil snowman shouted, with everyone else screaming.

The hell is that thing?! Kyle shouted in horror, falling back on the floor, scrambling to get up. The snowman grunted, with sheer evil, pulling out a massive icicle stake from its gut.

 

A Chilling Christmas

 

Kyle, watch out! Velouria shouted, getting up from the couch. The snowman attempted to impale Kyle with the icicle, Kyle rolled to his side on the floor, the icicle stake just skimming his hair.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


You watch out! Youre the one with the baby!

Oooo! I do love it when things get poppin! the snowman laughed evilly and started to go after Velouria. The pregnant lady screamed in fear, though Jake tackled it before it could get any closer.

Hey, skippy! Nice for you to drop in! the snowman laughed, before Jake beat the snowmans head into nothing but a pile of slush.

Ugh, not my living room carpet, Jared moaned.

Nevermind that! Holly said, her forearm forming into her deadly tree branch. Another evil snowman had descended onto the porch, laughing manically, as three more climbed their way up Jareds apartment. Holly sliced up the snowmen before they could wield their icicles. What the hell is this?!

I dont know! Get rid of them! Jared shouted angrily. If youre gonna have a snow fight, take it outside. Jake ran for the kitchen to get his backpack, for some special reason, as more snowmen were making their way up to the apartment.

Sorry, getting my costume on! Jake shouted in the kitchen.

 

Chapter 30

 

Jeez, you packed that thing?! Holly shouted back, fighting off the snowmen with her branch-sword thing.

Of course I did! Jake shouted back. Being a superhero is everything!

Holly rolled her eyes. Kyle, get Velouria to safety. Jared, if youre going to just stand there, go drink your eggnog somewhere else! Jake, you better hurry your ass up, theres more of these things!

Jake started making grunting noises from the kitchen. A snowman laughed hysterically as it shot icicle pellets from the palm of its snowy hand. Its time that I give you one hell of an ice time!

Jake?! Hurry up! These snowmen are really pissing me off, especially with their horrible puns!

You got this Holly! Kyle shouted, taking Velouria into Jareds room upstairs.

Errf! These gloves are too tight! Jake shouted angrily, but immediately transferred to a happier mood. I guess I am packing some meat!

Or some fat! a snowman shouted back, smacking Holly with his icicle stake.

What was that, bitch?! Super Jakey had ran out of the kitchen, in a newer suit and all, throwing a massive fireball at the snowman that had just insulted him. The snowman exploded into mush. Super Jakey was wearing his classic mask and cape, also including a pair of elastic, rubber, skin-tight, red gloves. He also wore a red winter vest to go with the occasion of looking bigger and mighty. That was just Super Jakeys way of completely showing off his image.

Bout time! Holly said, fighting off the snowman who had been obstructing her with its icicle. She wrapped her thorny vines around the snowmans neck and ripped its head off, clean. Super Jakey, having obtaining yet another unique ability, after receiving his powers back (due to personal circumstances), formed another blue fire ball and blasted away the last snowman. The monster exploded into nothing but steam. The entire apartment was a mess of snow, slush, and cold water. Jareds moans of distress came from the bathroom.

A Chilling Christmas

 

I really dont wanna clean that mess, out there!

Its just water, Dad, youll be fine! Super Jakey hollered right back, as he and Holly took notice of screaming civilians coming from outside. They both made it to the balcony, looking down at the streets of Infinite City. Snow had been rapidly falling to the ground, causing more evil snowmen with icicle stakes to rise from the ground, thus terrorizing the citizens.

I dont think the snow is actually coming from the overcast, Holly announced.

Duhhh, Super Jakey exclaimed, you think so, smart lady?!

Come on, you dummy, youve never seen snow!

Doesnt mean I dont know where it comes from! Jeez! Come on, hop on my back, were going down there to have ourselves a snowy time.

Holly hopped onto Super Jakeys back, laughing. Are you seriously trying that pun ordeal, right now?

It sounded funnier in my head! Super Jakey jumped down from the balcony, through the constant falling of much snow. Super Jakey landed, with a sonic boom sending snowmen through the air, diminishing on impact. Holly hopped off his back, using her solar flares to melt down the snowmen.

Hey! a bigger snowman yelled, firing ice pellets at the two heroes. Freeze!

Enough with horrible puns, buddy boy! Super Jakey shouted, blasting the snowman with his elbow laser. After finishing off a substantial amount of snowmen, a few dozen thuds (as portrayed as footsteps) where taking notice of.

Oh, jeez, what now? Holly sighed. A massive, thirty-foot robotic snowman wandered from around the corner, shooting tremendous amounts of snow into the air for the other snowmen to spawn from the ground. A psychotic, crazy man operated this giant, metallic snowman, who could be seen from atop of the robot itself. The man laughed, like crazy, forming more snowmen with is robot.

I am my own way, Super Jakey and Holly-Brat! The city is mine for the taking! I am the direction you point, I am the arrow you see, and I am the source! I am THAT WAY!

That Way rose his hands in the air, with one of them being replaced

Chapter 30

 

By a mechanical, built-in gadget in the form of a red arrow. That Way laughed viciously, firing a small missile from the tip of his mechanical arrow. Super Jakey and Holly took cover, as the missile impacted the ground. The missile exploded into a tremendous amount of snow, forming a giant snowman with an icicle weapon in the shape of an ax.

LOOKS LIKE YOU AXED FOR IT! the giant snowman roared confidently.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


         Before the giant snowman could swing its giant ax, a geyser of hot boiling nacho cheese erupted from a sewer from under the monster itself. The cheese was hot enough for the giant to scream in pain and melt into the concrete. Evil Nacho crawled out of the sewer and stood before Super Jakey and Holly. Merry Christmas, insignificants. Long time, no see at all.

         Evil Nacho, we were never able to thank you for helping us with the Adoa, Holly said, as more vines grew around her arms. Super Jakey kept his focus on That Way and the small army of snowmen that stood in front of the mad man. Evil Nacho appeared to be much larger, more wrinkled, and more terrifying, than the way he used to. The nacho monster stood beside the two, ripping sharp nacho chips from his body. He held them tight, ready to use them as weapons at any moment.

         My apologies, Miss Ransfield. I now realize my rudeness was unnecessary.

A Chilling Christmas

        

         Its all good man, Super Jakey said, lets just get this over with. I want to be able to open my presents.

         Its not like you got anything special, Holly said, giving Super Jakey crap, as her eyes turned into complete sunlight.

         Hey, That Way! Super Jakey shouted. How about you take your pansy-snow-hoes back to the North Pole, huh?!

         Negative, Super Cretin! Surrender the city, before you all go through quite the blizzard!

         Well! Super Jakey started. Then I guess well see who will be the cooler one, in this situation!

         Holly laughed. That was better, Jake.

         Thank you very much! Super Jakey shouted back in agreement, as Evil Nacho cackled, staring down the evil snowmen who had their icicle weapons ready for combat. After that spark of self-confidence and personal gain, That Way had ordered his horrifying fleet of snowmen to charge at the three, super-powered trio. The snowmen continued to make excruciatingly annoying puns as they charged at them.

         Super Jakey smiled at Holly, who smiled back, as Evil Nacho was the first to jump into the crowd of snowmen to fight them off. Super Jakey formed two fireballs in each hand, watching Holly jump into the fight. Super Jakey flew straight up into the air, enjoying the cool winter breeze rushing through his face. He held onto the fireballs, smiling brightly at the overcast sky. He remembered everything, everything such as winning the girl of his dreams, making new friends, saving lives, and most of all, not being so much of a jerk-face all the time. He had never felt so fresh in his life. He was happy to be home, he was happy to be with the people he loved, he was happy it was Christmas, and he was happy to be back in action as his amazing alter ego Super Jakey. He took a deep dive into the city, shouting as loud as he could, BRING IT ON, BUDDY-BOYS!!!

 

THE END

And many, many others. Im dead serious.

 

There is a vitality, a life force, an energy, a quickening that is translated through you into action, and because there is only one of you in all of time, this expression is unique. And if you block it, it will never exist through any other medium and it will be lost. The world will not have it. It is not your business to determine how good it is nor how valuable nor how it compares with other expressions. It is your business to keep it yours clearly and directly, to keep the channel open. You do not even have to believe in yourself or your work. You have to keep yourself open and aware to the urges that motivate you. Keep the channel open. ... No artist is pleased. [There is] no satisfaction whatever at any time. There is only a queer divine dissatisfaction, a blessed unrest that keeps us marching and makes us more alive than the others. –Martha Graham, 1991
